gos dag dang / kaR+sha pa Na dag bskur nas smras pa/ jo bo la 'di skad ces/ snga ma 'di tsam je gsol zhing ma nobs shig dang / slad kyi gal te dbon po dag dang / dbon mo dag dang mjal bar
gyur na/ de dag kaR+sha pa Na ji snyed cig 'bul bar 'gyur bas/ khyod nye du dag gis glo bas bas par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes gyis shig /bu mo de der song ste legs 'ongs la gos dag dang / kaR+sha
pa Na dag phul nas smras pa/ jo bo/ lcam gyi mchid nas snga ma 'di tsam je gsol zhing ma nobs shig dang / slad kyi gal te dbon po dag dang / dbon mo dag dang mjal bar gyur na/ de dag kaR+sha
pa Na ji snyed cig 'bul bar gyur pas/ khyod nye du dag gis glo bas bas par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras te song ngo / /legs 'ongs kyis bsam pa/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni/ nye du'i
'khor rgya che ba yin la/ bdag kyang sngon nye du'i 'khor rgya che ba yin pas de der song na/ de dag bdag la gtam 'dri bas ring du thogs par 'gyur zhing / des bdag ltogs te 'chi bar
'gyur gyi/ je g.yar sus za zhing 'grangs nas der song ste/ nye du'i tshogs dag la bde bar sor sor kun dga' bar bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de chang ma'i khyim du song ste/ des ji tsam gyis ra ro bar
'gyur ba de tsam gyis chang gsar pa 'thungs nas de ra ro ste skyed mos tshal du song nas nyal lo/ /mnyan yod na skyed mos tshal 'joms pa'i mi dag skyed mos tshal
nyug par byed cing / de dag gis gal te mi gnyid log pa mthong na/ de rkang pas sgul bar byed cing / gal te sad na ni/ de la 'di skad ces/ kye nang rje/ khyod kyis mnyan yod na skyed mos tshal
'joms pa'i mi dag skyed mos tshal nyug par byed cing / de dag mi gnyid log pa 'joms par byed do/ /zhes ma thos sam/ longs la song zhig ces zer ro/ /gal te ma sad na ni/ bcom ste
'dong bar byed pas skyed mos tshal 'joms pa'i mi dag der lhags te legs 'ongs nyal ba mthong nas de dag gis de rkang pas bsgul na ma sad nas/ ji tsam na de dag gis de bcom ste
dong ngo / /ji tsam na legs 'ongs sad pa dang / bdag nyid bcom par mthong nas/ des ral rul de dag nyid gyon te 'dug go /de'i sring mos bsam pa/ ci'i phyir bdag gi ming po de yun
ring du thogs snyam nas/ des bu mo mngag gzhug ma mngags te bltar btang ba dang / de der song ste bltas na/ ji tsam na bcom pa mthong nas/ bu mo de song ste jo mo la smras pa/ jo mo/
jo bo bcom ste sngon gyi cha lugs nyid kyis bzhugs so/ /sring mos bsam pa/ de ni/ sems can skal chad cig yin pas/ de'i le lan gyis khyim bdag rtog ldan gyi khyim nor du ma dang
ldan pa tshul ma yin pas chud zos par gyur pas/ da gal te bdag gis de 'dir bcug par gyur na/ bdag gi gyos po'i khyim yang de'i le lan gyis tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba
gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas/ des de yal bar bor ro/ /legs 'ongs kyis kyang las kyi sgrib pas de brjed nas/ de mu lto ba dag gi nang du zhugs pa dang / ji tsam
na mu lto ba de dag kyang lag pa stong pa dang / sprang phor stong par gyur te/ phyir lhags nas de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ bdag cag sngon chad gar zhugs pa der lag pa gang ba dang / sprang
phor gang bar gyur te phyir 'ong na/ deng bdag cag lag pa stong pa dang / sprang phor stong par gyur te phyir lhags pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/ de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gi nang du sems can skal chad
'ga' zhig zhugs pas/ des na/ bdag cag lag pa stong pa dang / sprang phor stong par gyur te phyir lhags so/ /yang de dag gis smras pa/ brtag par bya'i/ bdag cag kha gnyis su bcad de 'jug
par bya'o/ /zhes de dag gis kha gnyis su bcad de zhugs pa dang / gang dag gi nang du legs 'ongs zhugs pa de dag lag pa stong pa dang / sprang phor stong par gyur te lhags so/ /de dag gis kyang kha
gnyis su bcad de zhugs pa dang / gang dag gi nang du legs 'ongs zhugs pa de dag lag pa stong pa dang / sprang phor stong par gyur te lhags so/ /de dag gis kyang kha gnyis su bcad de zhugs pa dang /
yang de ltar gyur to/ /de dag gis kyang yang dang yang du kha gnyis su bcad de zhugs pa dang / de lta de ltar gyur nas ji tsam na/ legs 'ongs dang mu lto ba gzhan gcig zhugs pa
yang so sor bye ba dang / lags 'ongs ni/ lag pa stong pa dang / sprang phor stong par gyur te 'ongs la/ gzhan thams cad lag pa gang ba dang / sprang phor gang bar gyur te 'ongs nas de dag gis smras
pa/ sems can skal chad 'di bdag cag gi nang du zhugs pas/ des na/ bdag cag lag pa stong pa dang / sprang phor stong par gyur te lhags so/ /zhes de dag gis legs 'ongs shin tu brdegs
te sprang phor gyis de'i klad pa bcom nas nyes 'ongs khyod phar song zhig/ ces smras te bskrad do/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du
gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas de'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag/ ji srid du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gdugs tshod ma gsol gyi bar du mu lto ba 'ga'
yang 'jug tu ma gzhug cig/ de la phyis sbyin par bya'o/ /de na mu lto bas 'jug par brtsams pa na/ mi sgo bas de dag phyir zlog pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ kye nang rje/ kho bo cag gi ming gis/
khyim bdag bzang sbyin gyi ming mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya bar grags pa yin na/ ci'i phyir khyod kho bo cag phyir zlog par byed/ yang de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ bdag cag gi nang
du yang nyes 'ongs de zhugs par ma gyur tam/ ltos shig ces de dag gis bltas pa dang / ji tsam na/ de dag gis legs 'ongs der zhugs pa mthong nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ nyes 'ongs

de 'di yin no/ /zhes de dag gis legs 'ongs shin tu 'debs te sprang phor gyis de'i klad pa bcom nas de dag gis lag pa dang / rkang pa dag nas bzung ste khrid nas phyag dar gyi phung po'i steng du bzhag
ste/ nyes 'ongs khyod 'dir 'dug cig ces smras pa dang / legs 'ongs phyag dar gyi phung po'i steng na ngu zhing 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs gsol/ lhung bzed dang chos gos
bsnams te dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar te khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi gnas sa ga la ba de logs su gshegs pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis legs 'ongs phyag dar gyi phung po'i steng na klad pa zhom nas khrag 'dzag cing ngu zhing 'dug pa gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'di ltar
srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can yang gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur pas/ srid pa dag gis ngom par bya zhing / srid pa'i yo byad dag gis kyang ngom par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis legs 'ongs la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi gnas sa ga la
ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs
pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed/ stob par byed do/ /rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang / bza'
ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol zhing phyag bcabs/ lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig
blangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos legs 'ongs la lhung bzed lhag ma bzhag pa brjed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams ni/ bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid can yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs 'ongs la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma bzhag pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan
'das kyi lhung bzed kyi pham phabs blang bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la legs 'ongs la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma zhog cig ces
bka' stsal pa brjed pa dran nas des du bar brtsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod ci'i phyir du/ btsun pa/ bdag gis legs 'ongs la lhung
bzed kyi lhag ma bzhag pa bskyud de/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bcag go /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis nga'i bka' bcag pa ma yin gyi/ 'di ltar legs 'ongs nyid kyis las kyi sgrib
pas khyod kyis de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma bzhag pa brjed par gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod song la legs 'ongs bos shig/ de song ste legs 'ongs/ legs 'ongs zhes bos pa dang / du
ma dag gis ang zhes lan btab cing / de dag gis bsam pa/ deng bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum gyi bla mas gang la dgongs snyam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo phyir log ste gsol
ba/ btsun pa/ bdag gis legs 'ongs/ legs 'ongs zhes bos na/ du ma dag gis ang zhes lan btab na/ gang mchi bar bgyi/ kun dga' bo/ song la 'di skad ces/ chu srin byis pa
gsod kyi ri pa khyim bdag rtog ldan gyi bu legs 'ongs gang yin pa de/ tshur shog ces bos shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo song ste de skad bos pa dang / legs 'ongs kyis bdag gi ming dran nas
des tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa/ legs 'ongs sgra 'di bskyud gyur na/ /ga las 'dir ni mchis par gyur/ /nges par ma legs zad gyur cing / /legs pa byung bar gyur yang dag /gang
dag khyod la skyabs mchis pa/ /de dag mgon ni kun mkhyen lags/ /gang dag khyod kyi gsung dga' dang / /'phags pa de dag legs 'ongs lags/ /bdag ni skal dang bral ba ste/ /rtsa lag
kun gyis spangs gyur cing / /brtse gnas drag po'i gnas thob pa/ /mya ngan zug rngus gzir ba lags/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de khrid de zhugs nas gsol
pa/ btsun pa/ legs 'ongs de/ 'di lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu/ khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed kyi pham phabs za 'am/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'tshal
lo| |bcom ldan 'das kyis de la lhung bzed kyi pham phabs stsal ba dang / ji tsam na des nyung ngur mthong nas des bsam pa/ bdag la bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum gyi bla mas brgya
lam na dgongs su zin kyang lhung bzed kyi pham phabs chung ngu zhig bzhag go/ snyam mo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/ bu legs 'ongs/ gal te khyod

ri rab tsam gyi kham dag dang / rgya mtsho chen po tsam gyi ltos za bar byed na yang ji srid du khyod tshim par ma gyur pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed kyi pham phabs zad par mi 'gyur ro//
des bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed kyi pham phabs zos pa dang / de tshim par gyur nas/ de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du blta bar brtsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
bu legs 'ongs/ tshim mam/ bcom ldan 'das/ tshim mo/ /kham tha ma longs shig dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /des de blangs nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas
sbyin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di su lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri ba khyim bdag rtog ldan gyi bu yin no/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ 'o na bdag gi chung po grogs kyi bu lags so/ /khyim bdag/ de yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon bshad pa mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs pa dang / srid pa
tha ma pa'i sems can de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi slad bzhin slad bzhin rjes su 'brang zhing song nas/ bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan
bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa dang / legs 'ongs kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i las sbyang
bar bya'o/ /snyam du dgongs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis legs 'ongs la bka' stsal pa/ legs 'ongs/ khyod la kaR+sha pa Na dag yod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma mchis so/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu/ gos kyi grar ltos shig /des bltas pa dang / ji tsam na kaR+sha pa Na gnyis yod par mthong nas des gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ mchis so/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu/ song la kun dga' ra ba pa rgyal bu dum pa'i gan nas ut+pa la sngon po dag khyer te shog cig /des bcom ldan 'das bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes
bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas kun dga' ra ba pa rgyal bu dum pa ga la ba der song ba dang / rgyal bu dum pas de thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong nas des bsam pa/
nyes 'ongs 'di gshed nas 'dir 'ongs pas/ bdag la gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas des smras pa/ nyes 'ongs/ kun dga'i ra
bar ma 'jug cig /legs 'ongs kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ bdag ni ut+pal mi sgrub ste/ /pad+ma bdag la dgongs pa med/ /kho bo kun mkhyen grags ldan pa/ /thub pa'i dbang
po'i pho nya yin/ /dum pas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ gal te thub pa zhi bdag nyid/ /lha mi rnams kyi mchod gnas kyi/ /mchod pa'i gnas kyis ches mchod pa'i/ /pho nya lags na tshur gshegs
byon/ /dum pas smras pa/ khyod sangs rgyas kyi pho nya yin nam/ legs 'ongs kyis smras pa/ kho bo sangs rgyas kyi pho nya yin no/ /don ci'i phyir 'ongs/ ut+pa la dag gi phyir 'ongs so/ /song
la ji snyed 'dod pa de snyed khyer te song zhig /legs 'ongs kyis ut+pa la sngon po dag gi khur khyer te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
legs 'ongs/ dge slong rnams la brims shig /legs 'ongs kyis dge slong rnams la ut+pa la sngon po dag brim par brtsams pa dang / dge slong dag mi len nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dri zhim po thams cad ni/ mig la phan zhing / 'di'i las sbyang bar yang bya'i/ longs shig /dge slong rnams kyis me tog de dag blangs so/ /legs 'ongs
kyis sngon zad par sngon po'i skye mched bskyed pas de rgan pa'i mtha' logs na 'dug pas/ dge slong rnams kyi lag na ut+pa la sngon po dag thogs pa de dag mthong ngo / /mthong nas zad par sngon
po'i skye mched mngon du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs 'ongs/ khyod ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rab tu 'byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis
de rab tu phyung / rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la gdams ngag stsal to/ /de de ltar rab tu byung nas gcig pu dben pa/ bag yod pa/ rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid
btang bar gnas pa na rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar byed la/ tshangs par
spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de'i tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /bya ba byas so/ /srid pa 'di
las gzhan mi shes so/ /zhes go bar byed cing / dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i
sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan bzhag pa lta bu rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing / rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid
pa dang / 'ded pa'i rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / brjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar
gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang / bde ba nyams su myong ba na/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa/ dbang po
de nyid gzigs pa yis/ /thabs kyi zhags pas bdag bcings te/ /glang chen rgas pa 'dam phyung ltar/ /thugs rjes sdug bsngal 'dam nas phyung / /bdag ni sngon chad legs 'ongs gyur/ /
de yi 'og tu nyes 'ongs lags/ /da ni thugs dbang khyod gsung gis/ /gsal bar legs 'ongs nyid du gyur/ /kun mkhyen lcags 'dra bdag gis ni/ /khyod kyi gsung mchog thos
gyur nas/ /da ni gser dang 'dra ba yi/ /zag pa med pa'i lus kyang thob/ /rin chen la sogs thob pa dang / /mtho ris thar pa 'tshal ba yis/ /rtag tu phan pa bzhed pa yi/ /dge
bshes bsten par bgyi ba bzang // //'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po re lnga pa/ gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul
ba la rab tu byung ba de'i tshe na/ gzhan mu stegs can dang / shes ldan dag /dge sbyong go'u ta ma na re/ nga'i bstan pa ni/ kun tu mdzes pa yin no/ /zhes zer na/ 'di ltar/ nyes 'ongs la sogs
pa mu lto ba dag kyang rab tu 'byin par byed na/ de'i bstan pa ji ltar kun tu mdzes pa yin zhes smod par byed/ 'phyar kha gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs

pa| nyan thos chen po ri rab lta bu la skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dag smras pa skyed par byed pas 'di'i yon tan bsgrag par bya na/ gang du bya/ gang du skyes shing gang du rdib pa de nyid du bya'o/ /snyam
du dgongs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa ngan spong gi bu dag tu ljongs
rgyur gshegs kyi/ khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ngan spong gi bu dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des/ chos gos dag longs shig ces sgos shig /tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bos/ btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag /bcom ldan 'das ngan spong gi bu dag tu ljongs
rgyur gshegs kyi/ khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig tu ngan spong gi bu dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des/ chos gos dag longs shig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/ grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang ldan pa/
thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa
dang ldan pa/ khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ glang po che ltar glang po che'i phrug gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs
kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs
kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dpa' bo ltar ru pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i
tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ khams kyi rgyal po ltar blon
po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ 'khor los bsgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nyi ma ltar 'od zer
stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ 'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyis tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mig mi
bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ gnod sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ thag bzang ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ brgya
byin ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshangs pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dbang po rnams shin tu dul ba/ spyod lam dang spyod pa ma
'khrugs pa/ chu gter ltar ting de ba/ sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa/ glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/
dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku rnam par mdzes pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun tu bzang ba/
stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya dang / rta thul dang / bzang ldan dang / rlangs
pa dang / ming chen dang / grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzang la sogs pa nyan thos chen po de dag dang / gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos
yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te ngan spong gi bu dag tu chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri ga la ba de logs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na chu srin byis pa gsod kyi rir
byon nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs rung gi cha la ri dwags kyi nags na bzhugs so/ /chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das ngan spong gi
bu dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ chu srin byis pa gsod kyi rir byon nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs rung gi tshal ri dwags kyi nags na bzhugs zhes thos so/ thos nas
kyang tshogs nas tshogs su/ byings nas byings su 'dus shing lhags te chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/ /mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan
pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/ /
rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /de nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa sang bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das kyis chu srin byis
pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang
mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas dong ngo / /de nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram
ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis de nyid kyis mtshan mo bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te/ gdan bshams shing chur bzhag nas/
bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis/ btsun pa/ gdugs tshod g.yar dgongs 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes spyan drangs so/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga dro sham thabs gsol/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du
bdar nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan
bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig
nas bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed/ stob par byed do/ /rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas
tshim par byas shing bstabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol zhing phyag bcabs/ lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas stan ches dma' ba dag blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi
spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/ /'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri ba'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/
bcom ldan 'das kyis klu gdug pa dang / gnod sbyin gdug pa dang / sog ma med dang / 'brog gnas la sogs pa de dang de dag kyang btul nas/ btsun pa/ klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa 'di
yun ring po nas bdag cag 'khon ma mchis pa rnams la 'khon du 'dzin/ mi 'gran pa rnams la 'gran du tshol/ mi 'khu ba rnams la 'khu bar bgyid cing / lo tog 'khrungs so 'tshal
ma rungs par bgyid na/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su thugs brtse ba'i slad du klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa 'di 'dul du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram
ze dang khyim bdag rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis
yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/ /rnam grangs du mar
chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las
bzhengs te gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la dge slong rnams la/ khyed cag las gang klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa 'dul bar spro ba des
tshul shing longs shig ces bsgo la/ dge 'dun la tshul shing brims shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan
nas dge slong rnams la khyed cag las gang klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa 'dul bar spro ba des/ tshul shing longs shig ces bsgo ste/ dge 'dun la tshul shing brims
par brtsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul shing ma bzhes nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gis bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i slad du tshul shing ma
bzhes snyam du bsam na/ tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi yon tan bsgrag par bzhed par rig nas de dag gis kyang tshul shing ma blangs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis bsam
pa| bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gis ci'i slad du tshul shing ma bzhes snyam du bsam na/ bdag gi yon tan bsgrag par bzhed nas ston pa'i
thugs la dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des stan phyed las 'phags te glang po che'i sna lta bu'i lag pa brkyangs nas tshul shing blangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' po dge slong gnas brtan gang gis tshul shing blangs/ btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis blangs so/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la dge slong legs 'ongs la 'di skad ces/ de ni/ klu gdug pa yin gyi khyod kyis lus kyi dbang po bsrung bar bya'o/ /
zhes gyis shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa legs
'ongs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni/ klu gdug pa yin gyi/ khyod kyis lus kyi dbang po bsrung bar bya'o/ /zhes gsung ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis smras pa/ btsun
pa kun dga' bo/ ston pa'i bka' mnyan pas bka' bzhin 'tshal/ gzhan du na klu a mra'i chu ngogs lta bu sha stag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/
'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal bzhin du gang bar gyur kyang de dag gis bdag gi spu'i rtse mo tsam yang g.yo bar mi nus na/ lus kyi dbang po 'gag par lta ga la nus te/ 'di ltar/
bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po dag kun tu bsten cing / goms par byas/ lan mang du byas pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs de nyid kyi
mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te chu srin byis pa gsod kyi rir bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /chu srin byis pa gsod kyi rir bsod snyoms
rgyus nas klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa'i gnas ga la ba der song ba dang / klu a mra'i chu ngogs pas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang des bsam
pa| dge sbyong 'dis bdag shi bar gtam thos sam/ ci na/ bdag gi gnas su 'ong / re zhig 'di ni/ glo bur ba yin gyi/ 'ong du chug cig snyam mo/ /
de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis chu tshags dang lhung bzed mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste snam sbyar sbrugs nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus shing / lag pa gnyis bsnyal te tshu btsags
nas lo ma lhags pa dag blangs te 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba bya bar brtsams so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis zas kyi bya ba byas nas bsam pa/ klu gdug pa ni/ 'khrugs par ma
byas na/ 'dul ba'i gnas su mi rung bas/ 'di ni/ klu gdug pa yin pas 'khrugs par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de lhung bzed bkrus te lhung bzed kyi 'khrud ma'i chu de/ de'i rdzing der
blugs pa dang / klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa de 'khrugs nas des bsam pa/ bdag gis dge sbyong 'di 'ong ba dang / za ba yang yal bar bor na/ bdag la brnyas te bdag gi
gnas su 'khrud ma'i chu ldugs par byed pas/ dge sbyong 'di ni/ nye bar ma zhi ba zhig yin no/ /snyam nas/ de khros te steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'brug sgra
chen po phyung ste/ tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi steng du rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / 'khor lo dang / mda' bo che dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa la sogs pa mtshon cha sna tshogs
dbab par brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pas/ mtshon cha de dag lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dag
tu gyur te tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi lus la 'bab bo/ /klu a mra'i chu ngogs pas me mdag gi char dbab par brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs byams pa'i
ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pas/ me mdag de dag lha'i me tog mnad ra ba dag tu gyur te tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi lus la 'bab bo/ /klu a mra'i chu ngogs pas phyag dar gyi char

dbab par brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pas/ phyag dar de dag lha'i a ka ru'i phye ma dag dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dag dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dag
dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dag tu gyur te tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi lus la 'bab po/ /klu a mra'i chu ngogs pas khro ba'i mthus ngu ba btul ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs
kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus ngu ba btul te/ klu a mra'i chu ngogs pas khro pa'i mthus me spar ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de na
klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa'i khro ba'i mthu dang / tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus snang ba chen po byung bar gyur nas/ chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang
khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa gdul bar mdzad pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong yang dang yang du me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste/ dge
slong legs 'ongs 'di mchog yin no/ /gang gi che klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa mtshon thams cad zad par gyur pa de'i tshe na des 'bros par brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa legs
'ongs kyis kun tu me mngon par sprul nas/ klu a mra'i chu ngogs pas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi rkang pa'i drung 'ba' zhig zhi bar mthong ba ma gtogs par thams cad kun tu
'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar zhing / me lce gcig tu gyur bar mthong nas de tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la
'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa legs 'ongs/ ci'i slad du bdag la mtho 'tsham par mdzad/ rga ba'i chas can/ kho bo khyod la mtho 'tsham pa ma yin gyi/ khyod kho bo la mtho
'tsham ste/ gal te kho bos yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob par ma gyur tu zin na/ khyod kyis deng kho bo ming las lhag ma ma lus par byed par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ btsun
pa legs 'ongs/ bdag gis ci bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol/ bzhin bzang / tshur shog /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi
dag longs shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis/ klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa lhung bzed du bcug nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa de 'di lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzhin bzang / khyod re zhig nyes par spyad pas/ da
ltar dud 'gro'i skye gnas ngan par skyes shing / drag shul can/ lag pa dmar pa/ snun pa dang / rab tu snun pa la zhugs pa/ gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa/ gzhan
gyi srog gcod du 'jug pa/ gzhan gyi srog gcod pas 'tsho bar byed pa yin pas/ khyod 'di nas shi 'phos pa'i 'gro ba ni/ cir 'gyur/ skye ba ni/ cir 'gyur/ tshe
phyi ma ni/ cir 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol/ bzhin bzang / khyod tshur shog la nga'i spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba
dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dag longs la chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri ba'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la mi 'jigs pa byin cig /btsun pa/
bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dag len cing / deng slan chad nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag
rnams la mi 'jigs pa stsol to/ /de nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams bya mo lab mang po thogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la der song ste
phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/ /mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la chu srin byis pa gsod
kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa btul tam/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa ma btul te/ dge slong legs 'ongs kyis klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa btul to/ /btsun pa/ legs 'ongs gang gis/ chu
srin byis pa gsod kyi ri ba'i khyim bdag rtog ldan gyi bu legs 'ongs kyis so/ /de na kha cig gis smras pa/ bdag cag gi bu legs 'ongs yin no/ /kha cig gis smras pa/ bdag cag
gi tsha bo yin no/ /kha cig gis smras pa/ bdag cag gi zhang po yin no/ /kha cig gis smras pa/ bdag cag gi chung po grogs kyi bu yin no/ /zhes de dag gis de la bya mo lab mang
po phul lo/ /de nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo
sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas/ btsun pa legs 'ongs la brten te dgung bdun du bdag cag
gi mchod pa'i dbang du bgyis pa'i gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das kyis chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la cang mi gsung bas
gnang ngo / /de nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo
bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan nga nas dong ngo / /chu srin byi pa gsod kyi ri la khyim bdag rtog ldan gyi chung po grogs bram ze sbrul khas sdigs pa zhig 'dug pa de/ klu a mra'i
chu ngogs pa'i 'jigs pas bros te mnyan yod du song ba de/ ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis glang po che'i chang pa'i blar bskos te bzhag go /de bya ba zhig gi phyir chu srin byis
pa gsod kyi rir phyin pa dang / des ji ltar khyim bdag rtog ldan gyi bu btsun pa legs 'ongs kyis klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa btul ba thos so/ /thos nas kyang
tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas
tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la bram ze des 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa legs 'ongs kyis sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang / bram ze/ chu srin byis pa
gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis kho bo la brten nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhag bdun du mchod pa'i dbang du byas pa'i gdugs tshod la spyan drangs
kyi| mi 'tshal lo/ /bram zes smras pa/ gal te khyod kyis da mi gnang na/ gang gi tshe khyod mnyan yod du byon par gyur pa de'i tshe na khyod kyis dang po kho nar bdag gi bsod snyoms gsol
bar mdzod cig /tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis/ de ltar bya'o/ /zhes smras nas de langs te song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das chu srin byis pa gsod kyi rir ci dgyes par bzhugs
nas mnyan yod ga la de logs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod du rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin
gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das ngan spong gi bu dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan
yod du rgyal byed kyi tshal bdag gi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang mnyan yod nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang
ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab
tu dga' bar mdzad do/ /rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/
yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cad mi gsung ngo / /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol
bar ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas
sbyin gyi bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas
song ngo / /bram ze sbrul khas sdigs pa des bcom ldan 'das ngan spong gi bu dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi
tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang che dang ldan pa legs 'ongs ga la ba de song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs
kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs bram ze de la chos dang ldan pa'i
gtam gyis yang dag par ston par byed/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par byed/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par byed/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed do/ /rnam
grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas
nas cang mi smra'o/ /de nas bram ze de stan las langs te/ tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la 'di skad
ces smras so/ /btsun pa legs 'ongs kyis sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang / bram ze/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
la tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bram ze de bdag gi gan du mchis te bdag sang sdum pa gzhan du 'tshal ma la g.yar 'dren na/ mchid kyis
'tshal lam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngar mgron du bos pas bdag gir bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis/ bram ze de la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs
so| |de nas bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis cang mi smra bas dang du blangs par rig nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te tshe dang
ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi drung nas song ngo / /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa sta gon byed du bcug
nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams shing chu ra bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis/ btsun pa/ gdugs tshod gsol dgongs 'tshal na/
bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes spyan drangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs gsol/ lhung bzed dang chos gos
bsnams te dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong
gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bram ze des kyang tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi kha zas bsod pa sta gon byas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyang snga dro sham
thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas bram ze de'i bkad sa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go /de nas bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs bde
bar 'dug par rig nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kha zas bsod pas tshim par byas so/ /bram ze des bsam pa/ btsun pa legs 'ongs kyis kha zas bsod pa zos pas 'ju bar mi nus so/ /
snyam du rig nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa legs 'ongs/ rtsang nan gsol lam/ des smras pa/ 'thung ngo / /bram ze des glang po che'i chang gi nang du
mdzub mo bcug ste skom gyi nang du krog krog dkrugs te/ tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la phul lo/ /dgra bcom pa dag ni/ ma bsam par shes pa dang / mthong ba mi 'jug pas/ tshe dang
ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis de 'thungs te yon bshad pa byas nas stan las langs te song ngo / /de mnyan yod kyi srang re ldes g.yogs pa las thal nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dag gis lus la phog
pa dang / ra ro nas de chang gis myos pa'i shugs kyis de brgyal to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid can yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis der lo
ma ma yin pa'i spyil bu zhig sprul pa mdzad de bkab bo/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong ge dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs pa rig nas bca' ba dang / bza' ba
gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed/ stob par byed do/ /rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas/ bcom
ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol cing phyag bcabs/ lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan
'das khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag
par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/ /rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu
dga' bar mdzad nas yon bshad pa mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs nas phyogs der byon to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad
pa de brtul nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'di ni/ gang gis klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa btul ba'i dge slong legs 'ongs zhes bya ba de yin na/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems
dge slong legs 'ongs 'dis da ltar sbrul phrug kyang thul bar nus sam/ btsun pa/ rngo mi thogs so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na/ nyes dmigs 'di dang / gzhan dag kyang myos par 'gyur ba
'thung ba las byung bas/ dge slong dag /nga la ston pa'o/ /zhes zer ba dag gis myos par 'gyur ba/ tha na rtswa'i rtse mos kyang btung bar mi bya zing / blud par yang mi bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs sad par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/ legs 'ongs/ ci'i phyir 'di ltar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma bsam mo/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ ma bsam
mo| |de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas/ 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya

ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ 'bru'i chang dang / bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba 'thung na/ ltung byed

do| |'bru'i chang zhes bya ba ni/ chan gyi btung ba dang / phabs kyi btung ba'o/ /bcos pa'i chang zhes bya ba ni/ rtsa ba'i btung ba dang / sdong bu'i btung ba dang / 'dab ma'i btung ba dang / me tog gi btung ba dang /
'bras bu'i btung ba'o/ /de gnyis ka bsres pa ni/ 'bru'i chang dang / bcos pa'i chang zhes bya'o/ /de 'thung na zhes bya ba ni/ mgul du mid na'o/ /ltung byed do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sems can dmyal
ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/ 'tshod par byed/ ltung bar byed pa'o/ /gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so
sor ma bshags na/ dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/ des na ltung byed do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong myos par 'gyur ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa

dang | smyos par 'gyur pa'i dri dang ldan pa dang / myos par 'gyur ba'i ro dang ldan pa dang / myos par 'gyur ba'i myang ba dang ldan pa 'thung na/ 'thungs na myos par 'gyur na/ ltung byed du 'gyur la/ 'thungs

na myos par mi 'gyur na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /dge slong myos par 'gyur ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa dang / myos par 'gyur ba'i dri dang ldan pa dang / myos par 'gyur ba'i ro dang ldan pa 'thung na/ 'thungs
nas myos par 'gyur na/ ltung byed du 'gyur la/ 'thungs nas myos par mi 'gyur na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /dge slong myos par 'gyur ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa dang / myos par 'gyur

ba'i dri dang ldan pa 'thung na/ 'thungs nas myos par 'gyur na ltung byed du 'gyur la/ 'thungs nas myos par mi 'gyur na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /myos par 'gyur ba'i kha dog 'ba' zhig ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa

'thung ba la ni ltung ba med do/ /de yang tshwa nyid du gyur ba'o/ /dge slong 'bru'i chang 'thung na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /bcos pa'i chang 'thung na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'bru'i chang dang bcos pa'i chang 'thung na

ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong 'bru'i chang gi nu rdzi 'thung na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong sbang ma za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong tshigs ma za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong phabs kyi chang bu za na nyes

byas su 'gyur ro/ /dge slong me tog dang 'bras bu myos par 'gyur ba dag za na nyes su 'gyur ro/ /bskol ba 'thung ba dang / kha'i nad yod pa la sman pa'i lung gis khur bar bsrel ba dang / lus dag skud pa

la ltung ba med do/ /las dang po pa dang / myos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug pa/ nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes/ las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas/ mu lto

ba rnams kyi nang du zhugs shing nyes 'ongs zhes bgyi ba'i ming du gyur/ las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom

pa nyid mngon du bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /rigs kyi bu legs 'ongs nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su sgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung
bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas/ legs 'ongs nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi
sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags
pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ /chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/ /rnyed na lus can
rnams la ni/ /'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri brag cig na khyim bdag phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba zhig 'dug pa de/
'khor dang bcas te skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ngo / /sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang / bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la
dga' ba/ bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo / /rang sangs rgyas na ba zhig ri brag der bsod snyoms la zhugs
pa dang / khyim bdag des rang sangs rgyas de thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas/ de zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /rab tu byung ba 'di skrod cig /de dag las 'ga' yang
rang sangs rgyas de skrod par spro ba med nas/ khyim bdag des spyos te stan las langs te rang nyid kyis rang sangs rgyas de'i gnya' ba nas bzung ste bskrad nas smras pa/ nyes 'ongs/ mu lto ba rnams
kyi nang du zhugs shig ces phul ba dang / de phyag dar gyi phung po'i nang du bsgyel to/ /rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po des bsam pa/ khyim bdag nyon mongs pa 'di ha cang smras pa dang nyams
bar gyur na/ mi rung gi /'di la lag nas drang pa sbyin no/ /snyam nas/ des ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang / gsal
ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/ /so so'i skye bo ni/ rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod par byed pa yin pas/ khyim bdag de shing
ljon pa rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas de'i rkang pa gnyis kyi drung du 'gyel nas smras pa/ yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa mar gshegs su gsol/ mar gshegs su
gsol/ nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba bdag gi sug pa nas drang ba stsal du gsol/ rang sangs rgyas de khyim bdag de la rjes su snying brtse ba'i phyir steng gi nam mkha' las shod du babs so/ /khyim
bdag des de la mchod pa byas nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smon lam 'di skad ces/ bdag yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i cha dang
mthun par ma gyur par mchod pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skye zhing / 'di pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par
byed cing / thugs byung bar mi byed pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu thob par gyur cig /ces smon lam btab bo/ /dge slong dag /de la de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag gang yin pa de ni/ legs
'ongs 'di yin te/ 'dis rang sangs rgyas de la mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/ da ltar phyug la nor mang ba longs spyod che ba'i khyim du
skyes so/ /gnod pa byas pa dang / nyes 'ongs zhes brjod pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin bas ni/ bskal par sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gdungs nas las de nyid kyi

lhag mas tshe rabs lnga brgyar mu lto pa nyid kyis 'phyan par gyur cing / nyes 'ongs zhes bya bar gyur te/ da ltar gyi bar du yang mu lto ba rnams kyi nang du zhugs shing / nyes 'ongs zhes bya ba'i ming du
gyur to/ /bdag yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i cha dang mthun par ma gyur par 'di bas ches khyad par du 'phags
pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing / thugs byung bar mi byed pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu thob par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ nga'i bstan pa la
rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas shing / 'dis rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas
shing thugs byung bar ma byas so/ /btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dang yang du me'i khams la
snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan/ de yang smon lam gyi dbang gis te/ gang du smon lam btab ce na/ dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa chen po bzang
po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen

pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'jig rten du byung ste/ de wA ra NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na nye
bar brten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas dge slong gang gis de rab tu byung ba'i dge slong de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
'od srung gis yang dang yang du me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/ /de na 'dis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob
nas/ de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam 'di skad ces/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung la

tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na/ yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob ste/ bdag gis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye rgu'i tshe lo brgya thub par gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed cing / ji
ltar mkhan po 'di/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis yang dang yang du me'i khams la snyoms par
'jug pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/ shAkya seng ge /shAkya'i rgyal po'i gtso bo des/ yang dang yang du me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug pa
rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig /ces gdab par brtsams pas/ smon lam de'i dbang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas yang dang yang du me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
kyi mchog tu bstan to/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ gcig tu nag pa rnams yin la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par
smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin/ las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu nag pa rnams dang / 'dren ma rnams

spangs te/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la stsal par bya ste/ dge slong dag /khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /myos par 'gyur ba 'thung ba'i ltung byed de/ bdun cu dgu pa rdzogs so// //bar sdom la/ zhi pa ral ba nor bu dang / /sman pa dge 'dun lto dang skras/ /za dang gnyis gyur gtum mo dang / /gzhon nu lhung bzed stobs rnams so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan

yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /ri brag cig na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des/ mnyan yod pa'i bu mo zhig bag mar blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/

dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de la bu mo zhig byung nas de bsrings shing bskyed de chen mor gyur to/ /bram ze de la re zhig mnyan yod du bya ba zhig byung nas/ des shing rta bcas te 'phags pa
dang / bu mo des mthong nas des smras pa/ yab/ gar bzhud/ bram zes smras pa/ bu mo/ mnyan yod du'o/ /bu mos smras pa/ yab/ bdag kyang mchi'o/ /bram zes smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod da mchog thob pa yin
pas/ khyod kyi lag pa'am/ rkang pa la 'ga' zhig gis reg par gyur na/ bdag cag la mi snyan par 'gyur gyi/ khyod 'di nyid na 'dug cig /bu mo des ngu bar brtsams pa dang / bram ze mos smras
pa/ bu mo/ ci'i phyir du/ bu mos smras pa/ yab mnyan yod du bzhud nas bdag der khrid par mi bzhed do/ /bram ze mos smras pa/ rje'i sras/ bu mo yang khrid cig dang / nye du dag mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /
bram zes smras pa/ bu mo da mchog 'thob par 'gyur bas/ 'di'i lag ba'am/ rkang pa la 'ga' zhig gis reg par gyur na/ bdag cag la mi snyan par 'gyur gyi/ 'di nyid du zhog cig /bram
ze mos smras pa/ rje'i sras dang thabs cig mchi na/ legs par spas pa dang / legs par srung bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze des bu mo de shing rtar bcug ste 'phags pa dang / bu mo de ltad mo'i rang bzhin can
yin pas/ pha la dris pa/ yab/ 'di su'i kun dga' ra ba lags/ 'di su'i rdzing bu lags/ 'di su'i lha khang lags/ 'di su'i skyed mos tshal lags/ 'di su'i khron
pa lags/ 'di su'i gtsug lag khang lags/ bram zes smras pa/ bu mo/ 'di ni shA kya'i bu dge spyod rnams kyi bsti gnas yin no/ /bu mos smras pa/ yab/ bltar mchi'o/ /bram zes smras pa/ bu
mo/ bsti gnas 'di na rigs sna tshogs dang / rus sna tshogs las rab tu byung ba dag 'khod pas/ khyod kyi lag pa'am/ rkang pa la 'ga' zhig gis reg par gyur na/ bdag la mi snyan par
'gyur gyi/ tshur shog /'dong ngo / /zhes de 'phags pa dang / ji tsam na grong bar de nyid nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po gtsug lag khang lta 'dod pa dag mnyan yod kyi phyi
rol du byung ba de dag gis/ bram ze de mthong nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ snum zung byon pa legs so/ /byon pa legs so/ /khyod yun ring mo ring mo zhig gis gar bzhud/ bram zes smras pa/ kho
bo khyed cag nyid bltar 'ongs na/ khyed cag gar 'dong / rgyal byed kyi tshal du gtsug lag khang bltar mchi'o/ /sru cag /tsha mo 'di yang khrid de dengs la 'di la yang gtsug lag khang ston cig

bu mo de yang de dag dang lhan cig rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo / /drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni/ 'dir bdag cag gis bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la yang chos bstan par

bya| rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/ rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya'o/ /snyam pas/ drug sde dag las gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char

ka nang par sngar langs te so shing bor nas snam sbyar dmar ser gyon te/ rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug go /drug sde dag gis grong khyer chen po drug po dag na 'khod pa'i mi rnams 'di lta ste/
rigs las sam/ rus las sam/ rgyud las sam/ ming las sam/ gzugs las sam/ bzo las sam/ 'tsho ba las mi shes pa'am/ ma mthong ba'am/ ma thos pa'am/ ma rig
pa'am/ rnam par mi shes pa 'ga' yang med pas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po de dag thag ring po kho na nas mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang 'di skad

ces smras so/ /che ge mo'i ma/ che ge mo'i chung ma/ che ge mo'i mna' ma/ che ge mo'i bu mo/ che ge mo'i sring mo/ 'ongs pa legs so/ /'ongs pa legs so/ /khyed cag ci'i phyir yun ring mo ring mo nas zla
ba ltar rgyu bar byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das kyis mi khom pa brgyad ni/ gang zag gis tshangs par spyad pa'i dus ma lags so/ /zhes legs par rab tu gsungs
na/ bdag cag ni/ 'di lta ste/ khyim gyi 'du 'dzi dang ldan pas mi khom pa dgu pa lags so/ /'char kas smras pa/ sring mo dag /khyed kyis 'ga' zhig 'di skad ces/ dug can la sogs rgyal po
yis| |bya ba dag ni ma byas par/ /de dag nyid dang bya ba rnams/ /zhig pa nyid du gyur pa yin/ /bya ba de dag nyid kyang ni/ /yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ /'jig
rten dgra bo 'chi bdag de/ /'ongs pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ /zhes smras pa ma thos sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka/ de'i slad du bdag cag skyed mos tshal du mchis te rgyal byed
kyi tshal du 'jug pa dang / gtsug lag khang blta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i slad du mchis lags so/ /'char
kas smras pa/ sring mo dag /gal te khyed cag de'i phyir 'ongs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pas legs so/ /legs so/
sring mo dag /de ni/ 'jal gyi/ 'di ltar/ ltad mo ji ltar blta bar dri bar bya'o/ /sring mo dag /khyed cag gang du 'jug par byed/ btsun pa 'char ka /bdag cag kun dga' ra bar 'jug cing
gtsug lag khang blta bar 'tshal lo/ /sring mo dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mkhas pa gang zhig rab tu sems dang bas/ /sangs rgyas mchod rten dag la gom 'dor na/ dzam+bu chu bo'i gser
ltar srang tshad ni/ /stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min/ /zhes gsungs pas de yang legs so/ /sring mo dag /khyed kyis gang khyed cag gtsug lag khang ston par byed pa'i dge slong 'ga' zhig
btsal tam/ 'phags pa/ ci bdag cag sgron ma sug pa na thogs bzhin du zhugs gzhan du tshol lam/ btsun pa 'char ka spangs te dge slong gzhan ga la tshol/ khyod pas gzhan khyad par 'phags
pa su zhig mchis kyi/ khyod nyid kyis bstan du gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te 'di dag gtsug lag khang bstan par bya na ni/ bdag gi dge ba'i phyogs yongs su
nyams par yang 'gyur/ gal te bstan par mi bya na ni/ tshig pa'i bsod snyoms kyang ster bar mi 'gyur la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ma dad pa rnams dad pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du
gzhug par bya/ gdul bar bya/ gzung bar bya/ rab tu dgod par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pas/ de'i phyir 'di dag dge ba la nges par sbyar bar bya'i/ /rnam pa thams cad du bstan par bya'o/ /snyam du rig
nas des me tog dang / bdug spos la sogs pa mchod pa sna tshogs thogs te pog phor lag tu blangs nas go rim ji lta ba bzhin du bstan par brtsams te/ sring mo dag /'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
dri gtsang khang ste/ gang du bcom ldan 'das nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas gang ni/ nyams par gyur/ gang
ni/ 'phel bar gyur/ gang ni/ gnod par gyur/ gang ni/ nyam nga par gyur/ gang ni/ mi bde bar gyur/ gang ni/ gnod pa dang / nyam nga ba dang / mi bde bar gyur/ gang ni/ ngan song la gzhol/ gang
ni| ngan song la 'bab/ gang ni/ ngan song la bab/ gang ni/ ngan song gi 'dam nas bslangs te mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ 'dod pa'i
'dam du bying ba gang gi lag nas ni/ drang bar bya/ 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbyig dang bral ba gang ni/ 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug la gzhag par bya/ gang gi sangs rgyas 'byung bas
brgyan pa'i 'jig rten ni/ 'bras bu dang bcas par bya/ gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ma skyes pa ni/ bskyed par bya/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa gang ni/ yongs su smin par bya/ yongs su
smin pa gang ni/ rnam par grol bar bya zhes mkhyen pa dang / gzigs pa 'jug cing / 'di ltar/ chu srin gnas kyi dug can pa/ /dus las 'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi/ /sangs rgyas gdul
la byams pa ni/ /dus las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar ma ni bu sdug gcig pu la/ /rtog cing de srog srung bar byed pa ltar/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'ang gdul ba'i skye bo la/ /rtog
par mdzad cing de srog srung bar mdzad/ /kun mkhyen rgyud la mnga' ba'i thugs rje yi/ /bzhon ma gdul ba'i be'u tshol mi skyo ste/ /srid dang ngan 'gros nyams la byams pa ni/ /rab nyams
be'u la byams pa'i ba bzhin no/ /zhes bya ba 'jug pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' ba/ 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyi/ 'di'i zhabs la phyag
dag tshol cig /'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya'i gtsug lag khang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten mi shes pa'i mun pa dang / 'dren pa med pa dang / yongs su 'dren pa med pa
na/ de'i dang por ye shes kyi mag sman gyi thur mas/ gang gi chos kyi mig rnam par sbyangs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rnams dang / rgyal tshab lta bu rnams dang / yun ring po nas rab tu byung

ba rnams dang / tshangs par spyod pa mngon par spyad pa rnams dang / snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan pa gang yin pa/ gang gi rgyud la de'i dang por bcom ldan 'das kyis

'jig rten du dge slong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ sus kyang chos dang mthun par bskor mi nus pa/ chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'gro ba mang po'i don dang / skye bo mang
po la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / 'jig rten la rjes su thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir lan gsum du bzlas te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba de'i
yin gyi/ 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig /'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po'i gtsug lag khang ste/ bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu rmon pa dor stong tu gcig gis mchog pa spangs
te rab tu byung ba/ dbyig bye ba phrag drug cu dang ldan pa/ gser nas bang chung brgyad cu bdog pa/ bran gyi grong bco brgyad bdog pa/ sbyor ba'i grong bcu drug bdog pa/ ser
skya bzang mo lus gser bas lhag pa dang ldan pa/ mchil ma'i thal ba smin pa ltar spangs te mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la ras sbyar ma'i snam sbyar rin thang 'bum ri ba thogs te/ 'jig rten na dgra bcom
pa gang dag bzhugs pa de dag gi phyir rab tu byung ba bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed pa'i phyir nags na brtan pa gang yin pa/ gang mthong
na spos kyi glang po che dag kyang rgyags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba gang gi bu mang gi mchod rten du ston par khas blangs nas dge slong gi sdom pa thob pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong dag/
nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong 'dod pa chung ba/ chog shes pa/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan smra ba rnams kyi nang na/ mchog ni/ 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong 'od srung chen po'o/ /zhes gsungs
shing / bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bsngags pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyi/ 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig/ 'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gtsug lag khang ste/ mchog thob
pa'i bu gang yin pa gang lo brgyad gnyis su dbang po'i brda sprod pa bklags pa/ rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
shes rab chen po rnams dang / spobs pa chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten thams cad gang gi cha bcu drug par bzhag cing / bcom ldan 'das kyis/
de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par/ /'jig rten kun gyi shes rab gang / /shA ri'i bu yi shes rab kyi/ /bcu drug char yang mi chog go /gal te lha bcas 'jig rten 'di/ /shA ri'i bu dang mnyam
gyur pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi/ /bcu drug char yang mi chog go /zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyi/ 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig /'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal

gyi bu chen po'i gtsug lag khang ste/ mdun na 'don gyi bu cod pan med pa'i rgyal srid spangs te rab tu byung ba gang yin pa/ gang gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzang rnam par rgyal byed rkang pa
g.yas pa'i mthe bos lan gsum du bsgul/ kun tu bsgul/ kun tu rab tu bsgul ba/ gang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du nyin mtshan bdun gyis
gshegs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang / mthu chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyi/ 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig /'di ni/
tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gag pa'i gtsug lag khang ste/ mi skal pa bzang po las rab tu byung ba gang yin pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi yab kyi mched kyi sras/ gang gi ming yang dag par bsgrags pas tshong
pa dag rgya mtsho chen po nas bzhon pa'i snod legs par grub cing 'ong bar 'gyur ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i mig can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i
yin gyi/ 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig /'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i gtsug lag khang ste/ yun ring po nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnyen bkur ba gang yin pa/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring na nye bar spyod pa/ ston pas yang dag par bsngags pa/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams kyis yang dag par bkur ba gang yin pa/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi yab kyi mched kyi sras las rab tu byung ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa rnams dang / thos pa 'dzin pa rnams dang / thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa
gang yin pa de'i yin gyi/ 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig /'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa mdzes dga'i gtsug lag khang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung po sru'i sras las rab tu
byung ba/ gal te rab tu ma byung na stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu byung / dbang po dag gi sgo bsdams pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa
gang yin pa de'i yin gyi/ 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig /'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyi gtsug lag khang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sras las rab tu byung ba/

gal te rab tu ma byung na/ mthu dang ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ba gang yin pa/ gang rab tu byung bas rgyal po mang pos bkur gyi rgyud gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang dag par rgyud chad pa/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bslab pa 'dod pa rnams dang / bslab pa la gus pa rnams dang / bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa thob pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyi/ 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol

cig /'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'i gtsug lag khang ngo / /'di ni/ nye dga'i 'o/ /'di ni/ 'dun pa'i 'o/ /'di ni/ 'gro mgyogs kyi'o/ /'di ni/ nab so'i 'o/ /'di ni/ kho bo'i gtsug lag khang ngo / /
ci| 'di yang blta bar byed dam/ 'phags pa/ ci bdag cag gi gtsug lag khang thams cad bltas nas/ gdod 'phags pa 'char ka'i gtsug lag khang blta bar mi bgyi'am/ bdag cag gis
'phags pa 'char ka'i gtsug lag khang 'di dag shin tu blta bar bgyi'o/ /sring mo dag /de bzhin gyis shig /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de 'dod chags spyad pa yin pas de'i gtsug lag khang gi
gzhi mon sran gre'u'i phye mas bskus pa dang / rtsig pa bkra zhing nye bar bkra ba dang / mal stan be'u phrug gi snying po can bshams pa dang / bum pa btung bas bkang ba bcu snod dang bcas pa bzhag

pa dang / skon pa'i nang na bca' ba sna tshogs kyis gang ba dag yod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze dang khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po rang gi gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa rnams la smras
pa| sring mo dag /ci je khye'u sus bya'am/ 'on te btung ba 'thung / 'phags pa/ ci chu klung zlog phyogs su 'bab bab/ bdag cag gis 'phags pa la gsol bar bgyi ba
gang lags pa de nyid 'phags pas bdag cag la stsol tam/ 'di ltar/ bdag cag la gang dkon pa de stsol cig /sring mo dag /khyed cag la ci zhig dkon/ 'phags pa/ chos mnyan pa'o/ /
sring mo dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas drug po dag 'jig rten du byung ba ni/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yin te/ drug po de dag gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba dang / mi nyid dang / dbus pa'i gnas su skye ba dang / dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang / dge ba'i chos la 'dun
pa'o/ /zhes legs par gsungs pas/ de'i phyir khyed cag dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa skyes pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra ste/ legs so/ /legs so/ /sring mo dag 'khod cig dang /
kho bo khyed la chos bstan par bya'o/ /de dag gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod pa dang / des de dag la chos bstan par brtsams so// //
'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po re drug pa/ bu mo de yang ltad mo'i rang bzhin can yin pas ri mo blta zhing gzhan du song ngo / /de dag gis kyang chos mnyan nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang

pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te gtsug lag khang nas byung ngo / /bu mo des gzhan dag byung ba tshor nas sgo khang de nyid na ri mo blta zhing 'dug go /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de dag bskyal nas gtsug lag khang du

'jug par brtsams pa dang / des bu mo de sgo khang na 'dug pa mthong nas des de la smras pa/ bu mo khyod ma song ngam/ des 'dzum phyung ba dang / 'char kas de la 'o byas te yan lag dang nying lag dag mnams kun

tu mnams so/ /bu mo de ngu zhing phyir byung nas pha'i gan du song ste smras pa/ yab/ bdag dge sbyong 'char kas gzhon nu ma dang bral bar bgyis so/ /bram ze des bsam pa/ gal te da cung zad smrar ni/ bdag
gcig pu yin la/ 'di dag ni/ mang bas bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yong bar 'gyur gyi/ gang du grogs rnyed par gyur pa na ra mda' bzlog par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /rgyal

byed kyi tshal dang mnyan yod kyi bar na gnas kyi shing ljon pa zhig yod pa de'i drung na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jug cing 'dug nas bram ze des/ de dag la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /

dge sbyong 'char kas kho bo'i bu mo gzhon nu ma dang bral bar byas kyi/ khyed cag kho bo'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyi/ grogs gyis shig /bram ze dag ni/ yongs su mi rtog pa yin pas de dag dbyug

pa dag thogs te der dong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug pa de dag gis bzung zhing bkri bar brtsams pa dang / de dag gis de bsgul bar yang ma nus so/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas de'i stobs dbri bar mdzad pa dang / de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka phar drangs/ tshur drangs te khrid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
'char kas bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gnod pa dang / nyam nga ba dang / mi bde ba byung ba la mi dgongs so/ /snyam pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ 'di la gdams
pa'i tha ma 'di yin pas khrid kyang bla'o/ /snyam du dgongs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs pa na gnyid log
cing 'dug pa se gol gyi sgras sad par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis gya tsom du mi bya bar legs par brtag par bya'o/ /zhes go bar mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs pa na gnyid log cing 'dug pa lan gnyis lan gsum du se gol gyi sgras sad par mdzad nas bka'
stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis gya tsom du mi bya bar legs par brtag par bya'o/ /zhes go bar mdzad do/ /bram ze de dag gis kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor

khrid do/ /de na rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dag bram ze rnams kyis dge sbyong 'char ka bzung ste rgyal po'i sgor khrid de 'ongs so/ /zhes sgra mthon po dang / sgra chen po 'byin

to| |ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs pa na gnyid log pa skye bo phal po che'i tshogs des sad nas des zho shas 'tsho ba dag la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ci'i

phyir skye bo phal po che'i tshogs 'di dag sgra mthon po dang / sgra chen po 'byin par byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ btsun pa 'char ka dang / bram ze'i bu mo zhig dang / bram ze zhig dang / bram ze'i khye'u lnga

brgya tsam rgyal po'i pho brang gi chab sgo na blag cor mchi zhing mchis so/ /ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di la dgongs nas bdag la rgyal po chen po/ khyod

kyis gya tsom du mi bya bar legs par brtag par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /snyam du rig go /mnyan yod na chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe rtsod pa chen po byung ba de'i tshe na rnga bo che rdung zhing / dung sgril ma yang

'bud par byed pas/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis zho shas 'tsho ba dag la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /rnga bo che yang rdung zhig /dung sgril ma yang bus shig /de dag gis rnga bo che brdungs shing dung sgril ma
bus pa dang / rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor 'dus par gyur to/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ bram ze de dang / btsun pa 'char ka nang du thong zhig /de gnyis nang du 'ongs pa dang / rgyal pos bram ze de
la smras pa/ bram ze/ khyed ci zer/ lha/ dge sbyong 'char kas bdag gi bu mo zhig gzhon nu ma dang bral bar bgyis so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka/ bram ze 'di de skad mchi na/
khyod ci gsung / lha/ bdag gis de la sdig pa'i las ma bgyis so/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'di ji ltar dpyad par bya/ blon po rnams
kyis smras pa/ lha/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod nyid spobs pa can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags pas/ lha nyid kyi zhal mchu 'di dgum du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'di
la ji ltar shes pas ni/ gzugs dag mthong mod/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyis ni/ bu mo brtag mod/ bu mo de btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du thong la brtag tu chug cig /de dag gis bu mo de btsun mo'i

'khor gyi nang du btang ba dang / btsun mo phreng ldan mas bu mo de pang bar bsnyal te smras pa/ bu mo/ bden par smros shig /gal te khyod btsun pa 'char kas gzhon nu ma dang bral bar byas na yang / de ni/ bram

ze mdun na 'don gyi bu las rab tu byung ba yin pas/ khyod kyi khyim thab kyi thab rir 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /'on te khyod phyug chung ma rmas pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin na ni/ dge slong la yang dag pa ma
yin pas bskur na/ sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /bu mo des smras pa/ rje mo/ bdag des gzhon nu ma dang bral bar ma bgyis te/ 'di ltar des 'o bgyis shing / yan lag dang /

nyid lag dag kun tu mnams so/ /btsun mo phreng ldan mas smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyis don de tsam zhig la rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor kun tu dkrugs so/ /ci/ pha dag kyang bu mo dag la 'o byed cing / yan

lag dang / nying lag drag la mi nom mam/ kun tu mi nom mam/ de nas bud med rgan mo rnams kyis bu mo de brtag na/ ji tsam na phyug chung ma nyams par 'gyur nas de dag gis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ bu mo
'di phyug chung ma nyams so/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'di la gang yus/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ btsun pa 'char ka yus so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes

ldan dag /dengs la bram ze 'di rgya skegs kyi khang par chug la/ mes sregs shig /bu mo de yang rte'u dmu rgod kyi rkang pa gnyis la thogs shig /bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag kyang lag pa dang / rkang pa
dag chod cig /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ lha/ gal te bdag la brten te sems can de snyed cig chab stsal bar gyur na/ don gyis lhas bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa las phyung lags

so| |rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'o na dengs la bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag thong la/ bram ze 'di ni/ rgya skegs kyi khang par chug la mes sregs shig /bu mo de yang rte'u dmu rgod kyi rkang pa
gnyis la thogs shig /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ lha/ gal te bdag la brten te tha na grog ma phra mo 'ga' zhig la gnod par gyur na yang don gyis lhas bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa
las phyung ba kho na lags so/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'dod chags dang ma bral na yang so sor rtog pa'i stobs la ltos/ gal te bram ze
dag gis btsun pa 'char ka thub par gyur na ni/ rdo gcig gis kyang gsod par 'gyur ro/ /shes ldan dag /dengs la thams cad khye zhig /de dag bkye nas 'gyes

rnga brdungs shing yol bas bcad pa dang / skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dag so sor gyes so/ /rgyal po dang / btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka gsum 'dug pa na/ rgyal pos btsun mo
phreng ldan ma la smras pa/ phreng ldan ma/ btsun pa 'char kas ji ltar bu'i phan phun byas pas rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor kun tu dkrugs pa la ltos/ btsun mo phreng ldan mas tshe dang ldan pa
'char ka la smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka/ khyod pas slad kyis rab tu byung ba dge slong ma ut+pa la'i mdog dang / dge tshul ma skul byed dang / dge tshul ma ci ri ka dang / gzhan yang mang po gang
lags pa de dag thams cad kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bgyis na/ khyod kyis ni/ rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyi nang du mi mdzes pa 'di lta bu bgyis par

gyur kyang da dung skyo ba mi mnga'am/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ phreng ldan ma/ da phyin chad 'khor bar 'khor ba na nyon mongs pa de lta bu dag kun tu spyod par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o/ /zhes

smras nas de stan las langs te song ngo / /de ngo tsha bas bcom ldan 'das dang 'phrad par ma nus nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces
smras so/ /mkhan po/ ji ltar bdag 'khor bar 'khor ba na nyon mongs pa de lta bu dag kun tu spyod par mi 'gyur pa de ltar bdag la chos bstan du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsam
pa| ltung ba lhag ma med pa byung bar ma gyur tam snyam na/ ji tsam na des lhag ma yod par mthong nas/ des de bshags par bya ba'i ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang 'chags su bcug /bsdam
par bya ba'i ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang sdom du bcug nas des de la 'di dang 'di ltar yid la gyis la bag yod pas sgrubs shig /ces gdams ngag byin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char
ka gcig pu dben pa/ bag yod pa/ rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid btang bar gnas pa na/ rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar

dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de/ tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas/ bdag gi skye ba zad
do| |tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /bya ba byas so/ /srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so/ /zhes go bar byed cing / dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser
du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan bzhag pa lta bu/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing / rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang
dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang / 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang / bku sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /

rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dgra bcom pa nyid thob cing rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba nyams su myong ba na/ 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom
ldan 'das ni/ bdag la phan pa mdzad pa/ bde bar gshegs pa ni/ bdag la legs par mdzad pa ste/ 'di ltar/ bcom ldan 'das de ni/ bdag gi sdug bsngal gyi chos mang po dag sel
bar mdzad pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni/ bdag gi bde ba'i chos mang po dag sgrub par mdzad pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni/ bdag gi mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma dag sel bar mdzad pa/ bcom ldan
'das de ni/ bdag gi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma dag sgrub par mdzad pa lags na/ bdag gis ci zhig byas na/ des bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan byas pa dang / nye bar byas pa dang / rab tu
byas par 'gyur snyam nas/ des yang bsam pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ dka' ba mdzad pa brgya stong du ma dag gis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug
yongs su rdzogs pa mdzad nas bla na med pa'i mkhyen pa thugs su chud pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni/ sems can la phan pa'i phyir yin pas/ bdag gis kyang sems can la phan pa bya'o/ /snyam mo//
des bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa 'ga' yod dam snyam na/ des ji tsam na med par mthong ngo / /su la ltos snyam na/ bdag nyid la ltos par
mthong nas/ legs kyi/ bdag gis ston pa'i thugs la dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na/ mnyan yod na bram ze zhi ba la dad pa/ zhi ba la bsnyen bkur
byed pa zhig 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ bram ze de 'dul ba'i dus yin no/ /snyam nas de de'i gan du song ba dang / bram ze des kyang zhi ba la bsnyen bkur byas nas/ kye bram ze bram
