ze zhes bram ze tshol bar byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ kho bo bram ze yin no/ /des smras pa/ bram ze ni/ thor tshugs can gyi khyod ni/ dge sbyong mgo reg yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char
kas smras pa/ 'di ltar/ kho bo bram ze yin zhing / kho bo'i ston pa yang bram ze'i mchog yin na/ khyod ni/ zhi ba 'di la mngon par dad dam/ des smras pa/ mngon par dad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char

kas smras pa/ kwa'i zhi ba smros shig /ji ltar kho bo bram ze yin zhing kho bo'i ston pa yang bram ze'i mchog yin nam/ zhi bas smras pa/ 'phags pa 'char ka/ de de bzhin te/ khyod ni/ bram ze lags shing / khyod
kyi ston pa yang bram ze'i mchog lags so/ /bram ze des bsam pa/ bdag gis yun ring po nas zhi ba la bsnyen bkur byas na/ 'dis lan 'ga' rmi lam du yang ma bstan na/ btsun pa 'char kas
smras pa la tshig smra bar byed pas/ kye ma btsun pa 'char ka ni/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba yin no/ /snyam nas/ des smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka/ /ci'i slad du byon/ khyod
nyid 'dul ba'i don du'o/ /btsun pa 'char ka /de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de nyid du 'dug ste zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang / bram ze de

chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du ches mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di

ltar| bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar
chos bstan to/ /des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la
phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams
pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang thar

pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bas
pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag
ni| mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad nas

ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /btsun pa 'char kas/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang / na bza' dang / gnas mal dang / snyung ba'i rkyen dang /
sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes bar ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ rab tu byung ba ni/ gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/ bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa
bya dgos so/ /zhes smras te/ dang du ma blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim dang po gnyis ka nas btul cing bzhag go /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam
pa/ gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na/ mnyan yod na bram ze zhi ba la dad pa/ zhi ba la bsnyen bkur byed pa zhig 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ bram ze de 'dul ba'i dus yin no/ /snyam
nas/ de de'i gan du song ba dang / bram ze des kyang zhi ba la bsnyen bkur byas nas/ kye bram ze bram ze zhes bram ze tshol bar byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ kho bo bram

ze yin no/ /des smras pa/ mgo reg 'di lta bu bram ze ga la yin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ bram ze ji lta bu yin/ des smras pa/ bram ze ni/ ral pa can yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ral
pa can du sprul pa dang / ji tsam na/ bram ze de ngo mtshar skyes nas/ des smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka /ci'i slad du byon/ khyod nyid 'dul ba'i don du'o/ /btsun pa 'char ka /de'i slad du 'di
nyid du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka der 'dug ste zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang / bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos
mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas/ 'di ltar bram ze de chung ma dang bcas bas
stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/ /des
bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la
phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa

dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag dag gis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag
ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags
pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/ btsun pa 'char ka/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun
pa| bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan
chad nas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang / na bza' dang / gnas mal dang /
snyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ rab tu byung ba ni/ gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/ bram
ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so/ /zhes smras te/ dang du ma blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim gnyis pa gnyi ga
nas btul cing bzhag go /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na/ mnyan yod na bram ze ser sna can zhig 'dug pa de'i chung ma nor bu la dga' nas/ tshe
dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ bram ze de 'dul ba'i dus yin no/ /snyam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nor bu mkhan gyi cha lugs su byas te de'i khyim du song nas nor bu su nyo/ /nor
bu su nyo/ /zhes byas pa dang / bram ze mo des thos nas des smras pa/ nor bu dag rin ji tsam du 'tshong / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ nor bu 'di dag rin che mod kyi/ 'on kyang rin
chung ngu'i phyir sbyin no/ /zhes tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas nor bu mkhan gyi cha lugs mi snang bar byas te rang gi cha lugs kyis 'dug pa dang / bram ze de ngo mtshar skyes nas des smras pa/ btsun
pa 'char ka /ci'i slad du 'dir byon/ khyod nyid 'dul ba'i don du'o/ /btsun pa 'char ka /de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas der
'dug ste zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang / bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag la

nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas/ 'di ltar/ bram ze chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom
ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/ /des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char
kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge
sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni/
bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du ni/
bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
ni/ thob ste/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi
dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /btsun
pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang / na bza' dang / gnas mal dang / snyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas
smras pa/ rab tu byung ba ni/ gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/ bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan par bya dgos so/ /zhes smras te/ dang du ma blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan
pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze khyim gsum pa gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhag go /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na/ mnyan yod na bram ze nad pa zhig 'dug
pa de/ sman pa dag gis sman kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba dag gis yid byung nas/ des sgo ba la khyod kyis sman pa 'ga' yang nang du ma gtang zhig ces bsgos nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas
bsam pa/ bram ze de 'dul ba'i dus yin no/ /snyam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka sman pa'i cha lugs su byas te bram ze de'i khyim sgor sman pa 'ongs so/ /zhes byas te bsdad pa dang / sgo bas
smras pa/ kho bo la bram zes/ khyod kyis sman pa 'ga' yang nang du ma gtang zhig /ces sgo ba kho bo de nyid kyi phyir bzhag go /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ khyod song la bram ze la sman pa

'ongs te/ de na re/ sman pa nga sman mi sbyin/ bya dga' yang mi slong bar gsang sngags dag gis sos par bya'o/ /zhes zer ro/ /zhes gyis shig /sgo ba song ste bram ze de la de skad rgyas par brjod pa dang / des

smras pa/ nang du thong zhig /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nang du zhugs nas des gsang sngags dag gis de sos par byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas sman pa'i cha lugs mi snang bar byas te rang gi cha lugs
kyis 'dug pa dang / bram ze de do mtshar skyes nas des smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka /ci'i slad du 'dir byon/ khyod nyid 'dul ba'i don du'o/ /btsun pa 'char ka /de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs te

zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka der 'dug ste zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang / bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas tshe dang
ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar/ bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i
ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/ /des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes
gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis
kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma
bgyis te/ khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud
'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse
mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags
te| btsun pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba
thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang / na bza' dang / gnas mal dang / snyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad
dag bzhes par ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ rab tu byung ba ni/ gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/ bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya
dgos so/ /zhes smras te/ dang du ma blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim bzhi pa gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhag go /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ gang
'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na/ mnyan yod na bram ze phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ ser sna can/ mig phra ba/ bya rog la yang gtor ma mi ster ba/
yo byad kun tu 'dzin pa zhig 'dug pa de/ sgo drung na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam bram ze'i gsang tshig dag klog tu 'jug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ bram ze de 'dul ba'i dus yin
no| |snyam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'dul ba la ltos pas yang dang yang du der bsod snyoms la bzhugs nas/ des der lan 'ga' yang bsod snyoms ma thob nas/ de de nas phyir byung
ba bram ze des mthong nas/ des smras pa/ kye dge sbyong / khyed yang dang yang du der 'jug na/ rnyed pa cung zad yod dam/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i dad pa'i nor las bsam ste smras pa/ bram ze
khyod nyid la yang med na/ ci zhig sbyin par byed/ bram ze des spyos te smras pa/ dge sbyong khyod khyim mi dang bcas pa thams cad la sbyin par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas thabs yin no/ /
zhes smras te song ngo / /de na bram ze'i khye'u dge slong gi rgyus shes pa zhig gis bram ze de la smras pa/ mkhan pos/ de dag gis thabs yin no/ /zhes bgyis pa de'i don ci lags mkhyen tam
des smras pa/ mi shes so/ /skol gyis dang du blang ngo / /zhes smras pa gang lags pa de'i don ni/ de dag gis thabs yin no/ /zhes smras pa de lags so/ /des yang
smras pa/ mkhan pos/ de dag gi khyim mi dang bcas pa thams cad ces bgyi ba de'i don ci lags mkhyen tam/ des smras pa/ mi shes so/ /de dag gi khyim mi dang bcas pa thams cad ces bgyi ba
ni| rgyal rigs dge sbyong gau ta ma 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang bcas pa lags te/ de ltar na/ mkhan pos don gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs par gyur to/ /
bram ze des smras pa/ kho bos bram ze rig byed gsum pa dang ldan pa dag ma mthong ngam/ ci na/ gang gi phyir dge sbyong mgo reg dag la sbyin par byed/ des smras pa/ dge sbyong des deng mkhan
po'i mtshan gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sang mkhan po'i sdum par spyan 'dren par bgyid do/ /bram zes smras pa/ ci'i phyir de de ltar byed/ des smras pa/ mkhan
po| gal te bdag la thugs mi ches na/ bram ze'i khye'u zhig rtog tu gtang du gsol/ des bram ze'i khye'u zhig rtog tu btang ba dang / ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas sangs rgyas la
sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun tshogs pa na/ rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste/ bram ze che ge mo zhig sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan
'dren to/ /zhes bram ze de'i ming gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du spyan drangs ba des thos so/ /bram ze'i khye'u des de thos nas phyir 'ongs te bram ze de la smras pa/
mkhan po/ de bzhin te/ btsun pa 'char kas mkhan po'i mtshan gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sang mkhan po'i sdum par spyan drangs kyi/ zhal zas sta gon bgyid du stsol
cig /des smras pa/ kho bos bram ze'i rig byed gsum dang ldan pa dag ma mthong ngam/ ci na/ gang gi phyir dge sbyong mgo reg dag la sbyin par byed/ de dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi

khyim du za bar 'gyur grang / ji tsam na de nang par langs pa dang dge slong chu'i gtsang sbyor dag bram ze de'i khyim du lhags te smras pa/ bram ze/ chu gang du gzhag par bya/ bram ze des smras pa/ khyim bdag mgon
med zas sbyin gyi sdum par ro/ /de bzhin du bshos kyi gtsang sbyor dag lhags te smras pa/ bram ze/ zhal zas gang du brtag par bya/ bram ze des smras pa/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi sdum par
ro| |bcom ldan 'das kyi gang gi ngor mgron du bos ba des dus sngar 'gro bar bya zhing / ma zin pa dag zin par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nang par sngar langs te 'phags
pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lam kar de mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka /gar bzhud/ des smras pa/ bram ze zhig gis bdag la brten te sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge
'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pas der 'gro'o/ /khyim bdag gis smras pa/ bram ze de ni/ ma dad pa lags kyi/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi
dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod bcad par gyur na mi rung gi /bdag kyang mchi'o/ /de gnyis der dong ba dang / ji tsam na bram ze de snying las chung ngur 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
gyis de la smras pa/ bram ze/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs na/ ci'i phyir snying las chung ngur 'dug /zhal zas sta gon
byed na/ ci nyes/ bram ze des smras pa/ kho bo bram ze rig byed gsum dang ldan pa dag ma mthong ngam/ ci na/ dge sbyong mgo reg dag la sbyin par byed/ khyod bdag gi khyim du zan byin cig /khyim
bdag gis smras pa/ bram ze kho bo la 'byor pa med snyam mam/ kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsod snyoms dang / na bza' dang / gnas mal dang /

snyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag gis bsnyen bkur byed par yang spro mod kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo khyod la phan gdags pa'i phyir smra'i/ khyod snying las chung ngur ma 'dug par zhal zas sta gon
gyis shig /'di ltar/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun ni/ ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang / rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang / bla mkhyen

drang srong byin dang / rnying pa dang / kho bo dang / gzhan yang bram ze dang / khyim bdag rgya che rgu dag gis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas pa yin pas/ gal te khyod la brten nas sangs
rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod bcad par gyur na/ khyod la rgyal po gdon mi za bar gnod pa byed par 'gyur zhing / khyod phyag sbal du bcug pas 'chi dgos par 'gyur pa gang
yin pa de lta bu'i gnas kyang yod par 'gyur ro/ /bram ze de skrag ste bsam pa/ de ltar 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas smras pa/ khyim bdag /bdag gis zhal zas sta gon ma byas na/ da ji ltar bya/ khyim bdag

gis smras pa/ bram ze/ mnyan yod na gang nyo bas mi rnyed pa'i rdzas de lta bu med kyi/ kaR+sha pa Na 'on cig dang / kho bos zhal zas sta gon bya'o/ /bram zes smras pa/ khyim bdag /kaR+sha pa Na ji snyed dag gis sangs
rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gdugs tshod 'byor par 'gyur/ khyim bdag gis smras pa/ kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgyas so/ /bram ze des khyim bdag la kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya phul nas/ khyim bdag
mgon med zas sbyin gyis de dag gi steng du kaR+sha pa Na gzhan dag gis kyang bsnan te zhal zas sta gon byas so/ /bram ze des smras pa/ khyim bdag /bdag la stsang sder dag kyang mi bdog go /khyim bdag

mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ bram ze/ khyod stsang sder dag gis ma 'tsher bar snying las chung ngur 'dug cig dang / de dag drang srong gi snod dang bcas te gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sangs rgyas
la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gshegs te bzhugs nas dge slong rnams kyis lhung bzed dag byi dor byas pa bram ze des mthong nas des bsam pa/ re zhig snod dag
kyang bdag gis byi dor bya mi dgos so/ /snyam nas de mngon par dad par gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka/ khyod bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags kyi/ khyod
kyis kyang brim pa mdzod la slad kyis bshos gsol cig /sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad pa mdzad de gdan las
bzhengs te gshegs so/ /de nas bram ze des smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka /da khyod bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig /de 'dug pa dang bram ze de zas brims te des zas kyi bya ba byas pa
dang | bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin

khong du chud nas 'di ltar/ bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/ /des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang
mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze
dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song
gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor
ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ btsun
pa| bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag

dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang / na bza'
dang / gnas mal dang / snyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ rab tu byung ba ni/ gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin
pas/ bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so/ /zhes smras te dang du ma blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim lnga pa
gnyi ka nas btul cing bzhag go /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na/ mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa de'i chung ma gzugs bzang ba/ blta
na sdug pa/ mdzes pa yin pas/ de de la shin tu lhag par chags pas khyim du 'ga' yang 'jug tu mi ster nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ bram ze de 'dul ba'i dus yin no/ /snyam
nas| de bram ze de'i khyim du song ba dang / ji tsam na bram ze de/ gcin gci zhing 'dug pas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka mthong nas smras pa/ dge sbyong ma 'jug par sdod cig /tshe dang ldan pa 'char
kas 'di ltar bram ze'i gcin gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nang du zhugs te bram ze de'i chung ma de yang 'di ltar de'i lto na nang grol gang dag
yod pa de dag thams cad phyi rol nas snang ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka phyir byung ba dang / bram ze des smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka /khyod kyis bdag gi mchis brang
gzigs sam/ des smras pa/ mthong ngo / /ci 'dra/ khyod kyis ji ltar mthong bar gyur pa de 'dra'o/ /de zhugs te bltas na/ de ltar mi sdug par mthong nas des de la smras pa/ bram ze mo/
khyod kyis btsun pa 'char ka la cung zhig ma smras sam/ des smras pa/ cung zad kyang ma smras te/ 'di ltar/ des bdag spyos te dmod mo bgyis kyi/ bzhud la de la bzod pa gsol cig /de song ste smras
pa| btsun pa 'char ka /bdag gi mchis brang la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ bzod par bya'o/ /des de sngon ji lta ba bzhin du gyur pa dang / bram ze de dad par gyur
nas des smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka ci'i slad du byon/ khyod nyid 'dul ba'i don du'o/ /btsun pa 'char ka /de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig /tshe dang ldan pa 'char
ka der 'dug ste zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang / bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag
la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar/ bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi
rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/ /des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la
brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes
dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang /
mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags
dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/
ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/
bdag ni/ bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo pa thag pa nas
rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /btsun pa 'char ka ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang / na bza' dang / gnas mal dang / snyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par
ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ rab tu byung ba ni/ gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/ bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so/ /zhes smras te

dang du ma blangs so/ /de na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim drug pa gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhag go /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na/ mnyan
yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa de'i chung ma gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa yin te/ bram ze des me tog dang / yam sreg shing gi phyir phyi rol tu byung ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas

bsam pa/ bram ze de 'dul ba'i dus yin no/ /snyam nas/ de bram ze'i khyim du song ba dang / de'i chung ma des tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka sgo khang du mthong nas de'i nang du zhugs pa dang / tshe dang ldan
pa 'char ka yang khyim gyi nang du zhugs so/ /de gnas khang du zhugs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang de'i phyi bzhin gnas khang du bzhugs so/ /de gnas khang nas phyir byung ste skas las

khang steng du 'dzeg par brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas kyang de'i phyi bzhin skas las khang steng du 'dzeg par brtsams so/ /des skas phul ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka sa la bsgyel
nas de 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / des bsam pa/ ma shi'am snyam nas de babs te bslang bar brtsams nas/ 'gul bar yang ma nus so/ /bram ze 'ongs nas dris pa/ 'di ci yin/
bram ze mos rgyas par brjod pa dang / des smras pa/ khyod kyi 'di de ltar phul ba ni/ ma legs pa byas te/ 'di ni/ bram ze mdun na 'don gyi bu las rab tu byung ba/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi chung po
grogs/ btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i slob dpon yin te/ 'di dag gis rgyal po las gzhon nu'i yongs su spangs pa thob pas/ bdag cag rgyal pos phyag sbal du bcug pas 'chi
bar bya dgos pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro/ /bram ze mos tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ 'phags pa/ khyod kyis mi mkhyen pa dang / ma gzigs pa
dang | ma rig pa dang / rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci yang ma mchis kyi/ bzod pa gsol zhes bzod pa gsol pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka langs te smras pa/ bzod par bya'o/ /bram ze de ngo
mtshar skyes nas des smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka /ci'i slad du byon/ khyod nyid 'dul ba'i don du'o/ /btsun pa 'char ka /de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod

cig |tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas der 'dug ste zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang / bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char
kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar/ bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i
ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/ /des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i
bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams
kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyis pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag
dang | mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi
dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu
mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun
pa| bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slad chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang
bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang / na bza' dang / gnas mal dang / snyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /
tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ rab tu byung ba ni/ gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/ bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so/ /zhes
smras te/ dang du ma blangs so/ /de na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim bdun pa gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhag go /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ gang 'dul ba'i
dus yin snyam na/ /mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa de'i chung ma gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa yin te/ bram ze de me tog dang yam sreg shing gi phyir phyi rol tu byung ba dang / tshe
dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ bram ze de 'dul ba'i dus yin no/ /snyam nas/ de bram ze de'i khyim du song ba dang / bram ze mo de gzugs kyi rgyags pa dang / lang tsho'i rgyags pa dang / rigs kyi
rgyags pa dang / dbang phyug gi rgyags pas rgyags nas tshig kyang mi ster ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i sngon gyi las zad pa las bsam nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ sring mo rnying pa zad
byed cing / /gsar pa cung zad skyed mi byed/ /bag med brgyan pa mthong nas ni/ /mchi mas brnangs pa'i bzhin gyis du/ /zhes smras te song ngo / /bram ze mo de 'dis bdag spyos so/ /zhes gshe
zhing de gos dri ma can gyon te/ khri zhig pa'i steng du nyal te 'dug go /bram ze de 'ongs pa dang des de mthong nas smras pa/ bram ze mo 'di ci nyes/ bram ze mos bshes te smras pa/ gal te khyod la
gang sgo na 'greng ba'i mi gcig la yang bza' ba dang / bgo ba sbyin pa'i 'byor ba med na/ khyod la khyim mi mo blangs pas ci bya/ dge sbyong 'char ka gang yin pa des kho mo spyos so/ /bram zes
smras pa/ bzang mo/ de ni/ bram ze mdun na 'don gyi bu las rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ de la bzod par gyis shig /bram ze mos smras pa/ gal te de gson na/ kho mo mi gson no/ /bram zes smras pa/
bzang mo/ 'di ni/ ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi chung po grogs/ btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i slob dpon yin te/ de dag gis rgyal po las gzhon nu'i yongs su spangs pa thob pas gal te
bdag gis de la sdug bsngal cung zad bskyed par gyur na/ bdag cag rgyal pos phyag sbal du bcug pas 'chi bar bya dgos pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur gyi/ bzod par gyis shig /bram

ze mos smras pa/ bram ze/ mang du smras te ci rung / gal te de gson na/ kho mo mi gson no/ /'dod pa bsten pas ni/ sdig pa'i las mi bya ba ci yang med pas/ bram ze de ral gri mchan du bcug ste 'phags pa dang /

tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas thag ring po kho nas de sems ji lta bus 'ong snyam na/ ji tsam na gsod pa'i sems kyis 'ong bar mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas lo ma ma yin pa'i spyil bu mngon par sprul nas

der zhugs te 'dug go /bram ze des smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka/ sgo phye zhig /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ khyod skyes bzang pos 'ongs par gyur na/ kho bos ci'i phyir sgo mi dbye/ ral gri 'or cig /
bram zes bsam pa/ bgags te gsad do/ /snyam nas des ral gri bor ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ sdig pa'i sems de yang 'or cig /bram ze des bsam pa/ 'di

ni/ bdag nyid chen po zhig ste/ bdag gi sems kyang shes so/ /snyam nas de mngon par dad par gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de'i phyir bsdus nas de bzhin du

'dug go /bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams

dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar/ bram ze stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du
byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/ /des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas/ btsun pa 'char ka bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta
bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma
bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/

mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis
pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /
bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan
chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dad pas skyabs su mchi'o/ /de nas bram ze des smras pa/ btsun pa/ 'char ka khyod bdag gi sdum par byon tam/ son to/ /btsun pa 'char kas bdag

gi bram ze mo la ji skad bka' stsal/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ kho bo de la 'di skad ces/ sring mo rnying pa zad byed cing / /gsar pa cung zad skyed mi byed/ /bag med brgyan pa mthong nas ni/ /
mchi mas brnangs pa'i bzhin gyis du/ /zhes smras so/ /btsun pa/ tshigs su bcad pa de'i don ci lags/ bram ze sngon byung ba/ 'das pa'i dus na/ ri brag cig tu dus ston byung nas de na khyim bdag

gi chung ma rab tu mang po dag rang gi rgyan dag gis brgyan te/ skyed mos tshal gyi sar dong ba de dag grong sprang mo zhig gis mthong nas de bdag nyid rgud pa'i mya ngan byed do/ /sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med
pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang / bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/ bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag

'jig rten du byung ngo / /rang sangs rgyas shig de la phan gdags pa'i phyir phyogs der song ba dang / de'i lus mdzes pa dang / sems mdzes pa grong sprang mo des mthong nas/ des sprang zan cung zad cig
rnyed pa dang / des bsam pa/ bdag gis sbyin gnas 'di lta bu la mchod pa ma byas pas/ des na gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur gor ma chag gi/ gal te bcom ldan 'das 'di bdag las bsod snyoms

cung zad len par 'gyur na/ bdag gis 'di la dbul bar bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /rang sangs rgyas des de la snying brtse ba'i phyir lhung bzed bzed pa dang / des de la phul lo/ /rang sangs rgyas de de la snying
brtse bas ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams

so/ /so so'i skye bo rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod par byed pa yin pas de shing ljon pa rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas de'i rkang pa gnyis kyi drung du 'gyel nas des smon lam 'di skad
ces/ bdag las 'di'i rnam par smin pas nam yang sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig /ces btab bo/ /bram ze/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ grong sprang mo gang yin pa de ni/ khyod kyi chung ma de yin te/ des rang
sangs rgyas la mchod pa byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas da ltar 'di lta bur skyes te kho bos de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa de zad pa las bsam nas de skad ces/ sring mo rnying pa zad byed cing //
gsar pa cung zad skyed mi byed/ /bag med brgyan pa mthong nas ni/ /mchi mas brnangs pa'i bzhin gyis ngu / /zhes smras so/ /btsun pa 'char kas don gyis na bdag gi mchis brang la bskul ba mdzad do/ /

btsun pa 'char ka sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ bram ze de la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs so/ /de nas bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas cang
mi smra bas dang du blangs par rig nas song ngo / /bram ze mo de yang 'gyod pa skyes te bdag gis bram ze 'char ka sod cig /ces mngag pa ni/ ma legs pa byas te/ bram ze des btsun pa 'char ka bsad par
ma gyur tam snyam mo/ /bram ze des 'ongs pa dang chung mas smras pa/ rje'i sras/ khyod kyis btsun pa 'char ka ma bkrongs sam/ bram zes smras pa/ de ni/ bdag nyid chen po yin pas su zhig gis bkrongs
par nus/ chung mas smras pa/ 'o na khyod kyis spyan ma drangs sam/ bram zes smras pa/ kho bos sang khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs kyi/ zhal zas sta gon gyis shig /bram ze mo des zhal zas

grang cha gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ de nyid kyis nyin mo sta gon byas/ drod bag gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ phyi de nyin par sta gon byas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang phyi de nyin par snga dro sham thabs bgos/
chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te bram ze de'i khyim ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go /de nas bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas tshe dang ldan pa
'char ka bde bar 'dug par rig nas/ bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed/ stob par byed/ rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang
gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas zan zos shing lag pa bsnyal/ lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du

chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze mo de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar/ bram ze mo de stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin

du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/ /des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gi
dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams

kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang mchi

ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa

phyung / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du
zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge

slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge bsnyen mar gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i

bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang / na bza' dang / gnas mal dang / snyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ rab tu byung ba ni/ gzhan la phan pas rjes su

'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/ bram ze gzhan pa la phan pa bya dgos so/ /zhes smras te/ dang du ma blangs so/ /de na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze khyim brgyad pa gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhag go /

tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na/ mnyan yod na bram ze phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su bzung ba yang sa shing rgya che ba/ ser sna can/ mig phra ba/ bya rog la yang
gtor ma mi ster ba/ yo byad kun tu 'dzin pa zhig 'dug pa des/ ri brag cig tu zhing blas kyi mtha' rmor bcug nas/ des bang ba dag rgyas btab ste chung ma la lto rgyags tsam byin nas ri

brag der song ste rang gi zhal lta byas nas zhing blas kyi mtha' dag byed du 'jug go/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ bram ze de 'dul ba'i dus yin no/ /snyam nas des bsod snyoms rgyus te bram ze de'i khyim du

song nas des smras pa/ bram ze mo/ lhung bzed kyi chu bslang ngo / /des de la 'bras chan phul ba dang / phru ba de de bzhin du gang bar 'dug go /bram ze mos smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag gi khyim thab ser sna can/ mig

phra ba/ bya rog la yang gtor ma mi ster ba/ yo byad kun du 'dzin pa lags kyi/ slan chad ma byon cig /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ thabs yin gyi/ sang kho bo bdag nyid dang gnyis 'ong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa

'char ka phyi de nyin par bdag nyid dang gnyis der song ba dang / des de la de bzhin du 'bras chan phul lo/ /de bzhin du bdag nyid dang drug cu'i bar du nyin rer lan re song ste bram ze'i khyim der bsod snyoms
zos pa dang / dgos kyi sdum tshes dag /shes ldan dag /ltos shig /bram ze des lag pa bcal ba brgya dag gis longs spyod dag bsgrubs na/ de dag bram ze mo des/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag dang lhan cig

za bar byed do/ /zhes smod par byed/ 'phyar kha gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed do/ /bram ze'i khye'u zhig bya ba 'ga' zhig la mnyan yod nas ri brag der song ba dang / bram ze des bram ze'i khye'u de thag

ring po kho na nas mthong nas des bram ze'i khye'u de la dris pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ khyod ga las 'dir 'ongs/ des smras pa/ mnyan yod nas so/ /khyod kyis kho bo'i khyim gyi gtam thos sam/ thos te/ mnyan yod na khyim bdag

mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim ni/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag gi khyim dang po lags so/ /mkhan po'i khyim ni/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag gi khyim gnyis pa lags te/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong drug cu nyin rer lan re

mchis te bsod snyoms 'tshal lo/ /bram ze des bsam pa/ 'dis kho bo ser sna can la mtho 'tsham par byed kyi/ gzhan la yang dri bar bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de lam gar song ste bsdad pa dang / ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u

gzhan zhig bya ba 'ga' zhig la mnyan yod nas ri brag der song ba de/ bram ze des bram ze'i khye'u da thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas/ des bram ze'i khye'u de la dris pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ khyod ga las
'dir 'ongs/ des smras pa/ mnyan yod nas so/ /khyod kyis kho bo'i khyim gyi gtam thos sam/ thos te/ mnyan yod na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim ni/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag gi khyim
dang po lags so/ /mkhan po'i khyim ni/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag gi khyim gnyis pa lags te/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong drug cu nyin rer lan re mchis te bsod snyoms 'tshal lo/ /bram ze des
bsam pa/ de dang 'di mthun pas de ltar gyur gyi/ bram ze mo des longs spyod dag zos par gyur na mi rung gi/ 'gro'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas bram ze de phyir 'ongs te bram ze de la smras pa/ bram ze mo
ngan pa/ kho bos lag pas gzhal ba brgya dag gis longs spyod dag bsgrubs na/ khyod de dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag dang lhan cig za bar byed dam/ khyod kyis bram
ze rig byed gsum dang ldan pa dag ma mthong ngam/ ci na/ dge sbyong mgo reg de dag la sbyin par byed ces des de brdeg par brtsams pa dang / des smras pa/ bram ze/ khyod kyis kho mo la gtad
pa'i bang ba dag kho mos rgya nyams par byas sam ci/ je so sor rtogs shig /bram ze des bang ba dag so sor brtags pa dang ji tsam na de bzhin du rgya ma nyams par 'dug pa dag mthong
nas des chung ma la smras pa/ khyod kyi zas de snyed ga las rnyed/ des smras pa/ bdag gi phru ba 'dir 'bras chan dang / sran tshod btsos na/ 'bras chan des/ dge sbyong drug cu dang bdag kyang 'grangs

par gyur to/ /bram ze des smras pa/ ci'i phyir de ltar du gyur/ des smras pa/ bdag gis khyod kyi mngon sum du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /zhes des phyi de nyin par tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bdag nyid dang drug
cu der 'ongs pa la de bzhin du bsod snyoms phul nas des smras pa/ bram ze/ khyod kyis mthong ngam/ bram ze de mngon par dad par gyur nas/ des smras pa/ btsun pa 'char kas sang bdag gi sdum
par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ bram ze/ ci/ 'di 'dra bas sam/ 'on te zas yang dag pas mgron du 'bod/ bshos yang dag pas spyan 'dren

to/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze de la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs te song ngo / /de nas bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas cang mi smra bas dang du blangs par rig nas/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang /

bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag sta gon byas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang phyi de nyin par snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te bram ze'i khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin
nas stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go /de nas bram ze de tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bde bar 'dug par rig nas/ bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed /
stob par byed do/ /rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka zan zos shing lag pa bsnyal/ lhung bzed
bzhag par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang

rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar/ bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rje bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i
'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/ /des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag
la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis
kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i
ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang / mi rnams
kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs
pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang
dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /btsun pa 'char
kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang / na bza' dang / gnas mal dang / snyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ rab

tu byung ba ni/ gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/ bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so/ /zhes smras te/ dang du ma blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram
ze khyim dgu pa gnyi nas btul cing bzhag go// //'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po re bdun pa/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na/ mnyan yod na bram
ze zhig 'dug pa des/ rigs mnyam pa la chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de la bu zhig byung nas de bsrings shing bskyed de chen por

gyur to/ /de'i chung ma de gtum pa/ brlang pa/ rtsub pa/ rgya ba/ gshe ba/ spyo ba zhig yin pas rtag tu ngos kyi sdum tshes dag dang lhan cig 'thab krol byed nas de'i ming gtum mo/ gtum mo/ zhes bya bar gyur
to| |dus gzhan zhig na mnyan yod du dus ston byung nas bram ze des bu la smras pa/ bu/ khyod kyi ma 'di gtum pas gzhan dag dang lhan cig 'thab krol byed pas bdag cag khri mon du bcug pas 'chi bar

bya dgos pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur gyi/ re zhig dus ston thal gyi bar du ri brag gzhan zhig tu 'dong zhing 'khod la/ de'i 'og tu phyir 'ong bar bya'o/ /khyod song la ma la dris shig /
bu des ma la smras pa/ yum/ bdag bgyi ba cung zhig gi slad du ri brag ga ge mo zhig tu mchi'o/ /gtum mos smras pa/ gang du kho mo'i dang po'i gos song ba der song zhig /bram zes kyang smras pa/
kho bo yang 'gro'o/ /gtum mos smras pa/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba der song zhig /de gnyis dong ba dang / gtum mos bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/ bu mo/ 'khur slang tshugs
shig dang / je snog zan bya'o/ /des 'khur slang btsugs te 'khur ba dag bya bar brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ gtum mo da 'dul ba'i dus yin no/ /snyam nas/ de snga dro
sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/ de mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/ gtum mo'i khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa dang /
de 'jug pa gtum mos mthong nas/ des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/ bu mo/ dge slong 'di skrod cig /des bskrad pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshe dang por nang du zhugs shing / bu mo
mngag gzhug ma phyis zhugs so/ /de gtum mos yang mthong nas/ des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyis dge sbyong 'di ma bskrad dam/ des smras pa/ bskrad do/ /'o na 'di ga
las zhugs/ yang skrod la sgo chod cig /des de bskrad de sgo bcad nas zhugs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ches dang por zhugs so/ /de gtum mos yang mthong nas/ des bu mo mngag gzhug ma
la smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyis dge sbyong 'di bskrad de sgo ma bcad dam/ bcad do/ /'o na 'di ga nas zhugs/ de nas gtum mos smras pa/ dge sbyong ci slong / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ 'khur

ba'o/ /gtum mos smras pa/ khyod bu thu bor gyur te 'ongs na/ khyod la 'khur ba ci'i phyir mi sbyin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bu thu bor sprul te 'ongs pa dang / gtum mos smras pa/ gal te lag pa dang / rkang pa

dag ser por byas kyang khyod la 'khur ba mi sbyin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas lag pa dang / rkang pa dag ser por sprul pa dang / gtum mos smras pa/ gal te mig gnyis kham phor lta bur blta na yang

khyod la 'khur ba mi sbyin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mig gnyis kham phor lta bur sprul pa dang / gtum mos smras pa/ gal te nam mkha' la dril bu bzhin du khral la 'khrol zhing 'dug na yang khyod

la 'khur ba mi sbyin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas nam mkha' la dril bu bzhin du khral la 'khrol zhing 'dug pa dang / gtum mos smras pa/ gal te khyod phyed phyed du dum bu gnyis su gas kyang khyod la

'khur ba mi sbyin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bdag nyid phyed phyed du dum bu gnyis su gas par sprul te sa la bsgyel ba dang / bu mo mngag gzhug mas smras pa/ jo mo/ khyed kyis gdung bar bgyid pa mang po

dad bsgrubs pa de dag gi nang du 'di ni/ ches gdung bar bgyid pa lags te/ dge slong 'di ni/ ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi chung po grogs/ btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i slob dpon lags pas/ bdag ni/ shin tu thag

ring por mchis kyang bran mo nyid du bas kyi/ jo mos ni/ gser gyi chu bum gyis rgyal po'i pho brang du chab bcu 'tsham par 'gyur ro/ /gtum mo skrag ste bsam pa/ de ltar 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas des smras pa/
bu mo/ dong rkos shig dang sba'o/ /zhes des dong bkos ste sba bar brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'gog pa la snyoms zhugs nas des bsgul bar yang ma
nus so/ /de nas gtum mos tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod kyis mi mkhyen pa dang / mi gzigs pa dang / ma rig pa dang / rnam par mi mkhyen pa
ci yang ma mchis kyi/ bdag la bzod pa mdzod cig dang / khyod la 'khur ba gsol lo/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka langs te cha lugs tha mal bstan pa dang / gtum mos bsam pa/ 'di la 'khur ba sbyin no/ /

zhes khas blangs na/ 'khur ba 'di dag ni/ ha cang che ches bas phangs kyi/ 'di'i phyir 'khur ba chung ngu gzhan zhig bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des 'khur ba chung ngu zhig sreg par brtsams pa dang / 'khur ba des
'khur slang thams cad yog par gyur nas gtum mos bsam pa/ bdag gi khur ba 'di/ mi sbyin par 'khur ba snga ma las gcig sbyin no/ /snyam nas des 'khur ba gcig drang bar brtsams pa dang /
ji tsam na khur ba thams cad 'ongs nas gtum mos smras pa/ ci/ 'phags pa 'khur ba thams cad bzhed dam/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ 'dod do/ /gtum mos smras pa/ bzhes su gsol/
tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ sring mo dang / gal te yongs su gtang na/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi deng sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod
la spyan drangs kyi/ der dong la rang gi lag nas brims shig /gtum mos smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag gtum mo/ zhes thams cad du rig pas/ bdag der 'jug tu ga la chud/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char
kas smras pa/ sring mo/ kho bos khyod 'jug tu gzhug go /de nas gtum mos 'khur ba de dag thogs te/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa dang / sgo bas smras pa/ gtum
mo/ don ci'i phyir 'dir 'ongs/ ma 'jug cig /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ bzhin bzang / 'jug tu chug cig /sgo bas gtum mo nang du btang ba dang / des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi
dge 'dun mang po mthong nas 'khur ba de dag gtub par brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ ma gtub par rangs par brims shig /gtum mos smras pa/ khyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang

ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ brims shig dang khyed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes des 'di ltar sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad la khyed pa'i phyin lhag kyang byung ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs
so/ /gtum mos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad la 'khur bas khyed par brims te gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad pa mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs
so| |gtum mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka khyod bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags kyi tshur gshegs/ bdag gi sdum par bzhud la khyod kyi der gdug tshod gsol cig /tshe dang ldan pa
'char ka gtum mo'i khyim du song ba dang / gtum mos tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la zan byin nas gtum mo tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa
dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar/ gtum mos stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i

rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/ /des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa
'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi

pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams

rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang / mi
rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du
zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge
'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge bsnyen mar gzung du gsol/ /deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de
la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin 'jug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas stan las langs te song ngo / /de nas gtum
mos rang gi khyim phyag der legs par byas/ chag chag legs par btab/ byug pas legs par byugs te me tog dag dgram par byas nas spyod lam zhi bas 'dug go /bram ze de yang dus ston thal nas

phyir 'ongs te skyed mos tshal du bsdad nas des bu la smras pa/ bu/ khyod song la khyod kyi ma khri mon gang du bcug cing 'dug pa ltos shig dang / dbyung bar bya'o/ /bu de khyim du song ba dang / gtum mos thag ring po kho na

nas bu mthong nas des smras pa/ bu/ 'ongs pa legs so/ /'ongs pa legs so/ /tshur shog /ngal sos shig /khyod kyi pha de 'ongs sam/ bus smras pa/ mchis te/ skyed mos tshal na sdod cing mchis so/ /bu de zan zos

nas pa'i gan du song ba dag phas dris pa/ bu/ khyim bde'am/ bus smras pa/ yab/ yum gyi spyod lam de lta bu ni/ sngon lan 'ga' yang mthong ste/ 'di ltar spyod lam zhi bas mchis so/ /bram ze de khyim du zhugs pa dang /
gtum mos thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas des smras pa/ rje'i sras/ byon pa legs so/ /byon pa legs so/ /bzhugs su gsol/ de 'dug nas bsam pa/ bye brag 'di

lta bu ni/ sngon ma byung na/ ci las gyur snyam nas des tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ 'di ltar sngon dang mi 'dra bar/ /log pa nyid du khyod snang na/ /khyod ni smyo byed ldan gyur tam/ /'on te myos par gyur
tam ci/ /gtum mos tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ jo bo bdag ni smyos pa min/ myos par gyur pa'ang ma lags te/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas bstan pa la/ /'phags pa'i bden pa mthong bar bgyis/ /

rje'i sras/ bdag la 'phags pa 'char kas 'di ltar/ bdag slan chad 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe nyon mongs pa de lta bu dag kun tu spyod par mi 'gyur ba de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do/ /bram ze de de ngo
mtshar skyes te bsam pa/ bdag gis brdeg pa dang / bcing ba dang / smad pas thul bar ma nus pa gang yin pa de/ btsun pa 'char kas chos bstan pas btul bas/ gang gi phyir chos bstan
pas 'di btul ba ni/ 'phags pa 'char kas bdag la phan pa mang du mdzad do/ /'phags pa 'char kas bdag la legs pa mang du mdzad kyi/ bdag song la 'phags pa 'char ka sang khyim

gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drang ngo / /snyam nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bram ze de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par byed/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par byed/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par byed/
yang par rab tu dga' bar byed do/ /rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar

mdzad nas cang mi smra'o/ /de nas bram ze de stan las langs te tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa 'char kas

sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze de la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs so/ /de nas bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas cang mi smra bas dang du blangs

par rig nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song ngo / /de nas bram ze des de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag sta gon byas so/ /tshe dang

ldan pa 'char ka yang phyi de nyin par snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te bram ze de'i khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go /de nas bram ze des tshe dang
ldan pa 'char ka bde bar 'dug par rig nas bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed/ stob par byed do/ /rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod
pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka zan zos shing lag pa bsnyal/ lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te

tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar/ bram ze des stan de

nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/ /des bden pa mthong nas smras
pa| btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/
rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa
lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo
dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis
pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so//
btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol

deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang / na bza' dang / snyung ba'i rkyen dang /
sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ rab tu byung ba ni/ gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan
par bya dgos so/ /zhes smras te/ dang du ma blangs so/ /bram ze des smras pa/ gal te btsun pa 'char kas dang du mi bzhes na/ bdag gis drang srong gi gdan bshams par bgyi yi/ btsun pa 'char ka

gshegs te longs spyod par gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze de la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan
yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas stan las langs te song ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim bcu
pa gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhag go /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na/ mnyan yod na bram ze gzhon nu khye'u lnga brgya tsam chung ma

dang bcas pa dag bca' ba dang / bza' ba dang / dri dang / phreng ba rgyu mang po thogs te rtse ba'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ 'di dag 'dul ba'i dus

yin no/ /snyam nas de de dag gi gan du song ba dang / de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka khyod bram ze mdun na 'don gyi bu yin na/ ci'i phyir shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong ba 'di dag thams cad za ba dag

gi nang du rab tu byung / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas 'di ltar/ de dag gi phreng ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ kun dong gi phreng bar gyur/ 'khur ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ ba lang gi ko bar gyur/ sha
gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ ba lang gi shar gyur/ btung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ chang du gyur pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de dag la lhung bzed bstan te smras
pa| shes ldan dag ltos shig /kho bo'i lhung bzed na kun dong dang / ba lang gi rko ba dang / ba lang gi sha dang / chang yod snyam mam/ ci/ khyed cag ni/ mgo la yang kun dong gi phreng ba thogs/ zas
su yang ba lang gi ko ba dang / ba lang gi sha za/ btung bar yang chang 'thung bas/ khyed cag thams cad za ba yin pas/ de dag gis gcig la gcig bltas nas ji tsam na/ bdag cag thams cad kyi

mgo la kun dong gi phreng ba thogs pa dang / 'khur ba thams cad ba lang gi ko bar gyur pa dang / sha thams cad ba lang gi shar gyur pa dang / btung ba thams cad chang du gyur par mthong nas de dag gis smras
pa| 'phags pa 'char ka /khyod kyis bdag cag la dmod pa bor gyi/ bdag cag la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ bzod par bya'o/ /de nas de dag snga mkho bzhin du

gyur pa dang / de dag ngo mtshar skyes nas de dag gis smras pa/ bcun pa 'char ka ci'i slad du byon/ khyed cag nyid gdul ba'i don du 'ongs kyi/ 'khod cig dang chos bstan par bya'o/ /de dag tshe dang ldan pa

'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de dag chung ma dang bcas pa'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar/

bram ze de dag chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos
bstan to/ /de dag gis bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag cag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag cag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/

bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mas dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis
byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan
song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /
'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/
btsun pa/ bdag cag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong
gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /btsun pa 'char kas
ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag cag gi bsod snyoms dang / na bza' dang / gnas mal dang / snyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ rab
tu byung ba ni/ gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/ bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so/ /zhes smras te dang du ma blangs so/ /bram ze de dag gis smras pa/
gal te btsun pa 'char kas dang du mi bzhes na/ bdag cag gis drang srong gi gdan bshams pa bgyi'o/ /btsun pa 'char ka gshegs te longs spyod par gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze de dag
la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de dag la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang

dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas stan las langs te song ngo / /de na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim lnga brgya lhag tsam gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhag go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi nang na mchog ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong 'char ka nag po 'di yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char
kas bsam pa/ gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na/ mnyan yod na bram ze zhig gsang sngags dag gis mi ma yin pa dbang du byas nas shing rta bcas te 'dren du 'jug par byed nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char
kas bsam pa/ bram ze de gdul ba'i dus yin no/ /snyam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze gdul ba'i phyir 'phags pa dang / ji tsam na bram ze de gsang sngags dag gis mi ma yin pa dbang du byas

nas shing rta bcas te 'dren du bcug nas mnyan yod kyi phyi rol du song ba na/ bram ze de shing rta las babs nas gcin gci bar bsam pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas 'di ltar/ bram ze de'i gcin rgyun mi
'chad pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas gsang sngags kyi phur bu byung ba dang / mi ma yin pa de bros te song ngo / /ji tsam na bram ze de langs pa dang /
mi ma yin pa de bros par mthong nas des smras pa/ sus kho bo'i mi ma yin pa'i phur bu phyung / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ kho bos so/ /ci'i phyir khyod bram zer gyur nas mi ma yin par
spyod dam/ des smras pa/ su zhig bdag gi bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de la lhung bzed bstan nas smras pa/ 'di khyod kyi bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /des
smras pa/ 'dis ci 'grub par 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ gang sems pa dang / gang 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /ji tsam na bram ze de gang sems pa dang /
gang 'dod pa de dag thams cad lhung bzed de las grub par gyur pa dang / bram ze de ngo mtshar skyes te/ des smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka ci'i slad du 'di ltar 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas
smras pa/ kho bos lhung bzed kyi rig pa shes so/ /des smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka/ lhung bzed kyi rig pa de bdag la stsol cig /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ rig
pa su la'ang sbyin mi bya/ /rig dang bcas te 'chi bar bya/ /rig pa rig dang gus pa dang / /nor gyi phyir ni sbyin par bya/ /bram zes smras pa/ bdag khyod la gus par bgyid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char

kas smras pa/ kho bo khyim pa las bsnyen bkur bdag gir mi byed kyi/ kho bo ni/ rab tu byung ba las bsnyen bkur bdag gir byed do/ /des smras pa/ bdag rab tu byung ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras
pa/ rab tu phyung zhig /ces des rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen par byas te gdams ngag byin no/ /de de ltar rab tu byung nas gcig pu dben pa/ bag yod pa/ rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid btang bar
gnas so/ /gcig pu dben pa/ bag yod pa/ rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid btang bar gnas pa na/ rigs kyi bu dag /gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho

nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar byed pa/ tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de'i tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/ /
tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /bya ba byas so/ /srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so/ /zhes go bar byed cing / dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam

mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan bzhag pa lta bu rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing / rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang / srid

pa dang / 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /
tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ gang gdul ba'i dus yin snyam na/ yul mi'i gyad cig gis yul dag tu gyad rnams brdabs nas mnyan yod du 'ongs nas mnyan

yod na sgo khar rkang pa brkyang ste 'dug cing / de gang la 'ong ba de la 'di skad ces/ yang na ni/ kho bo la stobs rgol cig /yang na ni/ kho bo'i rlig bar du song zhig /ces zer ro/ /de na skye bo phal po che'i
tshogs 'du ba dag las/ 'ga' yang de la stobs kyang mi rgol/ de'i rlig par du yang mi 'gro'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ gyad de gdul ba'i dus yin no/ /snyam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char

kas phyogs der song ste smras pa/ 'di su zhig yin/ skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis smras pa/ gyad 'di'i mchid nas 'di skad ces/ yang na ni/ kho bo la stobs rgol cig /yang na ni/ kho bo'i rlig bar du
song zhig /ces mchi'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de la smras pa/ ci/ je kho bo dang lhan cig stobs bya'am/ 'on te kho bos brdabs pa'i gyad gsum po gang dag yin pa de dag dang lhan cig stobs
'gyed/ des smras pa/ khyod kyis brdabs pa'i gyad gsum po gang dag yin pa de dag dang lhan cig stobs bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ kho bos 'dod chags kyi gyad brdabs/ zhe sdang
gi gyad brdabs/ gti mug gi gyad brdabs kyi/ khyed de dag dang lhan cig stobs khye zhig /ces tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de btul nas des rab tu phyung / rdzogs par bsnyen par byas te gdams
ngag byin no/ /de de ltar rab tu byung nas gcig pu dben pa/ bag yod pa/ rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid btang bar gnas so/ /gcig pu dben pa/ bag yod pa/ rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid

btang bar gnas pa na/ rigs kyi bu dag /gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod

pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de/ tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /bya ba byas so/ /srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes
so| |zhes go bar byed cing / dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan

bzhag pa lta bu rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing / rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang / 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang / bku sti la rgyab kyis phyogs

pa| dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /gtum mo des bu'i chung ma blangs nas dus gzhan zhig na gtum
mo yang dus la bab/ de'i khyim thab kyang dus la bab bo/ /gtum mo'i bu de kha ton gyi zhor la yul gzhan du song ngo / /gtum mo'i mna' ma de gos dang / zas bza' zhing zhim pa la longs spyod spyod pa
nyon mongs pa dag gis gdungs par gyur nas/ des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/ bu mo/ song la skyes pa lus brtan pa/ mkhrang ba/ dam pa 'ga' ci snang tshol
cig dang / de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o/ /bu mo mngag gzhug mas smras pa/ jo mo/ khyod kyi gyos po dang / sgyug mo gnyis ni/ bden pa mthong ba lags na/ khyod drang srong gi khyim
'di lta bur byon na/ nyes par spyod pa de lta bu ji ltar bgyir rung / drang srong gi khyim gyi mi snyan pa skyed par mdzad dam ci/ des smras pa/ kwa'i/ khyod bsam pa des ci bya/ je song la khrid de
shog cig /gal te khrid de ma 'ongs na/ khyod la mtshams chen po gcad par bya'o/ /bu mos bsam pa/ bu zan ma'i bu mo 'dis drang srong gi khyim rtsog gis dgang bar chad de/ bdag la dka'
ba med kyi/ dgug go /snyam nas de srang du song ba dang / des de na chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon lus brtan pa/ mkhrang ba/ dam pa zhig mthong nas des de la smras pa/ kye btsun po/ khyod kho mo'i

jo mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod phod dam/ des smras pa/ phod do/ /des ni/ khrid de jo mo dang sprad nas de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka der dus dang / dus
su 'gro bas de mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ bud med kyi yul 'di ni/ 'dod chags spyad pa zhig yin no/ /snyam nas/ des de la 'dod chags kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod do/ /
des bsam pa/ 'phags pa 'char ka ni/ gzhan gyi sems shes pa la mkhas pa yin pas/ des bdag 'phrigs kyi/ gal te de ma bsad na/ bdag gi khyim thab la byas shing / de bdag la gnod pa
byed par 'gyur du 'ong gi/ bdag gis de gsad do/ /snyam nas des chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon la smras pa/ 'phags pa 'char ka ni/ gzhan gyi sems shes pa la mkhas pa yin pas/ des bdag
cag 'phrigs kyi/ gal te de ma bsad na/ bdag gi khyim thab la byas shing / de bdag cag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur du 'ong gi /khyod kyis de sod cig /chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon gyis smras pa/ kho

bo de mi gsod de/ de ni/ ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi chung po grogs/ btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i slob dpon yin gyi/ kho bos de bsad par gyur na/ kho bo rgyal pos rgya skyegs kyi khang par
bcug ste bsregs pas 'chi bar bya dgos pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ gal te khyod de gsod na/ de lta na legs/ gal te mi gsod na/ khyod phyin chad kho mo'i
khyim du 'jug par mi bya'o/ /'dod pa bsten pa dag gis ni/ sdig pa'i chos mi bya ba ci yang med pas/ chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon des smras pa/ gal te de gzhan gyi sems shes pa la mkhas pa
yin na/ kho bos ji ltar gsad par bya/ des smras pa/ thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o/ /zhes des dus ma yin par tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i gan du mngag pa btang ste/ btsun pa 'char ka/ bdag bro 'tshal
bar gyur na/ khyod kyis bdag la gzigs par ci gnang zhes spring ngo / /dgra bcom pa dag ni/ ma bsam par shes pa dang / mthong ba mi 'jug pas tshe dang ldan pa 'char
ka yang dus ma yin par zhugs te/ de la chos bstan par byas nas de phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag khyod mthong na/ glo ba thag pa nas yud tsam zhig bzhugs su
gsol zhes des tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ji srid kyis shin tu nam sros par gyur pa de srid du bzung nas/ chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon yang ral gri shubs nas phyung ste sgo na sdod do/ /de nas tshe dang

ldan pa 'char ka phyir phyung ba dang / chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten pha rol btang ba des/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mgo drung pa nas bcad de sa la bsgyel
to| |de 'phags pa gsod cing 'dug pa bud med rgan mo zhig gis mthong nas/ des smras pa/ gzu lums byed pa 'di su yin/ chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon gyis smras pa/ su la yang ma zer cig/ kho

bos khyod kyang 'di'i gnas skabs lta bur byas par gyur ta re/ de skrag nas 'phral du smra ma phod do/ /bdag nyid chen po 'di'i rjes gcod pa 'ga' zhig phyis 'ong grang snyam nas/ de nyid na cang mi smra

bar 'dug go /snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten pha rol btang ba de gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i lus de phyag dar gyi phung po zhig tu sbas te bzhag go /de'i nyin mo gso sbyong gi
zhal ta ba rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste smras pa/ 'ga' zhig gis btsun pa 'char ka'i 'dun pa blangs sam/ btsun pa 'char ka med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka'
stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog de bsad kyi/ chos gos dag longs shig dang / de'i lus la mchod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa dang / ji tsam na mnyan
yod kyi sgo chod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gser gyi 'od lta bu'i 'od gtong ba mdzad pa dang / des mnyan yod thams cad gser gtso ma'i 'od lta bus snang bar gyur to/ /ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po
gsal rgyal gyis bsam pa/ ci'i phyir mnyan yod thams cad gser btso ma'i 'od lta bus snang bar gyur snyam nas des yang bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs par bzhed gor ma chag snyam nas de
btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas mnyan yod kyi lde mig khyer te sgo phye ba dang / bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs so/ /ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsam pa/ ci'i phyir bcom
ldan 'das dus ma yin par mnyan yod du gshegs snyam nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bsnyen par dka' ba dang / bzod par dka' ba yin pas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
zhu bar ma nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mdun du gshegs nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyi slad bzhin
slad bzhin du rjes su 'brang zhing song ba dang / ji tsam na/ phyag dar gyi phung po'i phyogs der byon to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge
slong dag /khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog de/ 'dir sbas kyi/ phyung zhig /de phyung ba dang / de na gang dag tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la brten nas 'phags pa'i bden pa dag mthong ba de dag
gis gsol pa/ 'di bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag 'di'i lus la mchod pa bgyid par ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /ko sa
