mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis ni/ nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed/ kha cig gis ni/ rang byang chub tu sems bskyed/ kha cig gis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
sems bskyed do/ /'khor phal cher ni/ sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab par bkod do/ /grong khyer sgra sgrog na/ khyim bdag rgyal dang / skar rgyal zhes bya ba

gnyis shig 'khod pa de gnyis che dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/ /mtha'
gcig tu 'khod nas khyim bdag rgyal dang / skar rgyal gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po/ bdag cag gnyis legs par gsungs

pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / rdzogs par bsnyen pa'i dge slong gi dngos po dang / bdag cag gnyis kyis 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa thob bam/ tshe dang

ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos de gnyis rab tu phyung / rdzogs par bsnyen par byas te gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa byin nas de gnyis kyis spro ba dang / 'bad pa dang / brtsal pa byas pas gong nas gong

du yid la byed pa'i khyad par thob nas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba de nyid rig ste 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i

chos nyid kyis zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab

tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de/ tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /bya
ba byas so/ /srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing / dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/
nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan bzhag pa lta bu/ rig pas sgo nga'i spubs dral bar gyur cing / rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par

rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang / 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar
gyur to/ /de gnyis kyis 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bab pa dang / klog 'byin pa'i tsha 'phrul dag byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya
ngan las 'das so/ /de gnyis kyi nye du dag gis lus la lus kyi mchod pa byas nas mchod rten gnyis byed du bcug ste/ gcig ni/ rgyal gyi'o/ /cig shos ni/ skar rgyal gyi'o/ /rgyal po u

tra ya na nyin re nyin re zhing tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i drung du song nas chos mnyan te btsun mo'i 'khor la/ 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos mngar ba dang mngar ba ston par byed de/ sbrang bu sbrang rtsi 'byin

pa bzhin no/ /zhes brjod par byed do/ /de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa lags so/ /ji ltar/ gang gi slad du khyod chos gsan pas so/ /gal te de lta na/ khyed cag

kyang ci'i phyir chos mi nyan/ lha/ bdag cag ni/ ngo tsha dang ldan pa lags pas/ ji ltar der mchis te chos mnyan par bgyi/ gal te 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po 'di nyid du mchis te/ chos ston par bgyi

na/ de lta na/ bdag cag kyang chos nyan to/ /rgyal po u tra ya nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la smras pa/ 'phags pa/ btsun mo'i 'khor chos nyan par 'tshal lo/ /des smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ dge
slong dag ni/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du zhugs shing chos mi ston to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du 'jug pa bkag go/ /'phags pa/ 'o na su zhig btsun mo'i 'khor la chos ston
par bgyid/ rgyal po chen po/ dge slong ma'o/ /rgyal po u tra ya nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la phrin yig 'di skad ces/ shed mthun dgyes pa/ bdag gi btsun mo'i 'khor chos nyan par
'tshal na/ de'i slad du dge slong ma 'ga' zhig gtang ba'i rigs so/ /zhes bris te bskur ro/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos phrin yig de bklags nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ /mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun

pa/ rgyal po u tra ya nas phrin yig spring ste btsun mo'i 'khor chos nyan par 'tshal gyi/ de'i slad du dge slong ma 'ga' zhig gtang ba'i rigs so/ /zhes mchi na/ de'i slad du 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par/
bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ rgyal po u tra ya na'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud med dang / grong khyer sgra sgrog na gnas pa'i bud med rnams dge slong ma
gang gi gdul ba yin snyam du dgongs na/ dge slong ma ri ma'i gdul ba yin par gzigs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma ri ma la bka' stsal ba/ ri ma/ grong khyer sgra sgrog
na rgyal po u tra ya na'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud med dang / sgra sgrog na gnas pa'i bud med rnams la soms shig /dge slong ma ri mas/ btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom
ldan 'das las mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas dge slong ma ri ma de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga
dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms rgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod
snyoms las phyir log pas ji ltar longs spyod pa'i gnas mal mkhos su phab ste lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas 'khor lnga brgya dang grong khyer sgra sgrog ga la ba der song ngo / /rgyal po gzugs
can snying pos kyang rgyal po u tra ya na la 'phrin yig 'di skad ces/ shed mthun dgyes pa/ khyod kyi phyir bdag gis nyan thos ma chen mo ston pas bsngags pa 'di 'khor lnga brgya dang btang gi /khyod

kyis kyang dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du lam dang / grong khyer mdzes par bya zhing / bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pas bsu bar bya ste/ grong khyer gyi nang du dbyar khang lnga brgya yang

byed du gzhug par bya/ khri dang / khri'u dang / stan nang tshangs can dang / la ba dang / sngas dang / gor bu lnga brgya yang dbul bar bya/ bsod snyoms lnga brgya yang sbyor du gzhug par bya ste/ des na
khyod kyis bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bris te bskur ro/ /rgyal po u tra ya nas 'phrin yig de bklags nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba skyes te des dpag tshad phyed dang gsum
du lam dang / grong khyer mdzes par byed du bcug nas bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang / skye bo 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pas bsus nas bkur sti chen pos grong khyer du 'jug

tu bcug cing / grong khyer gyi nang du dbyar khang lnga brgya byed du bcug ste/ khri dang / khri'u dang / stan nang tshangs can dang / la ba dang / sngas dang / gor bu lnga brgya yang 'bul du bcug /bsod snyoms

lnga brgya yang sbyor du bcug go /dge slong ma ri ma nyin re zhing rgyal po u tra ya na'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang / grong khyer sgra sgrog na gnas pa'i bud med rnams kyi nang du zhugs te chos ston par byed do/ /rgyal
po u tra ya na ni/ pi wang mkhas pa yin la/ btsun mo zla 'od ni/ gar mkhas pa yin pas/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po u tra ya nas pi wang sbrengs te btsun mo zla 'od gar byed do/ /des de
gar byed pa na chud za ba'i mtshan ma mthong nas des de la mgo mjug tu brtags te bsam na/ zhag bdun 'das na 'di dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas de'i lag nas pi
wang shor te sa la lhung ba dang / btsun mo zla 'od kyis smras pa/ lha/ bdag gi gar ma legs sam/ ci nongs/ zla 'od/ khyod kyis gar ma legs pa ma yin te/ 'di ltar/ ngas khyod
gar byed pa na chud za ba'i mtshan ma mthong bas nyi ma bdun pa la khyod dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /btsun mo zla 'od kyis rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha/ gal te de lta na/ bdag
gis lha la bsnyen bkur ni/ bgyis lags na/ gal te lhas gnang na/ bdag rab tu 'byung ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ zla 'od/ dus yin gyi/ gnang ngo / /gal te khyod rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa

thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed na ni/ de khyod kyi sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/ /gal te kun tu sbyor ba lhag ma dang bcas pas dus byas te lha rnams kyi nang du skyes par gyur na
ni/ khyod lhar gyur pas nga la blta bar bya'o/ /des smras pa/ lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ rgyal po u tra ya nas btsun mo zla 'od dge slong ma rim la gtad de smras pa/ 'phags ma/ btsun mo zla
'od legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong ma'i dngos po 'tshal gyi/ de'i slad du 'phags mas 'di rab tu 'byung ba dang / rdzogs
par bsnyen par mdzad pa'i rigs so/ /dge slong ma ri mas smras pa/ de ltar bgyi'o/ /zhes des rab tu phyung zhing rdzogs par bsnyen par byas so/ /dge slong ma ri mas bsam pas de la 'chi ba'i
'du shes sgoms shig ces gdams ngag byin no/ /btsun mo zla 'od kyis 'chi ba'i 'du shes sgom par brtsams nas de nyi ma bdun pa la dus la bab nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du
skyes so/ /lha'i bu'am/ lha'i bu mo'i chos nyid ni/ skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la sems gsum skye ste/ gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis skyes pa'o/ /lha'i bu mo
zla 'od kyis bsam pa/ bdag gang nas shi 'phos snyam na/ mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes snyam na/ rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis snyam
snyam na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa nyid kyis skyes par mthong ngo / /de nas lha'i bu mo zla 'od 'di snyam du sems te/ gang gi phyir bdag yongs su gnas pa bsten te
bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni/ bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyi/ bdag yongs su gnas pa ma bsten pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /

bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i bu mo zla 'od rna cha gdub kor g.yo zhing / dri ma med pa thogs te do shal dang / se mo dos brgyan pa'i lus kyis/ lha'i ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang /
ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis thu ba bkang ste kha dog shin tu 'das pas mtshan mo la bab pa dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das
la me tog dag gis mngon par gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang / 'di ltar/ lha'i bu mo zla 'od kyi kha dog gi mthus 'od ma'i

tshal ka lan+da ka'i gnas thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo zla 'od kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ gang

thos na lha'i bu mo zla 'od kyis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur
'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do/ /des bden pa mthong nas btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag
la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/
khams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho

ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag go /zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du
brjod do/ /yang smras pa/ khyod mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i/ /ngan song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i/ /mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob
par 'gyur/ /shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni/ /de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing / /go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol brgal bar 'gyur/ /

'gro bar lha mi na mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral pa po/ /srid ba stong du mthong ba rab dkon pa/ /thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis/ /de nas 'dud byas do shal rab 'chang
bas/ /zhabs la phyag 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur nas/ /dgra thul g.yas nas yongs su bskor byas te/ /lha yi 'jig mngon phyogs mkha' la song / /de nas lha'i bu mo zla 'od tshong pa khe spogs rnyed
pa lta bu dang / zhing ba lo thog 'byor ba lta bu dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang / nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar pa lta bur gyur te/ cha lugs gang gis bcom ldan 'das

kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i cha lugs de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rgyal po u tra ya na la khas blangs pas da de lta ba'i dus yin no/ /snyam nas/ de nas lha'i
bu mo zla 'od/ rgyal po u tra ya na ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe na rgyal po u tra ya na gcig pu steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs pa na nyal zhing 'dug nas des de snang
ba rgya chen pos khyab par byas te se gol gyi sgras bslang ba dang / de gnyid kyis non pa'i mig dang / rnam par shes pa mi gsal bas smras pa/ khyod su/ des smras pa/ bdag zla 'od do/ /rgyal pos
smras pa/ tshur shog /dga' mgur spyad par bya'o/ /des smras pa/ lha/ bdag shi zhing dus la bab nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ gal te bdag dang lhan cig mjal bzhed na/
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rab tu byung zhig dang / gal te tshe 'di nyid la nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du mdzad na ni/ de nyid khyod kyi sdug bsngal gyi mtha'
lags so/ /gal te kun tu sbyor ba lhag ma dang bcas pas dus bgyis te rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes par gyur na ni/ der khyod bdag dang mjal bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras te/
de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// //'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po don gcig pa/ rgyal po u tra ya nas mtshan thog thag tu rab tu 'byung ba rjes su bsam nas nang par langs
te blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /bcun mo zla 'od ga la 'dug /ltos shig /de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ dus la bab bo/ /rgyal po u tra ya nas bsam pa/ gang gi phyir bdag
la lha mos bskul nas bdag khyim pa khyim gyi nang na gnas shing gsog 'jog gi longs spyod dang / 'dod pa la yongs su spyod pa ni/ bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyi/ bdag gis gzhon nu gtsug

phud can rgyal srid la dbang bskur te bdag skra dang / kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig dag bgos te yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo / /snyam nas/ des blon po'i mchog he ru

dang / b+hi ru ka gnyis mngag pas bos te smras pa/ shes ldan gnyis/ bu gzhon nu gtsug phud can nga la ci 'dra ba de kho na bzhin du khyed gnyis la yang de 'dra ba yin gyi/ khyed gnyis kyis de gnod pa las
bzlog par bya zhing / phan pa la nges par sbyar bar gyis shig /nga ni/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ngo / /de gnyis kyis thos nas mchi mas brnangs te 'khod do/ /rgyal pos gzhon

nu gtsug phud can la smras pa/ bu/ khyod ji ltar nga'i tshig mnyan pa dang / bya bar sems pa de bzhin du khyod kyis blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang / b+hi ru ka 'di gnyis kyi tshig mnyan pa dang / bya bar soms shig

nga ni/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ngo / /des kyang thos nas mchi mas brnangs te 'dug go /de nas rgyal po u tra ya na grong khyer sgra sgrog tu dril sgrog pa byed du bcug ste/ grong
khyer sgra sgrog na gnas pa dag dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dag dang / yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams la/ shes ldan dag nyon cig /nga ni/ skra dang / kha spu bregs te gos ngur
smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung gi /ngas rgyal srid byed du bcug pa na/ gang la gnod pa cung zad ci byas pa de bzod
par gyis shig ces bsgo'o/ /grong khyer sgra sgrog na gnas pa rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams rgyal po la rjes su chags pa yin pas
de dag gis thos nas thams cad mchi mas brnangs te 'khod do/ /de nas rgyal po u tra ya nas gzhon nu gtsug phud can rgyal srid la bzhag nas rtsa lag gi skye bo rnams la bzod par gsol te/
dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas te mi bsnyen bkur ba gcig dang / rgyal po'i khab logs su phyogs der 'phags
so| |de nas rgyal po gtsug phud can btsun mo'i 'khor dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs

rnams phyi bzhin phyi bzhin du 'brangs te srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag gis bskyal bzhin du grong khyer sgra sgrog nas phyir byung ste skyed mos tshal shing ljon pa'i tshal sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ me tog

dang / 'bras bu dang / chu rgyun sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u sgra 'byin pa zhig tu yud tsam

zhig bsdad nas grong khyer sgra sgrog logs su rnam par bltas te rgyal po gtsug phud can la smras pa/ bu/ ngas chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug pas/ de'i phyir srog chags 'bum phrag 'di snyed nga'i phyi bzhin

'brang bar gyur gyi/ khyod kyis kyang chos kyi rgyal srid byed du gzhug par bya'o/ /skye bo'i tshogs de la yang bag phab ste smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ngas khyed kyi rgyal por 'di bskos kyi/ phyir dengs la bde
bar sgrubs shig /ces smras te song ngo / /rgyal po gtsug phud can btsun mo'i 'khor dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang yul tha dad pa nas
lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams mchi mas dkrugs pa'i mig gis yud tsam yud tsam phyi bzhin rtog cing grong khyer sgra sgrog tu phyir log go /de nas rgyal po u tra ya nas mthar gyis grong khyer rgyal

po'i khab tu phyin nas des skyed mos tshal du bsdad de/ mi de la smras pa/ kwa'e nang rje/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i gan du song la rgyal po u tra ya na skyed mos tshal na sdod do/ /zhes sbron cig /mi de

song ste rgyal po gzugs can snying po la/ lha/ rgyal po u tra ya na skyed mos tshal na sdod do/ /zhes sbran to/ /des thos nas 'phral kho na la langs te zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag
rgyal po de dpung chen po ngang ldan pa yin/ des ma sbran pa kho nar 'ongs pa khyed cag sus kyang ma shes so/ /des smras pa/ lha/ de la dpung ga la mchis te/ dpon g.yog gnyis po zhig mchis so/ /rgyal
po gzugs can snying pos bsam pa/ gang gi phyir bdag gi rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba bgyi na/ de bzhin du grong khyer du 'jug tu gzhag pa ni/ bdag gi tshul dang
mthun pa ma yin gyi/ bdag gis bkur sti chen pos 'jug tu gzhug go /snyam du rig nas lam mdzes pa dang / grong khyer mdzes par byed du bcug nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pas bsu'o/ /

de nas gnya' ba sprad de glang po che'i rgyab tu zhon nas grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu 'jug tu bcug ste/ spos sna tshogs dang sbyar ba'i chus khrus byed du bcug nas rgyal po la 'os pa'i gos dag dang / spos
dang / phreng ba rgyu dang byug pa sna tshogs dag gis legs par brgyan nas zan byin te lam gyis dub pa'i ngal bsos nas smras pa/ shed mthun dgyes pas rgyal srid rgyas pa dang / btsun mo'i
'khor dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams spangs te 'dir ci la byon/ sa gzhan gyi rgyal po 'ga' zhig gis yul 'khor gzhom par bgyis pa'am/ gzhon nu rgyal
srid la mngon par dga' ba/ blon po skyon chags pas bslus pa 'ga' zhig gis bslus pa'am/ gcig tu ma gyur tam/ des smras pa/ shed mthun dgyes pa/ de ltar ma gyur te/ bdag
legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos thos nas yid dga' zhing / dga'
ste ro stod bsrang nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyangs te/ kye ma sangs rgyas/ kye ma chos/ kye ma dge 'dun/ kye ma chos kyi legs par gsungs pa nyid/ 'di ltar/ skyes bu gtso bo 'di lta bu dag gis
rgyal srid rgyas pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor rgyas pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs rgya chen po dang / mdzod dang / bang ba dang / khyim rgya chen po dag spangs te legs par gsungs

pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong gi dngos po 'dod pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa smras nas rgyal po u tra ya na khrid de
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du ma'i gong na bzhugs shing chos ston par mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+har byung ba'i rgyal po
gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po thag ring po kho na nas gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'di ni/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po yin te/ de
skyes dang bcas pas nga'i gan du 'ong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes ni/ 'di lta ste/ gdul ba'i skyes lta bu gzhan med do/ /zhes bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /rgyal po
gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying
pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ rgyal po u tra ya na 'di/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong gi dngos
po 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du 'di rab tu 'byung du gsol/ rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dge slong tshur shog ces pas rab

tu phyung zhing / dge slong tshur shog /tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i mjug kho nar skra byi ba dang / snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/ skra dang / kha
spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang / lag pa lhung bzed dang / bya ma bum gyis 'brel ba dang / dge slong rdzogs par bsnyen nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/ /yang smras pa
de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ /skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing / /mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par
gyur/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya na snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /de skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis mthong
nas grong khyer rgyal po'i khab thams cad du bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po u tra ya na rab tu phyung / rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad nas de bsod snyoms la rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs so/ /

zhes de lta bu'i sgra sgrog par gyur to/ /de skad thos nas srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag 'dus par gyur cing / khyim gyi nang na gnas pa'i bud med dag kyang skar khung dang / skar khung dra ba can dang / lan

kan dag gi drung du 'khod de lta bar byed do/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying po la blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ rgyal po u tra ya na rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs te srog chags 'bum phrag du
ma dag gis bskor cing mchis so/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos de thos nas dge slong u tra ya na ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ dge slong u tra ya na la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/ /mi

dbang grong khyer stong dang ni/ /sgra sgrog kyang ni spyad byas nas/ /bor ba'i bsod snyoms tshol byed pa/ /ji ltar yongs su mi gdung ngam/ /gser dang de bzhin dngul gyi snod/ /srang tshad brgya pa spyad byas
nas/ /sa yi lhung bzed spyod byed pa/ /ji ltar yongs su mi gdung ngam/ /sA lu'i 'bras chan gtsang ma dag /sha yis brlan pa spyad byas nas/ /zan dron khengs pa spyod byed pa/ /ji ltar yongs su
mi gdung ngam/ /srin bal ras bal zar ma dang / /ko ta ma ka shi'i gos spangs nas/ /phyag dar khrod dag bsrel byed pa/ /ji ltar yongs su mi gdung ngam/ /rlung med sgo gtan bsdams pa yi/ /khang pa

brtsegs par khyod nyal na/ /shing ljon drung du gnas gyur pa/ /ji ltar yongs su mi gdung ngam/ /'jam zhing ras bal 'dra ba yi/ /mal khri dag la khyod nyal nas/ /rtswa yi stan la nyal gyur pa/ /ji ltar
yongs su mi gdung ngam/ /btsun mo mtshungs pa yid 'ong ba/ /gus par nyal cing snyan smra ba/ /du ma khyod kyis rnam spangs pa/ /ji ltar yongs su mi gdung ngam/ /glang
chen gnya' dang shing rta dang / /rta yi bzhon pas khyod song nas/ /rkang pas sa la rgyu byed pa/ /ji ltar yongs su mi gdung ngam/ /nor mang ldan pa'i mdzod dang ni/ /bang ba dag kyang rnam spangs
te/ /ci yang med pa thob gyur pa/ /ji ltar yongs su mi gdung ngam/ /u tra ya nas smras pa/ rgyal po gal te gdul dka' ba/ /gzhan gyi zas kyis 'tsho byed na/ /ma grub pas ni de 'dul te/ /
gnya' shing ba lang 'dul ba bzhin/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos smras pa/ /rgyal po khyod yid mi bde'am/ /ci'i phyir dman pa bzhin du smra/ /rgyal srid phyed ni sbyin bya yi/ /khyod ni sngon
bzhin longs spyod gyis/ /rgyal po khyod yid mi bde'am/ /ci'i phyir dman pa bzhin du smra/ /yid kyis gang dang gang 'dod pa'i/ /longs spyod rab mchog sbyin par bya/ /u tra ya nas smras pa/
rgyal po gang zhig 'jig rten na/ /lus kyi chos reg bkren pa min/ /de ni nges par lha nyid dang / /yang na mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /mi dbang gang zhig chos spong zhing / /'di la chos min dga'
byed pa/ /rgyal po de bkren shes par bya/ /mun nas mun par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /khyod la chos ni bstan bya yi/ /rgyal po chen po bdag la nyon/ /chos thos 'og tu rgyal po ni/ /gang du 'dod par
'gro bar 'gyur/ /yon tan med pa'i lus la ni/ /gcig nyid yon tan chen po ste/ /ji lta ji ltar bzung byas pa/ /de lta de ltar rjes 'jug 'gyur/ /rgyal po bcu pa'i bcu po 'di/ /skyes bu'i tsher ni
brjod par bya/ /bu dang chung ma nor de la/ /rtsed mo dga' ba ci zhig yod/ /bu yis dga' ba ston byed de/ /chung mas khengs pa rjod par byed/ /chom rkun nor ni sgrub byed de/ /rgyal po bdag ni bcings
las grol/ /mthar byed pa las sman dag dang / /nor dang nye dus skyo ba mi nus/ /rig sngags kun dang dpung dag dang / /dpa' rtul gyis kyang skyob nus min/ /'di na mthu chen gnas mthol/ /gnas

pa'i lha tshe ring po yang / /de yang tshe zad nyams 'gyur bas/ /'chi las de ring su zhig mthar/ /mthu chen nor ldan grags 'bar ba/ /rgyal srid byas pa khyab 'jug dang / /mun byed sgra ngan skya seng bu/ /des

kyang 'chi ba zlog ma nus/ /rgyal po sdom brtson dka' thub dang / /las dang brtson 'grus brtul ba dang / /'khor tshogs rgya chen nor dag gis/ /'chi las ji ltar thar mi nus/ /bar snang rgya mtsho'i nang dang ni/ /
ri yi sul du zhugs pa'am/ /gang du gnas na 'chi bdag gis/ /mi tshugs 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs med/ /bar snang rgya mtsho'i nang dang ni/ /ri yi sul du zhugs pa'am/ /gang du gnas na las rnams kyis/ /

mi tshugs 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs med/ /rus pa thi ba'i mdog 'dra ba/ /bor zhing phyogs phyogs rnam 'thor ba/ /gang dang gang yin de dag ni/ /mthong na 'di la su zhig dga'/ /thod pa dung gi mdog 'dra ba//
bor zhing ku ba lhung lta bu/ /gang dang gang yin de dag ni/ /mthong na de la su zhig dga'/ /rgyal po tsha na sgrib byed cing / /grang la g.yogs par byed pa yi/ /khyod kyi bdag
nyid ces bya ba/ /gang yin de yang 'chi bas 'joms/ /mi yis ji tsam zas zos shing / /gyon nam yang na byin pa de/ /de yi rang gi shes bya ste/ /gzhan ni bor te 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mi yi rkun pos
mi 'phrog dang / /gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /gter ni sbyin pa'am yang na ni/ /legs byas gzhan gyis sba par bya/ /stag gis ri dwags bsad 'dren ltar/ /na rga 'chi bas khyod myur 'dren//
mdza' bshes blon tshogs kun 'dus pas/ /khyod kyi nad ni sel mi nus/ /de la spyad lhag nor 'bru dang / /gser dngul gang dag yod pa la/ /bu dang chung ma 'khor bcas dag /bgo skal nyid du

sems par byed/ /gal te pha shi bu lon chags/ /bu sdug de la me mi 'khyer/ /shi na phyi bzhin mi ngu zhing / /bdag gi pha'am rjer mi smra/ /phyug shes bdag gi pha zer zhing / /skra bshig mchi ma'i bzhin gyis
du| |me yang mdun du 'khyer byed cing / /kye ma 'di ni lhar gyur zer/ /gos kyis bkab bzhin 'khyer byed cing / /me btang de nas sreg par byed/ /nye du du zhing gos gcig gis/ /de bsregs spangs
te longs spyod byed/ /de gcig skye zhing skye tshe gcig /de bzhin gcig 'chi 'chi tshe gcig /skye 'dir gcig pus sdug bsngal myong / /'khor bar 'gyur la grogs med do/ /de mthong 'di la dam pa
rnams/ /rab byung khyim na 'dug mi byed/ /de dag chags pa kun bral nas/ /phyin cad mngal na 'jug mi 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po/ /dge slong u tra ya nas gong du nas gong du spobs

pas lan glan pas cang mi smra zhing spobs pa med par gyur te song ngo / /de nas rgyal po gtsug phud can gyis re zhig ji srid du chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug nas chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du gzhug
par brtsams pa dang / de la blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang / b+he ru ka gnyis kyis smras pa/ lha/ chos kyis rgyal srid bgyid du stsol la/ chos ma lags pas bgyid du ma stsal cig /de ci'i slad
du zhe na/ lha/ yul gyi mi dag ni/ me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dag dang 'dra ba'i slad du ste/ lha/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras
bu'i shing ljon pa dag ni/ dus dang dus su legs par yongs su bskyangs na/ bar chad ma mchis pa'i sbyor bas dus ji lta ba bzhin du me tog dang / 'bras bu dag 'byin par bgyid do/ /lha/ de
bzhin du yul gyi mi dag kyang / dus dang dus su legs par yongs su bskyangs pa na/ bar chad ma mchis pa'i sbyor bas dus ji lta ba bzhin du dpya dang / lo thang dag 'bul bar bgyid do/ /de de
gnyis kyis bzlog pa na/ re zhig ji srid du chos kyis rgyal srid byed du bcug nas yang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du gzhug par brtsams pa dang / de la de gnyis kyis lan gsum gyi bar du yang
smras na/ sred pa 'phros pa dang ldan pas bzlog kyang mi sdod de/ de khros nas blon po gzhan dag la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gang gi rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang
bskur ba'i bka' lan gsum gyi bar du yang gcog pa de'i chad pa ji lta bu yin/ de na blon po skyon chags pa kha cig gis smras pa/ lha/ 'di la rma ci 'tshal te/ de'i chad pa ni/ dgum pa lags so/ /

tshigs su bcad pa dag kyang smras pa/ blon po skyon ni chags pa dang / /'gul bar gyur pa'i so dang ni/ /zas la skyon ni chags pa dag /phyung ba 'ba' zhig bde bar 'gyur/ /blon po blo dang ldan gyur cing / /
shes rab dang ni 'dul la mkhas/ /mdzod nas go 'phang gnas pa ni/ /gang gis mi gsod des gsod 'gyur/ /rgyal po gtsug phud can gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'di gnyis ni/ nga'i yab
kyis bskos pa yin pas/ nga 'di gnyis gsod par mi byed do/ /'di ltar 'di gnyis kyis nga'i mig sngar 'dug par mi bya'o/ /zhes de gnyis kyi go bzlog nas skyon chags pa gzhan gnyis shig blon por bskos
pa dang / de gnyis kyis smras pa/ lha/ til ma brdungs pa dang ma brtsal pa dang / ma bsros pa dang / ma btsir ba dag gis til mar mi 'byin te/ mi'i dbang po/ skye bo dag kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /rgyal
pos smras pa/ khyed gnyis kyis byas pa gang yin pa de ni/ mchog tu brtson pa yin no/ /de gnyis kyis yul gyi mi rnams la gnod pa bya bar brtsams so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na tshong pa zhig zong

thogs te grong khyer sgra sgrog nas rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya nas de mthong nas ngo shes te smras pa/ ji ltar sgra sgrog dag na gtsug phud can/ /'khor dang tshogs bcas stobs ldan
nad med dam/ /de la phas kyi bsngo ba 'ga' med cing / /rang gi rgyal srid chos kyis byed 'jug gam/ /des smras pa/ lha/ de bzhin sgra sgrog dag na gtsug phud can/ /'khor dang tshogs bcas stobs
ldan bro ma 'tshal/ /de la phas kyi bsdo ba ma mchis te/ /rgyal srid rtag tu chos ma lags pas bgyid/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya nas mthar gyis dri bar brtsams pa/ de na blon po gang ni/ gtso
bo yin/ gang ni/ gtso bo ma yin/ gang gi dbang gis gtsug phud can yul gyi mi dag la gnod par byed/ des smras pa/ lha/ blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang / b+he ru ka gnyis kyi go ni/ bzlog /skyon
chags pa gzhan gnyis shig ni/ blon por bskos te/ de gnyis kyi dbang gis gtsug phud can yul gyi mi dag la gnod par bgyid do/ /u tra ya nas smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje/ khyod song la sgra sgrog

na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs legs par dbugs phyung zhig dang / nga yang der ldog tu 'ong ste/ nga nyid kyis gtsug phud can ci nas kyang yul gyi mi rnams la gnod par mi byed pa de ltar gnod pa las ldog

par bya zhing / phan pa la nges par sbyar bar bya'o/ /tshong pa des zong bsgyur te zong rin khyer nas 'phags te mthar gyis sgra sgrog tu phyin nas des nyed du rnams la gsang ste smras pa/ shes ldan dag /kho
bo zong thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu son nas/ kho bos der rgyal po bgres po mthong nas de'i zhal nas/ kwa'i nang rje/ khyod song la sgra sgrog na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs
legs par dbugs phyung zhig dang / nga yang der ldog tu 'ong ste/ nga nyid kyis gtsug phud can ci nas kyang yul gyi mi rnams la gnod par mi byed pa de ltar gnod pa las ldog par bya zhing / phan pa
la nges par sbyar bar bya'o/ /zhes byung ngo / /de dag gis kyang gzhan dag la brjod cing / de dag gis kyang gzhan dag la brjod pas/ de ltar sgra de rna ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas blon po
skyon chags pa de gnyis kyi rna bar son nas de gnyis kyis bsam pa/ gal te rgyal po rgan po 'ong bar gyur na des gdon mi za bar he ru ka dang / b+hi ru ka gnyis/ yang blon po'i mchog tu bsko
zhing / bdag cag gnyis la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyi/ de'i phyir gang gis de lam gar gsod du 'jug par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o/ /snyam nas de gnyis kyis rgyal po gtsug phud
can la smras pa/ lha/ rgyal po bgres po 'byon par 'gyur zhes gda'o/ /des smras pa/ de rab tu byung bas/ de ci'i phyir 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ lha/ gang gis
gdugs gcig rgyal srid bgyid du stsal ba de ni/ lha/ rgyal srid ma mchis pas dga' bar ga la 'gyur te/ da yang rgyal srid bgyid du stsol bar 'tshal lo/ /gtsug phud can gyis smras pa/ gal

te de rgyal por gyur na/ nga nyid kyis gzhon nu bya ste/ 'di la 'gal ba ci yod/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ lha/ de ni/ tshul dang mthun pa ma lags te/ gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang /
yul gyi mi dag gis thal mo stong dag gis phyag bgyis pas rgyal srid bgyid du stsal nas/ yang ji ltar gzhon nu'i gnas su gnas par mdzad/ yul yongs su gtang ba ni/ mi bsdo yi/ gzhon nu'i

gnas su gnas pa ni/ mi rung ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ mi zhig glang po che'i gnya' bar mchis nas rta'i rgyab tu mchi ba dang / rta'i rgyab tu mchis nas shing rtas mchi ba dang / shing rtas mchis
nas rkang pa gnyis kho nas mchi ba bzhin du/ rgyal srid bgyid du stsal nas/ yang gzhon nu'i gnas na gnas pa yang / de dang 'dra'o/ /de gnyis kyis bslus nas des smras pa/ 'o na 'di la gang rigs /
'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ lha/ de 'gum du stsal bar bgyi'o/ /gal te 'gum du ma stsal na/ gor ma bkum par blon po skyon chags pa dag dang bsdongs te lha nyid dgrongs

par bgyid do/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / de bzhin gyur cing nyams te yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar 'dug nas mchi mas brnangs pa'i snying gis snying rje zhing zhum pa dang thogs pa'i yid dag gis smras
pa/ shes ldan gnyis/ ji ltar yab bgrongs su rung / de gnyis kyis smras pa/ lhas/ pha'am yang na spun dag gam/ /rang las skyes pa'i bu yang rung / /gal te dgra khrod zhugs gyur na/ /sa phung
'phel ba nyid du bya/ /zhes bgyi ba ma gsan tam/ yang smras pa/ lhas/ gang la bu pho stong bdog cing / /thams cad gru gcig zhugs gyur la/ /der ni dgra bo gcig byung na//

de yi don du de nub bya/ /zhes bgyi ba yang ma gsan tam/ /lhas gzhan dag nas/ khyim gyi phyir ni gcig gtang bya/ /grong phyir khyim ni gtang bar bya/ /ljongs phyir grong ni gtang bya ste/ /bdag nyid phyir
ni sa gtang bya/ /zhes 'byung ba yang ma gsan tam/ /lha/ 'di la dgongs par bgyi ba ci yang ma mchis te/ de ni/ dgum par bgyi lags pas/ 'gum du stsal bar bgyi'o/ /gal te lha 'di la phyi
bshol mdzad nas lha la rjes su chags pa'i gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi gang dag lags pa de dag 'khrugs par gyur na/ gor ma bkum par lha la gnod pa bgyid
par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa dag la brten pas ni/ sdig pa'i las mi bya ba ci yang med pas des de ltar gyis shig ces khas blangs so/ /de nas blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang /
mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas mi gshed ma pa dag la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /dengs la rgyal po rgan po sod cig dang / khyed cag la longs spyod dag gi bgo bsha' bya'o/ /rgyal po de la pho brang 'khor
mi dang / yul gyi mi thams cad rjes su chags pas de gsod par spro ba 'ga' yang med do/ /de gnyis kyis de dag la lan gsum gyi bar du yang dbyig dang / gser dang / grong sbyin pa la sogs pas

spro bar byas na/ spro ba 'ga' yang ma byung nas/ de nas de gnyis khro bos kun nas dkris pas phyag sbal srung nga rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /dengs la mi de dag bu dang / chung ma dang / rtsa lag dang
mdza' bshes dang / nye du'i tshogs dang bcas pa chings la phyag sbal du chug cig /de dag gis thos nas skrag par gyur te smras pa/ lha nyag mi bzhes su gsol/ bdag cag ni/ phyag rjed bka'
nyan pa dag lags kyi mchi'o/ /zhes de dag gis ral gri rnon po mchan du bcug ste 'phags so/ /tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya na dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/ chos gos
zin pa dang ldan pas/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag grong khyer sgra sgrog tu ljongs rgyu zhing mchi bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ u tra ya na/ song la khyod kyis las bdag gir bya ba yid la

bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya na de nyid kyi mtshan mo
'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la rgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te phyi ma'i zas kyi
bsod snyoms las phyir log pas/ ji ltar longs spyod pa'i gnas mal mkhos su phab ste lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas las kyis bdas te song ngo / /las kyis ring du
'dren byed de/ /ring nas las kyis 'dren par byed/ /gang du las rnams smin 'gyur ba/ /der ni las kyis rab tu 'drin/ /de grong khyer sgra sgrog ga la ba der song nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na/
lam gar ri brag cig yod pa der bsod snyoms la zhugs nas de de nas bsod snyoms rgyus te song ba dang / mi gshed ma de dag dang phrad nas de dag gis de mthong ngo / /des kyang de dag ngo shes
nas de de dag dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal zhig tu mtshan mo gnas par khas blangs nas des de dag la dri bar brtsams pa/ ji ltar sgra sgrog dag na gtsug phud can/ /'khor dang tshogs bcas
stobs ldan nad med dam/ /de la phas kyi bsdo ba 'ga' med cing / /rang gi rgyal srid chos kyis byed 'jug gam/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ de bzhin sgra sgrog dag na gtsug phud can/ /'khor dang
tshogs bcas stobs ldan bro ma 'tshal/ /de la phas kyi bsngo ba ma mchis te/ /rgyal srid rtag tu chos ma lags pas bgyid/ /mi mchod khyod kyi tshul dang mthun pa yi/ /'phags dngos mngon rtogs
gang lags khyod kyis mdzod/ /zhi ba de mi tshul mthun gang lags pa/ /de ni de ring nye bar gzigs par gyur/ /tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ci/ de nga der 'ongs pa la
mngon par mi dga' 'am/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ mngon par mi dga'o/ /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ gal te de lta na mi 'gro'i/ phyir ldog par bya'o/ /de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/
skyes bu pa khyod slar ni gang du gshegs/ /sras ni khyod gson mngon par mi dga' ste/ /bdag cag byur ngan rgyal pos bsgos rnams kyis/ /'dir ni khyod bgrongs slad du mchis kyis 'tshal/ /tshe dang ldan
pa u tra ya nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ khyed cag nga gsod pa'i gshed ma pa dag yin nam/ lha/ bdag cag khyod bgrongs pa'i gshed ma pa dag lags so/ /tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya nas bsam pa/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la u tra ya na/ song la khyod kyis las bdag gir bya ba yid la bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'di yin pa lta ste/ 'khor ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du ngan pa/

snying po med pa/ 'jigs pa'i chos can yin no/ /snyam du rig nas de dag la smras pa/ bzhin bzang dang / nga don gang gi phyir rab tu byung ba'i don de/ ngas da dung ma thob kyi/ re zhig nga rang gi don

rjes su sgrub kyi bar du yud tsam zhig sdod cig /de dag gis phan tshun gros byas te smras pa/ lha/ de ltar mdzod cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya nas shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du brten nas brang
'gro'i rgyal po gnyid log pa'i lus bskyil ba ltar skyil mo krung bcas te spyod lam zhi bas 'dug go /bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa la phan yon lnga yod de/ phung po la mkhas pa dang /
khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / de'i gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa gzhan la rag ma las
pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pas/ des brtson 'grus brtsams pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang / ltung ba
dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyi zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag
bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de/ tshe 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas
te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /bya ba byas so/ /srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so/ /zhes go bar byed cing / dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags
dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan bzhag pa lta bu rig pas sgo nga'i spubs dral bar gyur cing / rig pa
dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis

mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya nas dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang / bde ba so sor yang dag par
rig pa na/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ dge slong u tra ya na ni/ /mdud pa'i sbyor ba zug rngu dang / /de bzhin sgrib las thar gyur kyang / /rgyal po'i chos las deng mthar/ /ces smras nas mi
gshed ma de dag la smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag /ngas thob par bya ba gang yin pa de thob zin gyi/ da ni/ khyed cag don gang gi phyir 'ongs pa'i don de thob par bya'o/ /de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ gal te
rgyal po gtsug phud can bdag cag la rgyal po rgan pos 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe ci zhig smras zhes rmed na/ bdag cag gis de la ji skad brjod par bgyi/ bzhin bzang dag/ de la 'di skad ces/ rgyal srid
phyir ni pha bsad pas/ /bsod nams ma yin mang po bskyed/ /nga ni yongs su mya ngan 'da'/ /khyod ni mnar med 'gro bar 'gyur/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gzhan yang 'di skad ces/ khyod kyis
mtshams med pa gnyis byas te/ pha srog dang bral ba gang yin pa dang / dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa srog dang bral ba gang yin pa de gnyis kyis khyod yun ring por sems can dmyal ba
chen po mnar med par gnas par bya dgos kyi/ sdig pa sna tshogs las shogs shig dang / de ltar na/ las bsrabs pa nyid dang / yongs su mthar thug par 'gyur ro/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /
tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya nas yang bsam pa/ sems can de sems can dmyal ba chen po la gzhol bar gyur na/ mi rung gi /rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro'o/ /snyam nas des rdzu
'phrul gyi thabs gang dang gang yin brtsams na/ de'i las kyis non pas rdzu zhes bya ba tsam yang snang bar ma gyur na/ rdzu 'phrul lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas mi gshed ma pa de dag las/ mi
snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten pha rol btang ba zhig gis ral gri shubs nas phyung ste de'i mgo drungs nas bcad nas sa la bsgyel to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa
mdzad do/ /chos nyid kyis na/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe na zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang /
btsod kha dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas/ kha cig ni/ 'og logs su 'dong / kha cig ni/ steng logs su 'dong bas/ gang dag 'og logs su 'dong ba de dag
ni/ sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus gzhom dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur
rdol ba dang / so thams thams pa dang / kyi hud zer ba dang / a chu zer ba dang / ut+pal ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por dong ste/ sems can dmyal ba
tsha ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni/ bsil bar gyur te 'bab par byed la/ sems can dmyal ba grang ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni/ dro bar gyur te 'bab par byed do/ /des sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i
bye brag dag rgyun gcod par byed cing / de dag 'di snyam du shes ldan dag /ci/ bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes snyam du sems so/ /de dag dad pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir
bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa gtong bar mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du/ shes ldan dag /bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin la/ gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin te/
'di ltar/ sems can sngon ma mthong ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gis gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun chad par gyur to/ /snyam du sems so/ /de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur nas sems can

dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas gang du bden pa dag gi snod du gyur par 'gyur ba'i lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nyid mtshams sbyor ba len par byed do/ /gang dag steng logs su 'dong
ba de dag ni/ rgyal chen bzhi pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don

dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi
che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang dang / shin tu mthong dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du dong nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang /
bdag med pa zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrog par byed cing / tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po/ /brtsam par bya zhing dbyung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /
'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/ /gang zhig rab tu bag yod pas/ /chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba yang smras
so| /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byul nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi slad bzhin slad bzhin du rjes su 'dong ste/ de la gal te bcom ldan 'das
'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su nub par 'gyur/ sems can
dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur/ dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi long bur nub par 'gyur/ yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par
bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur/ mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bus mor nub par 'gyur/ stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag mthil
g.yon par nub par 'gyur/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag mthil g.yas par nub par 'gyur/ lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar nub par 'gyur/ nyan
thos kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du nub par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdzod spur nub par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni/ gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil du nub bo/ /
de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi/ /tshogs rnams zhal gyi sgo nas byung gyur te/ /de yis phyogs rnams thams cad
snang bgyis pa/ /nyi gdugs bdal bar gyur pa ji bzhin no/ /yang tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa rab spangs pa/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba mchog gi rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba

dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis par/ /rtsa lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad/ /de slad brtan pa rang blos dus mkhyen nas/ /thub pa khyu mchog dge sbyong skye dbang po/ /nyan pa'i skye bo som nyi ldan
rnams la/ /the tshom skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa dang / /dam pa dge ba dag gis bsal du gsol/ /tsha chu ri rgyal lta bu brtan pa yi/ /sangs rgyas mgon rnams glo bur 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan rnams ci
slad 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /skye bo'i tshogs rnams de ni nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/
kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ltar/ dge slong u tra yan
ni| |mdud pa sbyor ba zug rngu dang / /de bzhin sgrib las thar gyur kyang / /rgyal po'i chos las deng ma thar/ /kun dga' bo/ grong khyer sgra sgrog na gnas pa'i rgyal po gtsug phud can sdig pa'i
grogs pos bskor bas/ dge slong u tra ya na dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa srog dang bral bar byas te/ des pha dgra bcom pa srog dang bral bar byas pas/ nges par sems can dmyal ba chen
po mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya na dgra bcom pa nyid thob cing / srog dang bral bar gyur tam/ kun dga' bo/ u tra ya na dgra bcom pa nyid thob cing srog
dang bral bar gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de thos nas mchims brnangs te 'dug go /de nas gshed ma pa mi de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya na'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang /
mkhar gsil khyer te grong khyer sgra sgrog tu phyin nas de dag gis blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis la smras pa/ rgyal po rgan po bsad do/ /de gnyis kyis thos nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba

skyes te rgyal po gtsug phud can ga la ba der dong nas smras pa/ lha dgyes pa skyed cig /da ni/ lha'i rgyal srid la tsher ma mchis so/ /ji ltar gyur/ lha'i dgra gang lags pa de bkum mo/ /nga'i dgra gang
yin/ lha/ rgyal po rgan po'o/ /de bsad pa ji ltar shes/ de gnyis kyis mi gshed ma pa dag bstan te smras pa/ lha/ mi 'di dag ni/ gshed ma pa lags te/ 'di dag gis de bkum mo/ /
rgyal po gtsug phud can gyis de dag mthong nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag /rgyal po rgan po la dpung ji tsam yod/ lha/ de la dpung ga la mchis te/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / mkhar
gsil 'di lags so/ /rgyal po gtsug phud can gyis de mthong nas brgyal te sa la 'gyel nas chus btab ste dbugs phyir byung nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag /rgyal po rgan pos 'chi ba'i tshe ci smras/
lha| rgyal po rgyan po srog dang bral khar 'di skad ces/ rgyal srid phyir ni pha bsad pas/ /bsod nams ma yin mang po bskyed/ /nga ni yongs su mya ngan 'da'/ /khyod ni mnar med 'gro bar 'gyur/ /
zhes mchi'o/ /gzhan yang 'di skad ces/ khyod kyis mtshams med pa'i las gnyis byas te/ pha srog dang bral ba gang yin pa dang / dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa srog dang bral ba gang yin
pa des/ khyod yun ring por dmyal bar gnas par bya dgos kyi sdig pa sdig pa las shogs shig dang / de ltar na/ las bsrabs pa nyid dang yongs su zad pa dang / yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro/ /zhes
mchi'o/ /de mya ngan gyi zug rngus gzir bas/ 'dam bu sngon por brngas pa bzhin du rnyid par gyur nas des blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang / b+hi ru ka gnyis pos te smras pa
shas ldan gnyis/ khyed gnyis kyis nga las de lta bu byed pa las ma bzlog go /de gnyis kyis smras pa/ lhas bdag cag gnyis spyan lam du ma bzhag na/ ji ltar bzlog par bgyi/ des blon po

skyon chags pa de gnyis mig lam du mi snang bar bzhag nas he ru ka dang / b+he ru ka gnyis phyir blon po'i mchog tu bskos pa dang / blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis gsang ste tshe dang ldan pa rgyal dang

skar rgyal gyi mchod rten gnyis la khung bu gnyis bskos nas der byi la'i phrug gu gnyis bzhag ste/ de gnyis kyis nyi ma re re zhing sha sri re re byin nas 'di skad ces/ rgyal dang / skar rgyal gnyis bden
pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis khyed gnyis kyi sgyu mas 'jig rten bslus te dad pas sbyin par bya ba chud gzan pas byi la'i gnas ngan par skyes pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des/ sha sri
longs la rang rang gi mchod rten la bskor ba bgyis te rang rang gi khung du zhugs shig /ces slob par byed do/ /gang gi tshe de gnyis legs par lobs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ blon po skyon chags pa de
gnyis u tra ya na'i btsun mo'i gan du song ste smras pa/ lha mo/ khyod kyis sras rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / rke ba dang / lus ma thob par gyur na/ ci'i slad du khyod btang snyoms mdzad/ des

smras pa/ khyed gnyis nyid kyis de las de lta bu byed du bcug na/ da kho mos ji ltar bya/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ lha mo/ ci/ gang du bum pa ltung ba der dpyang thag kyang ltung bar bgyi'am/ des smras pa/ des
shes te/ re zhig de'i pha bsad pa ni/ kho mos gsang bar bya na/ dgra bcom pa bsad pa sus gsang bar 'gyur/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ lha mo/ dgra bcom pa bsad pa bdag cag gnyis kyis gsang

bar bgyi'o/ /des smras pa/ gal te de lta na/ legs so/ /zhes de'i gan du song ste smras pa/ sras/ ci'i slad du khyod skya bo seng seng po rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / rka ba dang / lus ma thob par gyur/ des

smras pa/ yum/ khyod kyang de skad ces/ ci'i phyir khyod skya bo seng seng po rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / rke ba dang lus ma thob par gyur cis gsung ngam/ gang gi slad du bdag blon po skyon chags pa gnyis kyis
bslus pas mtshams med pa'i las gnyis bgyis te/ yab srog dang bral ba gang lags pa dang / dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa srog dang bral ba gang lags pa des bdag yun ring por sems can

dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gnas par bgyi 'tshal na/ bdag ji ltar skya bo seng seng po rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / rke ba dang / lus ma thob par mi 'gyur du rung / des smras pa/ sras/ je mi 'jigs
pa stsol cig dang / gang mad pa de bka' mchid bgyi'o/ /des smras pa/ yum/ gsol gyi/ ji ltar lags pa gsungs shig /sras/ de ni/ khyod kyi yab ma lags te/ 'di ltar/ bdag gi zla mtshan
bkru ba'i slad du skyes pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad pa de las khyod 'khrungs so/ /des bsam pa/ de ltar na pha bsad par ma gyur to/ /snyam du rig nas smras
pa| yum/ gal te de ltar na/ pha bsad pa ni/ ma mchis na/ dgra bcom pa bsad pa mchis pa de/ ji ltar mthar thug par bgyi/ des smras pa/ sras/ 'di la shes pa la mkhas pa dag rma bar bgyi
ste| de dag gis de mthar thug par bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras te song nas des blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis pos te smras pa/ kho mos de'i pha bsad pa ni/ bsal zin gyi/ da khyed gnyis kyis dgra
bcom pa bsad pa sol cig /rgyal po gtsug phud can gyis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ blon po gang dag /shes pa la mkhas pa thams cad sdus shig /de dag gis blon po skyon chags pa gang dag
shes pa la mkhas pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyang der 'dus par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po gtsug phud can gyis de dag la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ngas dgra
bcom pa bsad pa gang yin pa de/ ji ltar mthar thug par bya/ de na rgyal pos nye bar 'tsho ba'i mi thams cad kyis ni/ mi mthun par smra bar brtsams te/ de na kha cig gis smras pa/ lha/ des dgra
bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis par sus mthong / kha cig gis smras pa/ lha/ dgra bcom pa dag ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa dang 'dra ste/ nam mkha' la mchi'o/ /blon po skyon chags pa
de gnyis kyis smras pa/ lha/ 'di la thugs ngan bgyir ci mchis/ des smras pa/ khyed gnyis kyang de skad ces/ 'di la mya ngan byar ci yod ces zer ram/ khyed gnyis nyid na re/ dgra bcom pa gsod du bcug
go |zhes mi zer ram/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ lha/ dgra bcom pa dag ma mchis na/ dgra bcom pa dag bkum par mchis re skan/ des smras pa/ ngas mngon sum kho nar dgra bcom pa rgyal dang / skar

rgyal gnyis kyis 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bab pa dang / klog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag byas te phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mthong
bzhin du khyed gnyis kyis de skad ces/ dgra bcom pa dag med na/ dgra bcom pa bsad pa yod re skan zhes zer ram/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ lha/ ji ltar de gnyis kyis sgyu mas 'jig rten bslus te

dad pas sbyin par bgyi ba chud gzan pas byi la'i skye gnas ngan par skyes te/ deng sang nyid du yang rang rang gi mchod rten na mchis pa/ lha'i mngon sum du bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/

shes ldan dag /gal te de ltar na tshur shog dang / ci/ yang dag pa'am/ yang dag pa ma yin pa bltar 'dong ngo / /grong khyer sgra sgrog thams cad du ji ltar rgyal dang / skar rgyal gnyis byi la'i skye gnas su skyes

te rang rang gi mchod rten na 'dug nas rgyal po bltar song ngo / /zhes bya ba'i sgra des khyab par gyur nas srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag ltad mo skyes nas rgyal po'i phyi bzhin du 'brang ngo / /de nas blon po
skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor 'bum phrag du ma'i mdun du smras pa/ rgyal dang / skar rgyal gnyis nyon cig /bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig

gang gis khyed gnyis kyis sgyu mas 'jig rten bslus te dad pas sbyin par bya ba chud gsan pas byi la'i skye gnas ngan par skyes te rang rang gi mchod rten na 'dug pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des/ sha

sri 'di longs la rang rang gi mchod rten la bskor ba bgyis te rang rang gi khung du zhugs shig /de skad smras pa dang / de gnyis kyis rang rang gi khungs nas byung ste sha sri blangs nas rang rang gi mchod rten la
bskor ba byas nas rang rang gi khung du zhugs pa/ srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag gis mthong nas blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis smras pa/ lha/ gzigs sam/ des smras pa/ mthong ngo //
de gnyis kyis smras pa/ lha/ de ltar na/ 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa dag ma mchis te/ de ni/ skye bo'i bka' mchid 'ba' zhig tu bas so/ /de nas rgyal po de la 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa dag yod do/ /
snyam pa'i lta ba yod pa gang yin pa de med par gyur to/ /de nas gang dag ma dad pa de dag la ni/ med par lta ba skyes par gyur to/ /gang dag bar mar gnas pa de dag ni/ yid gnyis za bar gyur
to| |gang dag dad pa de dag ni/ gnong zhing mi dga' ba dang / mi 'jigs pa med par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po gtsug phud can gyis bsam pa/ gal te 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa dag med na/

bdag gis ci'i phyir 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa/ dge slong ma ri ma 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa la bsod snyoms dbul snyam nas/ des dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams

kyi bsod snyoms bcad nas dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams kyang grong khyer sgra sgrog nas dong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po dang / dge slong ma ri ma ni/ gdul ba la ltos pas de nyid na 'khod

do| |ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gtsug phud can grong khyer sgra sgrog nas phyir byung ba na tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po grong khyer sgra sgrog tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / des rgyal po mthong
nas 'di mi dga' bar sems par gyur na mi rung ngo / /snyam nas mtha' gcig tu song ste sdod do/ /rgyal po gtsug phud can gyis de mtha' gcig na sdod pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang blon po rnams
la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ci'i phyir 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po 'di/ nga mthong nas mtha' gcig tu song nas sdod/ de'i phyi bzhin blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang / b+hi ru ka gnyis 'gro ba de
gnyis kyis smras pa/ lha/ 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chan po'i thugs lam na lha gshed du gzigs mo dang dge mtshan la gshegs pas mi dgyes par dgongs par gyur na mi rung ngo / /snyam pa dang / tshon

gyi las bgyi ba dka' bas chos gos dag rdul gyis phog par gyur na mi rung ngo / /snyam du dgongs so/ /rgyal po cang mi smra bar song ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos grong khyer sgra sgrog tu bsod snyoms
rgyus te phyir byung ba na/ rgyal po gtsug phud can nang du 'jug nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po de bzhin du mtha' gcig tu song ste sdod do/ /rgyal po gtsug phud can gyis de

mtha' gcig na sdod pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'phags pa kA t+yA na chen po 'dis sngar nga mthong nas mtha' gcig tu sdod pa'i rgyu ni/ de yin na/ da ltar

yang mtha' gcig tu song ste sdod pa'i rgyu ci yin/ de'i phyi bzhin blon po skyon chags pa gnyis 'gro ba de gnyis kyis smras pa/ lha/ 'di'i mchid nas kho bo pha gsod pa 'di'i rdul gyis mi reg par bya'o/ /
zhes mchi'o/ /rgyal po de ni/ yongs su mi rtog pa yin pas/ de skad thos nas khro bas kun nas dkris par gyur te/ 'khor thams cad la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /khyed cag las/ gang dang gang nga
la dga' ba de dang des dge sbyong mgo reg 'di'i steng du sa sbar mo re re gtor cig /skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis sa sbar mo re res gtor to/ /rgyal po de dpung che ba yin pas re res sa sbar mo re

tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i steng du gtor ba dang / de'i steng du sa phung chen po rnam par gnas par gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos kyang de'i dbus su lo ma ma yin pa'i spyil bu mngon par

sprul te 'dug go /de dag de la 'thor ba na/ ba lang rdzi dang / phyugs rdzi dag gis mthong nas de dag smod bzhin du mtha' 'khor zhing sdod pa na blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang b+hi ru ka gnyis phyi bzhin du

'brang zhing 'ong ba phyogs der phyin nas de gnyis kyis dris pa/ shes ldan dag /'di ci yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ rgyal po 'thab krol can pha gsod pa des/ 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po nyes pa med pa/

gnod pa mi byed pa sas bkab bo/ /de gnyis mchi mas brnangs te ngu ba'i bzhin gyis ba lang rdzi dang / phyugs rdzi dag dang lhan cig sa phyags par brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po byung
nas de gnyis kyis rkang gnyis la gtugs te dris pa/ 'phags pa/ 'di ci lags/ des smras pa/ las dag yin mod/ gzhan ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur// //'dul ba rnam
par 'byed pa/ bam po don gnyis pa/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gtsug phud can skye bo phal po che dang bcas pas las 'di lta bu bgyis pa gang lags pa de'i rnam par smin pa cir 'gyur

des smras pa/ deng nas nyi ma bdun na grong khyer sgra sgrog sas non par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa/ rim pa ji lta bur 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa gnyis/ re zhig nyi ma dang po la rlung mo che byung nas grong khyer sgra sgrog rdo

ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par rnam par 'jog par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma gnyis pa la me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma gsum pa la gos kyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma bzhi pa la dngul gyi

char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma lnga pa la gser gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu grong khyer sgra sgrog gi nye 'khor na gnas pa gang dag gis las mthun par byas pa de dag grong khyer sgra sgrog tu 'jug par
'gyur zhing / de dag zhugs pa na nyi ma drug pa la rin po che'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma bdun pa la sa'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /de gnyis kyis smras pa 'phags
pa| ci lags/ bdag cag gnyis kyang las de'i cha can lags sam/ bzhin bzang gnyis/ khyed gnyis ni/ las de'i cha can ma yin no/ /'phags pa/ gal te de ltar na/ bdag cag gnyis
kyis grong khyer 'di nas ji ltar 'byung bar bgyi/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzang gnyis/ khyed gnyis kyis rang gi khyim nas chu klung gi bar du phug rkor chug la khyim drung du gru bzhag ste sdod la

gang gi tshe rin po che'i char 'bab pa de'i tshe na rin po che dag gis gru 'gongs su chug la bros shig /de gnyis de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te grong khyer sgra sgrog tu zhugs nas de gnyis kyis rgyal
po'i gan du song ste smras pa/ lhas 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la cung zhig bgyis sam/ ci na dog sas bkab/ des smras pa/ shes ldan gnyis/ de gson nam/ lha/ gson no/ /ci
zer/ lha/ de 'di skad ces deng nas gdugs bdun na glong khyer sgra sgrog dog sas non par 'gyur zhes mchi'o/ /rim pa ji ltar 'gyur/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ lha/ de 'di skad ces/ re zhig nye

ma dang po la rlung mo che byung nas grong khyer sgra sgrog rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par rnam par 'jog par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma gnyis pa la me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma gsum pa la

gos kyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma bzhi pa la dngul gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma lnga pa la gser gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu grong khyer sgra sgrog gi nye 'khor na gnas pa gang dag
gis las mthun par byas pa de dag grong khyer sgra sgrog tu 'jug par 'gyur zhing de dag zhugs pa na nyi ma drug pa la rin po che'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma bdun pa la sa'i char 'bab par 'gyur
ro/ /zhes mchi'o/ /blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis smras pa/ lha/ bram ze gang la slong mo stsal nas yang bcad na/ de legs pa ci zhig sems te/ lhas de 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa la
bsod snyoms stsal nas bcad cing / sas kyang g.yogs pas de 'di skad mchi pa las/ gzhan pa ches shis pa'i tshig smra bar ga la 'gyur/ rgyal po gtsug phud can gyis bsam pa/ de bden no/ /

snyam pa dang / blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang / b+hi ru ka gnyis kyis bzhin bsgyur cing lag pa gnyis yongs su dril te dong ngo / /de na he ru ka la bu sngo bsangs zhes bya ba khye'u zhig yod la/ b+hi ru ka la yang bu mo

sngo bsangs can zhes bya ba bu mo zhig yod nas/ he ru kas khye'u sngo bsangs tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la phul te smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gal te 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba 'ga' zhig mchis na/ rab tu
dbyung du gsol/ gal te ma mchis na/ 'di khyod nyid kyi zham 'bring ba lags so/ /b+hi ru kas kyang bu mo sngo bsangs can dge slong ma ri ma la phul te smras pa/ 'phags ma/ gal te 'di la dge
ba'i rtsa ba 'ga' zhig mchis na/ rab tu dbyung du gsol/ gal te ma mchis na/ ko'u sham+b+hi na khyim bdag gdangs can zhes bgyi ba bdag gi chung po grogs shig

mchis pa de la gtad du gsol/ des khas blangs so/ /de nas dge slong ma ri ma bu mo sngo bsangs can khrid de rdzu 'phrul gyis grong khyer sgra sgrog nas song nas/ des bu mo de ko'u sham+b+hir khyim bdag

gdangs can la gtad nas 'phrin ji skad spring pa yang bzlas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po ni/ de nyid na 'dug po/ /blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang / b+hi ru ka gnyis kyis khyim nas chu klung gi

bar du phug rkor bcug ste/ khyim drung du gru bzhag nas bsdad do/ /ji tsam na nyi ma de la rlung mo che byung nas des grong khyer sgra sgrog de rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par rnam par bzhag go /nyi
ma gnyis pa la me tog gi char bab pa dang / blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis smras pa/ lha/ rgyal po nga las nu la dgung bdun du dbyig gi char bab ces gda' bas/ lha la yang me tog gi char 'di
bab pas/ ring po mi thogs par gos kyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma gsum pa la gos kyi char 'bab pa dang / blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis smras pa/ lha la gos kyi char 'di bab pas/
ring po mi thogs par dngul gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma bzhi pa la dngul gyi char bab pa dang / blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis smras pa/ lha la dngul gyi char bab pas/ ring po mi thogs

par gser gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma lnga pa la gser gyi char bab pa dang / blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis smras pa/ lha gser gyi char 'di bab pas/ ring po mi thogs par rin po che'i char

'bab par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu grong khyer sgra sgrog gi nye 'khor na gnas pa gang dag gis las mthun par byas pa de dag grong khyer sgra sgrog tu zhugs shing de dag zhugs pa na/ nyi ma drug pa la rin

po che'i char bab pa dang / blon po'i mchog he re ka dang / b+hi ru ka gnyis kyis rin po che de dag gis gru 'gengs su bcug ste bros so/ /de na he re kas ni/ phyogs gzhan zhig tu he ru ka'i tshal zhes bya ba'i

grong khyer rtsig tu bcug nas de'i ming ni/ he ru ka'i tshal/ he ru ka'i tshal ces bya bar gyur to/ /b+hi ru kas kyang phyogs gzhan zhig tu b+hi ru ka'i tshal ces bya ba'i grong khyer rtsig tu bcug nas de'i ming b+hi

ru ka'i tshal/ b+hi ru ka'i tshal ces bya bar gyur to/ /nyi ma bdun pa la sa'i char 'bab par brtsams pa dang / grong khyer sgra sgrog tu sgra mthon po dang / sgra chen po byung nas rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan
dag /sgra mthon po dang / sgra chen po de ci/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha sa'i char bab bo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gal te de ltar na/ blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang / b+hi ru ka ga
la 'dug tshol cig /de dag gis btsal bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na de gnyis bros par tshor nas de dag gis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ de gnyis bros te/ ma mchis so/ /de nas rgyal po gtsug
phud can 'bros par brtsams pa dang / mi ma yin dag gis sgo bcad do/ /khye'u sngo bsangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ grong khyer du sgra mthon po dang / sgra chen po byung

ba 'di ci lags/ tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA yan chen pos smras pa/ bu/ skar khung nas kham phor phyir phyung zhig/ de skar khung nas kham por phyir byung ba dang / sas phyed tsam gang bar gyur nas/ tshe

dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos bsam pa/ da dung spyod yul lhag ma dang bcas pa yin snyam mo/ /ji tsam na yang kham phor phyi rol tu phyung ba dang / byur bur gang bar gyur nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya

na chen pos bsam pa/ da ni/ spyod yul med par gyur gyi/ 'gro'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas grong khyer sgra sgrog na gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha mo gang yin pa de/ tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po ga la ba
der song ste phyin nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag kyang mchi ste/ 'phags pa'i bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/ /des dang du blangs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na

chen pos sngo bsangs la smras pa/ bu/ chos gos kyi grwa nas zungs shig dang / 'dong ngo / /des chos gos kyi grwa nas bzung ba dang / des khye'u sngo bsangs khrid de rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha'

las song ngo / /sgra sgrog na gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha mo yang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis de'i phyi bzhin song ba dang / grong khyer sgra sgrog kyang sas non par gyur to/ /de dag mthar gyis khar pan zhes bya

ba'i ri brag tu phyin nas de dag de na g.yul gyi gzhi na 'khod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos khye'u sngo bsangs g.yul gyi bzhir bzhag ste bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / lha mo de'i mthus
g.yul gyi gzhi der 'bru 'phel bar gyur nas/ de na mi gang 'dug pa des khye'u de mthong nas de'i gan du song ste smras pa/ kye khye'u/ khyod kyi mthus g.yul gyi gzhir 'bru 'phel bar gyur to/ /des
smras pa/ kho bo'i mthus g.yul gyi gzhir 'bru 'phel bar gyur pa ma yin te/ 'di ltar/ grong khyer sgra sgrog na gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha mo 'dir 'ongs te/ phyogs ga ge mo zhig na 'dug pa de'i

mthus g.yul gyi gzhir 'bru 'phel bar gyur to/ /de de'i gan du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ lha mo/ bdag grong du mchis te mchi ba'i bar du re zhig lde mig dang / lde mig kyog po 'di bzung
zhing khyod kyis bdag ma lags pa gzhan su la yang mi stsal bar gsol/ des blangs pa dang / mi de yang ri brag tu song nas ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs bsdus te smras pa/ shes ldan dag /grong
khyer sgra sgrog na gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha mo 'dir 'ongs te/ g.yul gyi gzhi na 'dug pas de'i mthus g.yul gyi gzhir 'bru 'phel bar gyur nas/ bdag gis de'i lag tu lde mig dang / lde mig
kyog po byin te bdag gi de la bdag grong du mchis te slar mchi ba'i bar du lde mig dang / lde mig kyog po 'di bzung zhing / khyod kyis bdag ma gtogs pa gzhan su la yang stsal bar mi bgyi'o//
zhes smras kyi/ de'i phyir grong mi rnams la gal te bdag gi bu gtso bor dbang bskur na/ kho bo bdag nyid srog dang 'bral bar gsol ba 'debs te/ de ltar na/ lha mo bdag
cag gi gnas nas gar yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur bas/ khyed cag longs spyod dag gis mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / yams kyi nad thams cad kyang nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis de'i bu gtso
bor dbang bskur nas des kyang bdag nyid srog dang bral bar byas so/ /de nas de dag gis gnas de thams cad spos dang / me tog gis mdzes par byas shing / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan gyis brgyan
te gtor ma thogs nas lha mo de ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha mo/ khyod 'di nyid la bzhugs par gsol/ des smras pa/ kho mo ni/ 'phags
pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la bsnyen bkur byed pa yin pas/ 'di na kho mo'i gnas med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos smras pa/ lha mo/ khyod kyis gang las lde mig dang / lde mig
kyog po blangs pa soms shig /des bsam pa la zhug pa dang / ji tsam na mi de dus la bab par mthong nas/ des gnas de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ kho mo'i
dam tshig gis gnas par bya ste/ gal te kho mo'i gnas gzhi ji lta bu byad du bcug pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i gnas gzhi yang byed du 'jug na/ kho mo 'dug go /de dag gis khas blangs nas

de dag gis lha mo de'i gnas ji lta bu byed du bcug pa de lta bur tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i gnas kyang byed du bcug go /lha mo de'i gnas su mar me btsugs pa gang yin pa de/ des khyer te tshe dang ldan

pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i gnas su 'dzugs par byed do/ /de mar me khyer te 'gro ba rtsig drung na 'dug pa'i mi zhig gis mthong nas des bsam pa/ lha mo 'di 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i gan du 'dod pas

'gro'o/ /snyam pa dang / des de'i sems shes nas khros te ri brag 'di na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di ni/ sdig pa'i sems kun tu spyod pa yin te/ 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po 'dod pa'i dri nga ba med pa

la rdzun gyis skur pa 'debs par byed do/ /snyam nas des ri brag der mi ngas phyung ste skye bo phal po che shi bar gyur nas skye bo shi ba'i ro phyir 'byin pa na/ khri dang / khri'u dag 'dom par gyur to/ /gnas de
na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis ltas pa dag bcug ste dris pa/ 'di ci las gyur/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha mo 'khrugs so/ /de dag gis de la bzod pa gsol bar brtsams pa dang / des smras pa /

khyed cag 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po 'dod pa'i dri nga ba med pa la rdzun gyis skur pa 'debs par byed do/ /de dag gis yang smras pa/ lha mo/ bzod pa mdzod cig dang / 'ga' yang bsnyen bkur ma lags

ba bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ dam tshig gis bzod par bya ste/ gal te khyed cag kho mo la ji ltar bsnyen bkur byed pa de ltar 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la yang byed na/ bzod par bya'o/ /de
dag gis smras pa/ lha mo/ ches khyad par du 'phags par bgyi yi/ bzod par mdzod cig /des de dag la bzod par byas so/ /de dag gis kyang tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen

po la ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i bsnyen bkur byas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos de nyid du dbyar gnas par khas blangs nas khye'u sngo bsangs khrid de lha mo la smras nas 'phags pa dang /
lha mos smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag la mtshan ma cung zhig stsol cig dang / bdag de la mchod pa bgyid cing mchis so/ /des de la kham phor byin nas des de khas phub ste mchod rten du byas nas

dus ston byed du bcug nas kham phor gyi dus ston zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur te/ deng sang yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag 'tshal bar byed do/ /khye'u sngo bsangs tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na

chen po'i chos gos kyi grwa nas 'jus te de 'phyang zhing 'gro ba na/ ba lang rdzi dang / phyugs rdzi dag gis mthong nas de dag gis 'phyang ngo / /'phyang ngo / /zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po byung bas/ yul de'i mi rnams

kyi ming 'phyang ba pa/ 'phyang ba pa zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po ri brag cig tu phyin nas der khye'u sngo bsangs shing ljon pa'i drung du bzhag ste bsod snyoms la zhugs so//
ri brag de na rgyal po bu med par dus la bab nas pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / blon po dang / yul mi dag 'dus te smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gang zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya/ de na kha cig gis
smras pa/ gang bsod nams dang / dbang che bar grags pa'o/ /kha cig gis smras pa/ de ji ltar shes par bya/ kha cig gis smras pa/ rtog pa dag bsgo bar bya'o/ /de dag gis rtog pa dag bskos nas/ de dag

gis phan tshun bcal bar brtsams pa dang / de dag gis khye'u de shing ljon pa'i drung na gnyid log par mthong nas de dag gis de'i mtshan ma bzung bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na shing ljon pa gzhan dag gi grib

ma shar phyogs su gzhol ba dang / shar phyogs su 'bab pa dang / shar phyogs su bab par gyur na/ shing ljon pa de'i grib mas khye'u de'i lus mi gtong bar mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang gros bya bar brtsams
pa| shes ldan dag /khye'u 'di bsod nams dang / dbang che bar grags pa yin gyi/ 'di dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de dag gis de sad par byas te smras pa/ khye'u/ rgyal srid longs shig /khye'us smras pa/ kho

bo rgyal srid don du gnyer ba ma yin te/ kho bo ni/ 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i bsnyen bkur ba yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos thos nas/ ci/ khye'u 'di la rgyal srid du 'gyur ba'i las dag yod
dam/ med snyam du bsam nas/ yod par mthong nas des smras pa/ bu/ rgyal srid longs la 'di ltar khyod kyis chos kyis byed du chug cig /des mnos te/ de dag gis de dbang bskur nas khye'u sngo

bsangs kyis der rgyal srid byed du bcug pas/ sngo bsangs kyi rgyal srid/ sngo bsangs kyi rgyal srid ces bya ba'i ming du gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po yul bog ka nar phyin nas/ tshe dang
ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i ma bog ka nar skyes pa des/ tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po mthong nas smras pa/ bu/ khyod yun ring zhig nas mthong ngo / /bu/ khyod yun ring zhig lon

nas mthong ngo / /de'i nu ma gnyis las kyang 'o ma'i rgyun 'dzag go /tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya ya na chen pos de la yum yum zhes khag phab pa dang / des tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen por zan byin nas tshe dang ldan pa kA

t+yA ya na chen pos de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas gang thos nas des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes

kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan par byas so/ /des bden pa mthong nas/ btsun pas

bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang /
bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan
song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag go /zhes

lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /yang smras pa/ dka' ba byed pa'i ma la ni/ /phu pho bzang pos gang bya ba/ /de ni khyod kyis bdag la bgyis/ /sems ni mtho ris gzhol bar gyur/ /ngan song dag nas

legs phyung zhing / /khyod kyis mtho ris thar pa la/ /rab tu 'bad pas bdag bzhag ste/ /khyod kyis dka' ba legs par mjed/ /tshong pas khe spogs rnyed pa ltar/ /mtho ris rnyed pa bdag gis rnyed/ /dge ba'i bshes

gnyen rnams la ni/ /nye bar brten pa bzang ba lags/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos bu mo bzang mo de bden pa dag la bzhag nas smras pa/ yum/ bltas lags kyi/ bdag mchi'o/ /des smras pa/ bu/

gal te de lta na/ bdag la mtshan ma cung zhig stsol cig dang / bdag de la mchod pa bgyid cing mchis so/ /des de la 'khar ba byin nas des mchod rten byas te/ der de btsugs nas 'khar ba'i mchod rten/ 'khar

ba'i mchod rten zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur te/ deng sang yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag 'tshal bar byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po yul dbus su 'gro 'dod nas yul si nur phyin pa dang / de

nas byang lam na gnas pa'i lha mo gang yin pa des/ tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag la yang mtshan ma cung zhig stsol cig dang / bdag de la mchod pa bgyid cing mchis
so| /des bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yul dbus su lham sgrog gu can bcang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pas/ 'di de la sbyin no/ /snyam nas/ des lham sgrog gu can de de la byin pa dang / des gnas
gzhi byed du bcug ste der bzhag pa dang / kha cig gis ni/ lham gyi dbang phyug ces bya bar shes so/ kha cig gis ni/ lham gyi gzhi zhes bya bar shes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa

kA t+yA ya na chen po mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'ongs pa legs so /'ongs pa legs so/ /ji ltar bde bar rgyus sam/ des smras pa/ tshe dang
ldan pa dag /cung zad bde bar yang rgyus/ cung zad sdug bsngal bar yang rgyus so/ /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar bde bar rgyus/ ji ltar sdug bsngal bar rgyus/ des smras pa/ sems can gyi bya

ba byas pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ bde bar rgyus pa yin no/ /rgyal po gtsug phud can dang / grong khyer sgra sgrog na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis bdag sas mnan pa gang yin pa dang / blon po'i mchod he ru ka

dang / b+hi ru ka gnyis tshegs chen pos bros pa gang yin pa de ni/ sdug bsngal bar rgyus pa yin no/ /dge slong don nyung ngu dag gis smad de smras pa/ de ni/ pha gsod pa yin te/ des tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya na dgra

bcom pa nyid thob pa/ nyes pa med pa/ gnod pa mi byed pa bsad de/ 'di ni/ de'i me tog tsam yin gyi/ 'bras bu ni/ gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod
pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya nas las ci bgyis na/ des phyug pa/ nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan
pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bgyis nas mtshon gyis pa bkum par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /dge slong u tra ya na
nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas/ u tra ya na nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa
