dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/

rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar

yang ni/ /chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/ /rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ /'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe/ rang sangs rgyas

dman pa dang / bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/ bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo / /ji tsam na ri brag cig tu rngon pa zhig

'dug ste/ ri brag de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na ri dwags dang / bya mang po dag gi rten du gyur pa/ mtshe'u zhig yod pa der rngon pa de nyi ma re re zhing ri dwags dang / bya mang po dag drung dbyung ba'i phyir dang / nyams par
bya ba'i phyir dang / tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar bya ba'i phyir rngon spyad dang / rnyi dang / rnyong mang po dag 'dzugs par byed do/ /de'i rngon spyad dang / rnyi dang / rnyong de dag kyang

don yod pa yin no/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na ri brag der phyin nas lha'i gnas shig tu mtshan mo gnas par khas blangs nas de snga dro sham thabs bgos/
lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te ri brag der bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /der bsod snyoms rgyus nas bsam pa/ lha'i gnas 'di nyin mo rgyun lugs mang ba yin gyi/ ri brag gi phyi rol gyi gnas zhi ba zhig

tu bsod snyoms bza'o/ /snyam nas de ri brag nas byung ste/ 'di ni/ zhi ba'o/ /'di ni/ zhi ba'o/ /zhes mtshe'u de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas lhung bzed dang chu tshags mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste rkang pa gnyis
bkrus nas lag pa gnyis bsnyal te chu btsags nas lo ma lhags pa dag blangs te 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba byas te lag pa gnyis bsnyal nas kha bkrus te lhung bzed dang / chu tshags gnas ji lta ba bzhin du

bzhag nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te shing drung zhig tu brten nas brang 'gro'i rgyal po nyal ba'i lus bskyil ba ltar skyil mo krung bcas te spyod lam zhi bar 'dug pa dang / de'i nyin mo mi'i dris ri dwags gcig

kyang ma zin to/ /de nas rngon pa de nang par sngar langs te mtshe'u de ga la ba der song nas/ de rngon spyad dang / rnyi dang / rnyong de dag byul bar brtsams pa dang / ri dwags gcig kyang ma mthong nas/ de 'di snyam

du sems te/ bdag gi rngon spyad dang / rnyi dang / rnyong 'di dag don yod pa yin na/ gang gi phyir der ri dwags gcig kyang ma zin pa 'di'i rgyu gang yin snyam nas/ des mtshe'u de'i than kor byul bar brtsams pa dang / mi'i

rjes mthong nas/ de rjes de'i phyi bzhin du song ba dang / rang sangs rgyas spyod lam zhi bar 'dug pa de mthong nas des bsam pa/ rab tu byung ba sems zhi ba 'di dag /gnas 'di lta bu dag tu mngon par dga' bar
byed pas/ gal te bdag gis 'di'i srog bcad pa ma byas na/ 'di dag gis nges par bdag gi 'tsho ba gcod par byed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad du 'di gsad par bya'o/ /snyam nas snying rje med pa'i sems dang

ldan pa/ 'jig rten pha rol btang ba des mda' dug can gyis gzhu rnga'i dbyibs 'dra ba rna drung du thug par bkang ste/ rang sangs rgyas de'i gnad du bsnun to/ /rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po des bsam pa/ rngon pa

nyon mongs pa 'di/ ha cang rmas pa dang / nyams par gyur na mi rung gi /'di la la gnas drang ba sbyin no/ /snyam nas des ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar

ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/ /so so'i skye bo ni/ rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod par byed pa yin pas/ rngon pa de shing ljon pa rtsa ba nas
bcad pa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas de'i rkang pa gnyis kyi drung du bsgyel nas smras pa/ yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa mar gshegs su gsol/ mar gshegs su gsol/ nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba bdag
gi sug ba nas drang ba stsal du gsol/ rang sangs rgyas de rngon pa de la rjes su snying rje ba'i phyir steng gi nam mkha' las shod du babs so/ /de nas rngon pa des zug rngu med par
byas te rma lhan gyis glan nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ sdum par gshegs su gsol/ gal te 'dir gser gyi lhan pas glan par mdzad nas/ de yang bdag gis sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /rang sangs rgyas kyis
bsam pa/ bdag gis rnag gi lus 'dis thob par bya ba gang yin pa thob zin pas/ de'i phyir da ni/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de rngon
pa de nyid kyi mdun du'ang nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dag rnam par bstan nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las
'das so/ /rngon pa de/ nor dang ldan pa yin pas/ des spos kyi shing thams cad kyis phung por bcer te bsregs nas phung po de 'o mas zhi bar byas te/ rus pa de dag gser gyi bum par bcug nas lam

po che'i bzhi mdor lus kyi mchod rten rtsig tu bcug ste/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag bsgreng zhing / dri dang / phreng ba rgyu dang / bdug spos dang / phye ma dang / sil snyan dag gis mchod
pa byas nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smon lam 'di skad ces/ bdag yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i cha dang mthun par mi 'gyur bar

mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che bar skye zhing / 'di las ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing / thugs byung bar mi

byed pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu thob par gyur cig /ces btab bo/ /dge slong dag /de la de'i tshe de'i dus na rngon pa gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong u tra ya na yin te/ des rang sangs rgyas kyi gnad du mda' dug

can gyis bsnun pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ bskal par sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gdungs nas las de nyid kyi lhag mas tshe rabs lnga brgyar mtshe'u de nyid du ri dwags su gyur
nas mda' dug can gyis gnad du bsnun cing dus la bab ste/ da ltar gyi bar du'ang dgra bcom pa thob kyang / de mtshon gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa
des ni/ da ltar phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che bar skyes shing / nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas shing / 'dis
rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na/ las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi rnam
par smin pa ni/ gcig tu nag pa yin la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu dkar ba yin la/ las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren ma yin no/ /dge
slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu nag pa rnams dang / 'dren ma rnams spangs te/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge
slong dag /khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ rgyal po gtsug phud can dang /

grong khyer sgra sgrog na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang / tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos las ci bgyis na/ des dog sas non par gyur nas/ blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang / b+hi ru ka gnyis kyis
las ci zhig bgyis na/ bros par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar
gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas/ de dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag /
las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar/
las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni//
chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/ /rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ /'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba ri brag cig na/ khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa
las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de la bu khye'u zhig byung
ngo | |yang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de la bu mo zhig byung nas de gnyis bsrings shing bskyed de chen por gyur to/ /bu mo de dang na mnyam pa'i bu mo dag slong ba
'ongs na/ bu mo de la slong ba 'ga' yang ma 'ongs so/ /sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang / dkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la
dga' ba/ bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo / /ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na/ ri brag der phyin nas bu mo des khyim
phyags nas phyag dar rib ma'i steng nas bor ba de/ rang sangs rgyas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba de'i mgor phog go /bu mo des der phog pa mthong nas 'gyod pa'i sems kyang ma skyes la/ stes dbang gis
de nyid kyi nyin mo de slong ba 'ongs nas/ ming pos de la dris pa/ deng khyod kyis ci byas na/ des na/ khyod slong ba 'ongs so/ /des smras pa/ bdag gis deng rab tu byung ba'i steng du phyag dar bor
ro| |des 'dzum phyung ba dang / bu mo des bu mo gzhan dag la sbran cing des kyang gzhan dag la sbran nas/ 'jig rten la bu mo gang dang gang slong ba mi 'ong
ba des/ rang sangs rgyas kyi steng du phyag dar bor na/ de la slong ba 'ong ngo / /zhes sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de lta bu byung ngo / /bdag nyid chen po rnams ni/ bsnyen bkur ma yin pas
'jigs pas/ rang sangs rgyas de ri brag de nas song ba dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyi steng du dor bar brtsams nas de dag kyang dong ba dang / pha ma dag gi steng
du dor bar brtsams so/ /ri brag de na khyim bdag dge ba'i chos can gnyis shig 'khod pa de gnyis kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /dam pa ma yin pa'i chos 'phel ba 'di bzlog par
bya'o/ /zhes de gnyis kyis bzlog cing spangs so/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bu mo gang gis rang sangs rgyas kyi steng du phyag dar bor ba de ni/ rgyal po gtsug phud can 'di
yin no/ /ri brag de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs gang yin pa de ni/ grong khyer sgra sgrog na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag yin te/ 'di dag gis rang sangs rgyas dang / drang srong dang / pha ma
dag gi steng du phyag dar bor ba gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas sas non par gyur to/ /khyim bdag gnyis kyis bzlog pa gang yin pa de ni/ blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang / b+hi ru ka
gnyis yin te/ las de'i rnam par smin pas bros par gyur to/ /bu mo'i ming po gang gis 'dzum phyung ba de ni/ dge slong kA t+yA ya na chen po yin te/ des 'dzum phyung ba gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par

smin pas sas g.yogs te/ gal te dge slong kA t+yA ya na chen pos yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs par ma gyur du zin na/ dge slong kA t+yA ya na chen po sas non cing tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar
'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de lta na/ las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ gcig tu nag pa yin la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin/ las
'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu nag pa dang / 'dren ma rnams spangs te/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong

dag /khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /ko'u sham+b+hi na khyim bdag nor bzang zhes bya

ba| phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba zhig 'dug pa de'i khyim rgyal po shar pa'i drung na 'dug cing / de nang par sngar langs te las kyi mtha' dag la rtog tu 'gro'o/ /de dbyig gi gdangs can yin
pas/ rgyal po shar pas sgra'i gdangs las de la gser bzhag pa 'bum yod par shes so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po shar pa don gyi gnas na 'dug pas blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag
khyim bdag nor bzang / nyi ma re re zhing nang par sngar langs te rang nyid las kyi mtha' dag la rtog tu 'gro ste/ 'di gser bzhag pa 'bum yod ces grag na/ ci'i phyir
na/ bdag nyid ngal bar byed/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ 'di la gser bzhag pa 'bum ga la mchis te/ gal te 'di la gser bzhag pa 'bum mchis na/ ci'i slad du bdag nyid dam
bar bgyid/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gal te khyed cag yid mi ches na/ khyim bdag nor bzang pos shig dang dri'o/ /de dag gis khyim bdag nor bzang pos nas/ rgyal pos dris pa/ khyim bdag
khyod la gser bzhag pa 'bum yod dam/ lha/ mchis te/ gal te bzhes na/ bzhes su gsol/ khyim bdag/ nga ni/ gser don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi/ 'di ltar/ ngas khyod la ci yod dam med ces dris par
zad do/ /lha/ mchis te/ lhas ji ltar mkhyen pa de zhu'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag /khyod dbyig gi gdangs can yin pas ngas sgra'i gdangs las shes so/ /khyim bdag nor bzang rgyal pos gdangs

las shes pas/ de'i ming khyim bdag gdangs can/ khyim bdag gdangs can zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rgyal pos de la smras pa/ khyim bdag /khyod phyug por gyur pa yin na/ ci'i phyir khyod rang gis zhal ta byas te las

kyi mtha' dag byed du 'jug /des smras pa/ lha/ gal te bdag gis rang gi zhal ta bgyis te las kyi mtha' dag bgyid du ma stsal na/ bdag gi longs spyod dag 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par yang mi 'gyur

la lhas kyang bdag dbyig gi gdangs can legs par mkhyen par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag /khyod ci'i phyir glang po che dang / rta dag gis mi 'gro/ lha/ bdag khyim khol lags pas/ glang po che dang /

rta dag gis mchi ba bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma lags so/ /rgyal pos bsam pa/ grogs 'di lta bus rgyal srid byed du gzhug par nus kyi/ 'di blon po kho nar gzhug go /snyam du rig nas smras pa/ khyim bdag/
blon po gyis shig dang / lhan cig tu rgyal srid byed du gzhug go /des smras pa/ lha/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa mi rigs te/ bdag ni/ khyim khol lags pas bdag zhing las kyi mtha' rjes su sgrub par rigs

kyi| blon por mi rigs so/ /rgyal pos de lta de ltar nan gyis mnan na/ ci nas kyang gdon mi za bar khas len par shes te/ nan gyis mnan nas des kyang khas blangs so/ /de nas rgyal pos de blon por bcug nas khyim

bdag gdangs can gyis chos dang rigs pas/ rgyal po'i bya ba dang / rgyal po'i byed pa dag bya bar brtsams nas des blon po thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang / de dag phrag dog skyes te nyid mi bde bar gyur nas

'dus te smras pa/ shes ldan dag /bdag cag 'di ltar khyim bdag gdangs can gyis zil gyis mnan par gyur na/ 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ de na kha cig gis smras pa/ 'di la ci'i phyir sgrub tu med/ 'di ji srid

du gtan du gting tshugs par ma gyur pa de srid du 'di la rgyal pos chang pas gcod du gzhug par bya'o/ /kha cig gis smras pa/ ma nyes kyi/ de ltar bya'o/ /zhes de dag thams cad 'dus te rgyal pos gan du dong nas
smras pa/ lha/ rgyal po su lags/ /des smras pa/ khyed cag gi las the tshom za/ rgyal por nga yin mod/ gzhan su zhig yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ gdangs
can rgyal po lags kyi/ khyod ni/ ma lags te/ gal te de 'tshal par gyur na/ lha bkrongs te rang nyid cod pan bcings nas rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi bdag po bgyid du stsol bar 'gyur
ro| |rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ci'i phyir de de ltar 'gyur te/ de ni/ chos gtso bor byed pa yin pas/ ji ltar de ltar byed par 'gyur/ de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gi
lha'i mngon sum du 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag gdangs can rgyal pos nye bar 'tsho ba'i rgol ba dang / phyir rgol ba dag gis yongs su bskor cing rgyal po'i pho
brang du zhugs nas rgyal po'i pho brang du thams cad skye bo'i tshogs kyis gang bar des rgyal po bya ba dang / rgyal po'i byed pa dag byas nas rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyir byung ba dang / rgyal pos
nye bar 'tsho ba sngon 'khod pa dag kyang de dang lhan cig phyir byung ste/ rgyal po'i tshogs med par 'dug pa dang / blon po de dag gis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha gzigs sam/ bdag cag
gis gsol ba gang lags pa de ni/ 'di lags te/ gal te 'di 'tshal bar gyur na/ lha bkrongs te rang nyid cod pan bcings nas rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi bdag po bgyid du stsal
bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos bsam pa/ re zhig 'di brtag par bya'o/ /snyam nas des de rgyu ba dang / gnas pa las brtag par brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na byang lam nas ded dpon gyis zong rta ded de ko'u
sham+b+hir phyin nas rgyal pos gdangs can la bsgo ba/ gser 'bum gyis rta dag nyos shig /des gser 'bum gyis rta dag nyos pa dang / rgyal pos gdangs can la bsgo ba/ 'bum gyi phyed byin la 'di
skad ces/ bdag gis 'bum tshang bar byin zin to/ /zhes byos shig/ des smras pa/ lha/ de mi rigs te/ gal te de ltar bgyis na/ slan chad 'dir chibs rta 'tshong pa dang / gzhan 'ga' yang mchi
bar mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar lha'i dkor las 'bum phyed stsol cig dang / bdag gis 'bum phyed stsal to/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag/ nga'i tshig de bzhin smras na/ 'di la ci 'gal/ des
smras pa/ lha/ bdag gis tshe gcig gi sdug bsngal gyi don du tshe rabs mang po'i sdug bsngal skyed par rngo mi thogs so/ /rgyal pos de la lan gsum gyi bar du smras na yang de ma btub nas/ de nas rgyal
pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ gang gis rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i bka' lan gsum gyi bar du bcag pa de'i chad pa ci yin/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/
lha| de'i chad pa ni/ dgum pa lags so/ /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gal te de ltar na/ ngas khyim bdag gdangs can yongs su btang ngo / /blon po rnams kyis mi gshed ma dag la bsgo ba/
shes ldan dag/ lhas bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag gdangs can sod cig ces byung ngo / /rgyal pos mi gshed ma pa de dag la gsang ste bsgo ba/ khyod kyis khyim
bdag gdangs can gsad par mi bya bar 'di ltar bsdigs par bya'o/ /de dag gis de'i mgrin par kA ra bI ra'i phreng ba btags te grong khyer gyi dbus nas gsod sar khrid pa dang / de'i nye du
dag dong ste smras pa/ khyim bdag/ 'di la lhas bka' ci stsal ba de ltar gyis la bdag nyid gsod du ma gzhug cig/ des smras pa/ kho bos lha'i bka' chos dang ldan pa bcag gam/ ci/ gal
te lhas kho bo nyes pa med pa/ gnod pa mi byed pa gsod na/ gsod du zad/ kho bos tshe gcig gi sdug bsngal gyi phyir tshe rabs mang po'i sdug bsngal skyed par mi nus so/ /mi gshed ma
pa de dag gis de gsod sar khrid de smras pa/ khyim bdag/ lhas bka' ci stsal ba de ltar gyis la bdag nyid gsod du ma gzhug cig/ des smras pa/ kho bos lha'i bka' chos dang ldan pa
bcag gam/ ci/ gal te lhas kho bo nyes pa med pa/ gnod pa mi byed pa gsod na/ gsod du zad/ kho bos tshe gcig gi sdug bsngal gyi phyir tshe rabs mang po'i sdug bsngal skyed par
mi nus so/ /mi gshed ma pa de dag gis de rgyal po'i gan du khrid de smras pa/ lha/ khyim bdag gdangs can de 'di skad ces mchi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag/ nga khyod
gsod par 'dod pa ma yin te/ 'di ltar brtag par 'dod do/ /des smras pa/ lhas bdag brtag pa'i dgongs pas gnas skabs 'di lta bu stsal na/ gal te bkyon na/ ji ltar bgyis par 'gyur/
'di ltar/ gal te lha bdag la dgyes na/ bdag sbyin pa dag stsol cing / bsod nams dag bgyid par ci gnang / rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag/ gal te de ltar na/ gnang gi/ ci dgar sbyin pa
dag byin cig/ bsod nams dag gyis shig/ de nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis/ sbyin pa'i khang pa rtsig tu bcug ste sbyin pa'i zhal ta pa'i mi dag bskos nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ gal
te 'dir sngon ma byung ba'i rtags dang / cha lugs can gyi dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ gzhan dag 'ongs par gyur na/ kho bo la sbron cig/ ji tsam na lho lam nas drang srong lnga brgya tsam yul
dbus su 'phags pa de dag mthar gyis lam du 'dong ba na/ dgon pa'i lam du phyin nas de dag dgon pa'i nang du son pa na/ chu zad nas de dag chu dang bral ba'i skom gyis gdungs nas/
dgon pa'i lam der phan tshun byul bar brtsams pa dang / de phan tshun nyul ba de dag gis ha cang thag mi ring ba na gsing ma sngon mo'i phyogs na/ shing ljon pa zhig mthong nas/ de na kha cig
gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag gsing ma sngon po'i phyogs 'di na shing ljon pa zhig snang gi/ tshur shog dang / 'di na chu yod par 'gyur gyi/ bltar 'dong ngo / /gzhan dag gis smras pa/
legs kyi/ de bzhin bya'o/ /zhes de dag der dong ba dang / ji tsam na chu med par mthong nas de dag gis gsol pa gdab par brtsams te/ shes ldan dag /sa phyogs
dang | shing ljon pa 'di la lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ dri za'am/ mi 'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po gang gnas pa des/ bdag cag drang srong lnga brgya skom gyis
gdungs pa rnams la chu byin cig/ ces smras so/ /ji tsam na shing ljon pa de las lag pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhig gser gyi ril ba b+hing gar thogs te byung nas drang srong rnams kyis
snyim pa bzed de chu btung bar brtsams nas ji tsam na myangs na/ chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa yin te/ bsil pa dang / mngar ba dang / yang ba dang / 'jam pa dang / gsal ba dang / dri
nga ba med pa dang / 'thungs pa na mgul la mi gnod pa dang / 'thungs pa na lto mi na ba yin te/ de dag tshim par gyur nas ril ba bkang ste shis pa brjod nas 'phags te dong ba dang / de dag la
blo skyes pa/ shes ldan dag/ bdag cag gis de lta bu'i ya mtshan mthong nas de la khyod su yin/ las gang gis 'dir skyes zhes ma dris pa ni/ bdag cag nyams pa yin gyi/ tshur shog /
phyir log la dri'o/ /snyam nas/ de dag thams cad 'dus te phyir log nas shing ljon pa de'i drung du 'khod de smras pa/ shing ljon pa 'di la lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ nam mkha'

lding ngam/ dri za'am/ mi'am ma ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po gang gnas pa gang gis/ bdag cag dgon pa'i lam du song ba/ gnod pa dang / nyam nga ba dang / mi bde bar gyur cing / 'chi ba'i dbang du gyur pa rnams
la chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas tshim par byas pa des/ bdag gang yin pa dang / las gang gis 'dir skyes pa smros shig/ ji tsam na shing ljon pa de las tshig byung ba/ shes ldan dag/ dzam+bu'i
gling pa'i mi rnams ni/ yid ches par dka' ba yin pas/ kho bo su yin pa dang / las gang gis 'dir skyes pa yid ches par mi 'gyur bas/ ji ltar smra bar bya/ drang srong rnams kyis smras pa/ kye/ bdag
cag gis mngon sum kho nar mthong na/ ji ltar yid ches par mi 'gyur/ the tshom ma za bar smros shig/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ gal te de ltar na/ nyon cig dang / kho bo gang yin pa dang / las
gang gis 'dir skyes pa smra bar bya'o/ /yul ko sa la dag na grong khyer mnyan yod ces bya ba de na/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba 'dug pa de'i khyim drung na/ kho bo bzang mkhan byed cing
'dug 'dug ste/ de mgon med pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed pas/ yul tha dad pa na gnas pa'i slong mo pa dag lhags shing lhags shing kho bo la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim
gang yin pa zhes 'dri nas kho bos lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste de dag la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim 'di yin no/ /zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis de nas lag pa gang ba dang / snod
gang ba dang / 'byor pa thob pa dang / rnyed pa thob cing 'dong ba de dag kho bos mthong nas mchog tu dga' ba skyed par byed de/ kho bo las des rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
rnams kyi nang du skyes shing / shing ljon pa 'di la gnas te/ de phyir kho bo'i lag pa g.yas pa shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger gyur to/ /de dag gis shis pa brjod pas bstod de dong
ngo| |ji tsam na phyogs gzhan zhig tu phyin nas bza' ba dang btung ba zad de/ de dag bkres pas gdungs shing / skom pas gdungs nas kun tu brtag par brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na ha cang

thag mi ring ba zhig na/ shing ljon pa chen po lo ma sngo zhing snun pa zhig snang nas de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ shing ljon pa chen po lo ma sngo zhing snum pa 'di lta bu snang ste/ sngar yang bdag
cag gis shing ljon pa 'di lta bu kho na las chu grub kyi/ 'dir 'dong dang / gal te na cung zad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhes de dag der dong ste gsol ba gdab bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan
dag /sa phyogs dang / shing ljon pa 'di la lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ dri za'am/ mi'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po gang gnas pa des/ bdag cag
drang srong lnga brgya bkres pas gdungs pa dang / skom pas gdungs pa rnams la zas dang skom byin cig/ ces smras so/ /ji tsam na shing ljon pa de las tshig byung ba/ shes ldan dag/ dengs

shig dang 'di nas ha cang mi ring ba na rdzing bu zhig yod pa de'i 'gram na/ shing ljon pa zhig yod pa de'i drung na 'bras chan bre po gang zhig 'dug pa de las zos shing 'thungs nas bza' ba dang / btung

ba ci 'dod pa khyer cig/ de dag dong ba dang / ji tsam na rdzing bu bya ngang pa dang / kA raN+Da pa dang / ngur pas mdzes par byas pa zhig 'dug pa de'i 'gram na/ shing ljon pa zhig 'dug pa de'i drung na
'bras chan tshod ma sna tshogs dang bcas pas gang ba zhig 'dug pa mthong nas/ de dag gis der khrus byas te zos shing chu 'thung nas ril ba chus bkang ste bza' ba dang / btung ba ci 'dod pa khyer
nas shis pa brjod de dong ba dang / de dag la blo skyes pa/ shes ldan dag/ bdag cag gis de lta bu'i ya mtshan mthong nas de la khyod su yin/ las gang gis 'dir skyes zhes ma dris pa ni/
bdag cag nyams pa yin gyi/ tshur shog/ phyir log la dri'o/ /snyam nas/ de dag thams cad 'dus te phyir log nas shing ljon pa de'i drung du 'khod de smras pa/ shing ljon pa 'di la lha'am/
klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ dri za'am/ mi'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po gang gnas pa gang gis/ bdag cag dgon pa'i lam du song ba/ gnod pa dang / nyam nga
dang / mi bde bar gyur cing / 'chi ba'i dbang du gyur pa rnams la chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dang / zas kyis tshim par byas pa des/ bdag gang yin pa dang / las gang gis 'dir skyes
pa smros shig/ ji tsam na shing ljon pa de las tshig byung ba/ shes ldan dag/ dzam+bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni/ yid ches par dka' ba yin pas/ kho bo su yin pa
dang / las gang gis 'dir skyes pa yid ches par mi 'gyur bas/ ji ltar smra bar bya/ drang srong rnams kyis smras pa/ kye/ bdag cag gis mngon sum kho nar mthong na/ ji ltar yid ches par mi 'gyur/
the tsom ma za bar smros shig/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ gal te de ltar na/ nyon cig dang / kho bo gang yin pa dang / las gang gis 'dir skyes pa smra bar bya'o/ /yul ko sa la dag na grong khyer
mnyan yod ces bya ba de na/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa de mgon med pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed nas ri brag cig na bram ze zhig 'dug pa longs spyod bsrabs
nas des bsam pa/ mnyan yod na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'dug pa de mgon med pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed kyi/ de'i gan du song na/ de las cung zad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /
snyam nas de de'i gan du song ba dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang / sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol bar 'dong nas/ rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'phags
pa na| des de mthong nas smras pa/ khyim bdag/ bdag la zas kyi mgron gyis shig/ des de la smras pa/ bram ze/ tshur shog/ rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'dong la der zo zhig/ da de dang lhan
cig 'phags pa dang / ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lam gar zho'i bum pa zhig rnyed nas des de bram ze de la byin nas smras pa/ bram ze/ zho'i bum pa 'di dge 'dun la brims shig/ khyim
bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhal zas bsod pas tshim par byas pa dang / bram ze des kyang zho'i bum pa de dge 'dun la brims so/ /khyim bdag
mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas khyim pa dag la zan sbyin par brtsams te/ des khyim pa gzhan dag la ni/ zas bsod pa byin/
bram ze de la ni/ ngan pa byin pa dang / des de la smras pa/ khyim bdag/ rab tu byung ba rnams ni/ bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa yin pas/ re zhig 'di dag la ni/ bsod pa sbyin par rig na/ bdag
cag khyim pa bslab pa yang dag par ma blangs par 'dra na/ ci'i phyir khyim pa gzhan dag la ni/ zas bsod pa byin la/ bdag la ni/ zas ngan pa sbyin/ des de la smras pa/ bram ze/ khyim pa 'di
dag kyang bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa yin te/ 'di dag gis kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs so/ /des de la smras pa/ khyim bdag/ gal te bdag gis kyang yan lag
brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong len na/ bdag la yang zas bsod pa sbyin nam/ des de la smras pa/ sbyin no/ /des yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs pa dang / de nas khyim bdag
mgon med zas sbyin gyis de zas bsod pas tshim par byas nas/ des zos te 'phags pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ bram ze/ yud tsam zhig
sdod cig dang / skom 'ongs par 'gyur ro/ /des skom 'thungs te song ba dang / nyi ma nub pa'i dus la bab nas mnyan yod dang ha cang mi ring ba na ri brag cig yod pa der bram ze'i khyim zhig tu
gnas pa dang / bram ze des de la smras pa/ bram ze/ zan zo zhig /des smras pa/ kho bos zan mi za'o/ /des smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ des smras pa/ kho bos dge sbyong go'u ta ma la yan lag brgyad dang
ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs so/ /des de la smras pa/ bram ze/ gal te re zhig za na/ de lta na legs/ gal te mi za na/ kho bo'i khyim du gnas par mi bya'o/ /des dus ma yin par zos nas
gso sbyong ral lo/ /ri brag na gnas pa'i bram ze gang yin pa gang gis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs nas dral ba de ni/ kho bo yin te/ kho bos yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i
gso sbyong blangs te thams cad ma dral na/ kho bo sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ kho bos yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs nas dus ma yin
par zos te gso sbyong dral bas/ kho bo rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ shing ljon pa 'di la gnas shing / de'i phyir kho bo la rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ lha'i
bu rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba/ gso sbyong ral zhes bya bar shes so// //'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po don gsum pa/ drang srong de dag mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa/ shes ldan
dag /bdag cag drang srong rnams kyis dus 'di srid du brtul zhugs la gnas pas kyang / 'di'i 'bras bu cir 'gyur mi shes na/ lha'i bu gso sbyong ral ba 'dis/ bram zer gyur pa na yan lag

brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs shing / de bral na yang 'di rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes kyi/ bdag cag kyang gang du 'dis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs pa der
'dong ngo / /de ltar bya'o/ /zhes de dag gis gros byas te mnyan yod du 'phags nas ji tsam na mthar gyis ko'u sham+b+hir phyin pa dang / khyim bdag gdangs can gyi sbyin pa'i zhal ta byed pa'i mi rnams
kyis de dag mthong nas de dag gis khyim bdag gdangs can la sbran pa/ khyim bdag/ khyod kyis bdag cag la bsgo ba/ sngon ma byung ba'i rtags dang / cha lugs can dag mthong na/ kho bo la sbron
cig /ces byung ba de dag lhags te sgo na sdod do/ /des smras pa/ 'jug tu chug cig /de dag gis 'jug tu bcug pa dang / khyim bdag gdangs can gyis de dag mthong nas dris pa/ shes
ldan dag /khyed cag gang nas 'ongs/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag /lho lam nas so/ /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /khyod kyis lho lam du ngo mtshar mthong ba dang / thos pa ci yod/ de
dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag /re zhig bdag cag gis sngar mthong ba dang / thos pa'i ngo mtshar gzhan dag lta zhog gi /te bor mthong ba dang / thos pa'i ngo mtshar gang
yin pa dag smra bar bya'i/ nyon cig /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /smros shig dang kho bo ngo mtshar de dag nyan to/ /de dag gis khyim bdag gdangs can la ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par brjod pa
dang / khyim bdag gdangs can gyis thos nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te/ de dag la zan byin nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gang du 'dong / de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag mnyan yod du
'dong ngo / /shes ldan dag /de na ci yod/ khyim bdag /lha'i bu gso sbyong ral gyis gang la brten te yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs pa'i khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yod
do| |des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gal te de ltar na/ de kho bo'i yang ma mthong ba'i grogs yin gyi/ 'di nyid du dbyar gyi mtshan mo gyis la dbyar 'das nas kho bo dang lhan cig 'dong ngo / /de
dag de nyid du dbyar gyi mtshan mo gnas te dbyar 'das nas mnyan yod du 'phags pa dang / khyim bdag gdangs can gyis bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa la smras pa/ lha/ bdag mnyan yod du
bgyi ba cung zhig mchis na/ gal te lhas gnang na/ der mchi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag /gal te de ltar na/ song la khyod kyis don sgrub pa byas nas myur du phyir shog cig /de

rgyal pos gnang nas drang srong lnga brgya po de dag dang lhan cig 'phags te mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas skyed mos tshal na sdod cing 'dug go /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis khyim bdag gdangs
can 'dir 'ongs te skyed mos tshal na sdod cing 'dug go /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang des bsam pa/ bdag gis khyim bdag gdangs can ma tshor ba kho nar gnas su 'jug tu gzhug pa ni/ bdag gi tshul
dang mthun pa ma yin gyi/ bkur sti chen pos 'jug tu gzhug go /snyam nas/ des de bkur sti chen pos 'jug tu bcug ste lam gyis dub pa'i ngal bsos nas zan byin no/ /de nas drang srong de dag lhags
nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'ongs pa legs so/ /zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun tu spyad de smras pa/ shes ldan dag /khyed cag gi las 'ongs/ 'dir ci la 'ongs/ de dag gis smras pa
khyim bdag /khyod kyis lha'i bu gso sbyong ral la gang byin pa de bdag cag la yang byin cig /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /mi dran no/ /khyim bdag /bdag cag gis khyod la dran par bya'o/ /shes
ldan dag/ legs so/ /de dag gis dran par byas nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ci/ kho bo las len tam/ 'on te bcom ldan 'das las len/ khyim bdag /khyod kyis su las blangs/
shes ldan dag /bcom ldan 'das las so/ /khyim bdag /gal te de ltar na/ bdag cag kyang de kho na las len to/ /shes ldan dag /legs kyi/ de ltar gyis shig /ces des de dag khrid de
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun na chos ston cing bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag
mgon med zas sbyin thag ring po kho na nas gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong
ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong ngo / /dge slong dag /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di skyes dang bcas pas 'ongs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes ni/ 'di ltar/ gdul ba'i skyes lta bu gzhan
med do/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin drang srong lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /mtha'
gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ drang srong lnga brgya po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das las yan lag brgyad dang
ldan pa'i gso sbyong len par 'tshal na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di dag ci nas kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi ba dang / dge bsnyen nyid du 'tshal
bar 'gyur ba de ltar chos bstan du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas

gang thos nas drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan par mdzad do/ /de dag
gis bden pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te gsol ba/ btsun pa/ bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / rdzogs par bsnyen pa

dge slong gi dngos po 'thob cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge slong tshur shog ces pas rab tu dbyung gi /dge slong dag /tshur shog

tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i 'jug kho nar skra byi ba dang / snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/ skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang / lag pa
lhung bzed dang / bya ba bum gyis 'brel ba dang / dge slong rdzogs par bsnyen nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/ /yang smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal
pas/ /skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing / /mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la gdams ngag
byin nas de dag gis spro ba dang / 'bad pa dang / brtsal ba dag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas shing / dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags
dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan bzhag pa lta bu rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur

cing / rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang / srid pa dang / 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i
lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /de nas khyim bdag gdangs can bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag gdangs can la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis
yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi dus sngar mdzad pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i bka' mchid dang / tshul khrims kyi bka' chid dang / mtho ris kyi bka' mchid
dang / 'dod pa rnams kyi ro myang ba'i nyes dmigs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / nges par 'byung ba dang / rab tu dben pa'i phan yon dang / rnam par byang ba'i
phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos dag rgya cher ston par mdzad do/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sems rangs pa dang / sems nyams bde ba dang / sems dga' ba dang / sems la sgrib pa med pa dang / yang
dag phul gyi chos bstan ba kun shes pa'i skal pa dang ldan zhing mthu yod par gzigs pa de'i tshe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yang dag phul gyi chos bstan pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/
'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po/ /sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam dag rgya cher ston par mdzad do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ gos dag pa/ nag nog med pa/ kha bsgyur du rung
ba| tshon du bcug na/ tshon legs par 'dzin par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ khyim bdag gdangs can gyis kyang stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang /
kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs par gyur ro/ /de nas khyim bdag gdangs can chos mthong ba dang / chos thos pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting sleb pa dang / som
nyi las brgal ba dang / the tshom las brgal ba dang / ston pa'i bstan pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri zhing chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thong nas stan las langs te bla gos
phrag pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /
btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge
bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas mngon par dad pas skyabs su mchi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gdangs can la bka' stsal pa/ khyim
bdag /khyod kyi ming ci/ btsun pa/ bdag nor bzang zhes bgyi ba las/ rgyal po shar pas bdag gdangs las btsal ba las/ de'i slad du bdag skye bo dag gis khyim bdag gdangs can zhes
bgyi bar 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das ko'u sham+b+hir gshegs par gsol/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang / bsod
snyoms dang / gnas mal dang / snyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag gis bsnyen bkur 'tshal lo/ /khyim bdag /ko'u sham+b+hi na/ gtsug lag khang yod dam/ btsun pa/ ma mchis so/ /khyim
bdag /dge slong dag ni/ gang na gtsug lag khang yod pa der bgrod pa dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas par sems so/ /bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol dang / bdag gis ji ltar ko'u sham+b+hi
na| gtsug lag khang mchis par 'gyur ba dang / dge slong rnams kyang bgrod pa dang / mchi ba dang / gnas par sems par 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gdangs
can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom

ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song nas de la mnyan yod na bya ba'am/ byed pa ci yod pa de thams cad byas shing / bsgrubs nas yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs
gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la grogs dge slong 'ga' zhig stsol cig dang / bdag gis de dang lhan cig bcom ldan
'das kyi slad du gtsug lag khang rtsig tu stsal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gdangs can 'khor dang bcas pa dang / ko'u sham+b+hi na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag /dge slong gang
gi gdul ba yin snyam du dgongs na/ dge slong skul byed chen po'i gdul ba yin par gzigs nas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po la bka' stsal pa/ skul byed/ khyim bdag

gdangs can 'khor dang bcas pa dang / ko'u sham+b+hi na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la soms shig /tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen pos bcom ldan 'das las cang mi smra pas dang du blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang
ldan pa skul byed chen po de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la
rgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas ji ltar longs spyod pa'i gnas mal mkhos su phab ste lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas khyim

bdag gdangs can dang 'grogs te ko'u sham+b+hi ga la ba de logs su song nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na/ ko'u sham+b+hir phyin to/ /de nas khyim bdag gdangs can ko'u sham+b+hir ma zhugs pa kho nar kun

dga' ra ba nas kun dga'i ra bar dang / skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal du dang / tshal nas tshal du dang / gol bar song ste/ gang du bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig tu gzhug

ba'i sa phyogs/ ko'u sham+b+hi nas ha cang yang mi ring / ha cang yang mi nye ba/ nyin mo rgyun lugs nyung zhing blag cor chung ba/ mtshan mo sgra chung zhing 'ur sgra chung ba/ sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang

nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyi reg pa nyung ba de lta bu ci yod ces btsal na/ khyim bdag gdangs can gyis rang gi kun dga' ra ba ko'u sham+b+hi nas ha cang yang mi ring / ha cang yang mi nye ba/ nyin mo rgyun

lugs nyung zhing blag cor chung ba/ mtshan mo sgra chung zhing 'ur sgra chung ba/ sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyi rag pa nyung bar mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam
du sems te/ sa phyogs 'di bzang gi/ 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig tu gzhug go /snyam mo/ /de nas khyim bdag gdangs can dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen

pos skyed mos tshal der/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang ldan pa/ skar khung dang / skar khung zlum po dang / lan kan gyis brgyan pa zhig rtsig tu bcug go /de nas gtsug
lag khang byas shing zin nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bcom ldan 'das shul du gshegs pa'i dgongs kyi tshad ji tsam/
khyim bdag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dang 'dra'o/ /'phags pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i ji tsam/ khyim bdag /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lam du 'gro
ba'i dgongs mal ni/ rgyang grags bcu'o/ /khyim bdag gdangs can gyis rgyang grags bcu bcur gshegs dgongs dag gshom du bcug nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pho nya btang ste/ bcom
ldan 'das ko'u sham+b+hir gshegs su gsol/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gnas mal dang / snyung
ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag gis bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol to/ /pho nyas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun
dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la dge slong rnams la/ dge slong dag /bcom ldan 'das bad sa dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyi/ khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs
pa dang thabs cig tu bad sa dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des/ chos gos dag longs shig /ces sgos shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ btsun pa/ bka' bzhin
'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bcom ldan 'das bad sa dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyi/ khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs
pa dang thabs cig bad sa dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos dag longs shig /ces bsgo'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang
ldan pa/ grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang ldan pa/ thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/ 'dod
chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ glang po che ltar glang po
che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ seng+ge ltar mche ba can gyis tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nam mkha' lding
ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dpa' bo ltar ru ba'i tshogs
kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshong pa ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor

ba| mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ 'khor los bsgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nyi ma ltar 'od

zer stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ 'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs
kyis yongs su bskor ba/ gnod sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ thag bzang ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ brgya byin ltar sum cu pa'i tshogs kyis
yongs su bskor ba/ tshangs pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dbang po rnams shin tu dul ba/ spyod lam dang spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa/ chu gter ltar ting nge ba/ sprin ltar chu dang
bcas pa/ glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku rnam par mdzes pa/ 'od 'dom
gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun tu bzang ba/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye
bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang / rlangs pa dang / ming chen dang / ma 'gag pa dang / shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal
gyi bu dang / 'od srung dang / kun dga' bo dang / nam gru la sogs pa nyan thos chen po dag dang / gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos bskor te/ ko'u sham+b+hi ga la ba der rgyu zhing gshegs
nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ko'u sham+b+hir byon to/ /de nas khyim pa dag gdangs can gyis/ gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa de/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
'dun dang bcas pa la phul nas/ 'di ltar/ gnas brtan dag gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das ko'u sham+b+hi na gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /zhes mdo sde'i mtha' nye bar
sbyar to/ /de nas khyim bdag gdangs can bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la gtsug lag khang phul nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba skyes te rang gi khyim du
song ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go
/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang
ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las
byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che bar gdags su rung ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ skul byed/ rung ste/
skul byed/ bdun po 'di dag ni/ gang dag dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad
par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba
che ba/ rgyas pa che ba dag yin te/ bdun gang zhe na/ skul byed/ 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la kun dga'i ra ba 'bul
bar byed pa 'di ni/ skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par
bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ rgyas pa
che ba dang po yin no/ /skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ kun dga'i ra ba de nyid du gtsug lag khang rtsig tu 'jug pa 'di
ni/ skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba'
zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba gnyis
pa yin no/ /skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ gtsug lag khang de nyid du gnas mal 'di lta ste/ khri dang / khri'u dang / stan nang tshangs can dang /
la ba dang / sngas dang / gor bu dag 'bul bar byed pa 'di ni/ skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi
nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu
'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba gsum pa yin no/ /skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ gtsug lag khang de nyid du

gtan gyi rkyen ris rjes su mthun pa'i mchong sbyin 'bul bar byed pa 'di ni/ skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal
ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan
yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba bzhi pa yin no/ /skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ glo bur du 'ongs pa dang / 'gro bar chas pa/ sbyin pa sbyin
par byed pa 'di ni/ skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig

mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba lnga pa yin no/ /
skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ nad pa dang nad g.yog la sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa 'di ni/ skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar
skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba drug pa yin no/ /skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs
kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ rlung langs pa'am/ yul ngan byung ba'am/ char bab pa'am/ lhags pa byung ba gang dag yin pa de lta bu'i rlung langs pa'am/ yul ngan byung
ba'am/ char bab pa'am/ lhags pa byung ba'i tshe dge 'dun la 'bras can dag gam/ skyo ma dag gam/ thug pa'i btung ba dag bskyal te/ 'dis 'phags pa 'di dag lus mi brlan pa dang /
chos gos mi gsher ba dang / longs spyod na bde ba la reg par 'gyur ro/ /snyam pas 'bul bar byed pa 'di ni/ skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa
rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung
ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba bdun pa yin no/ /skul byed/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rdzas
las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'am/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo/ /zhes
bsod nams kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus te/ 'di ltar/ bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /skul byed/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gang du chu klung chen

po lnga po 'di lta ste/ gang+gA dang / ya mun dang / sa ra yu dang / gnas can dang / ma hi zhes bya ba tha mi dad par 'bab par 'gyur ba de la ni/ chu'am/ chu'i bum pa'am/ chu'i bum pa brgya phrag gam/
chu'i bum pa stong phrag gam/ chu'i bum pa 'bum phrag 'di snyed yod do/ /zhes chu'i tshad gzung bar mi nus so/ /skul byed/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rdzas las
byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'am/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang 'di tsam mo/ /zhes bsod
nams kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus te/ 'di ltar/ bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la
tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal
ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba ma lags pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin
tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba gdags su rung ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ skul byed/ rung ste/ skul byed/ bdun
po 'di dag ni/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba'
zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa
che ba dag yin te/ bdun gang zhe na/ skul byed/ 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos grong tshigs
ga ge mo zhig na nye bar brten cing bzhugs pa thos shing / thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po/ /dge ba/ nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni/ skul byed/
gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon
par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba
dang po yin no/ /skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid tshur gshegs par rtsol bar

thos shing / thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po/ /dge ba/ nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni/ skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/
rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba gnyis pa yin no/ /skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi
bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid shul du zhugs pa thos shing / thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po/ /dge
ba| nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni/ skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal
ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu
'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba gsum pa yin no/ /skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid grong tshigs de nyid du byon par thos shing / thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po/ /dge ba/ nges par 'byung ba
dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni/ skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi
'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon
che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba bzhi pa yin no/ /skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan
thos de nyid la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro zhing / mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po/ /dge ba/ nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni/
skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba'

zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba lnga pa yin
no| |skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid kyi drung nas chos tshangs par spyod pa/
thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston pa nyan
cing thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po/ dge ba/ nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'di ni/ skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang
ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las

byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba drug pa yin no/ /skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyang bu mo dad pa dang
ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyad kyi drung nas chos thos nas sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro/ chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro zhing / bslab ba'i
gzhi dag len par byed pa 'di ni/ skul byed/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun
mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan
yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba bdun pa yin no/ /skul byed/ rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
mo dad pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'am/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni/ 'di tsam mo/ /zhes bsod nams kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus te/ 'di
ltar/ bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /skul byed/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gang du chu klung chen po lnga po 'di lta ste/ gang+gA dang / ya mu na
dang / sa ra yu dang / gnas can dang / ma hi zhes bya ba dag tha mi dad par 'bab par 'gyur ba de la ni/ chu'am/ chu'i bum pa'am/ chu'i bum pa brgya phrag gam/ chu'i bum pa stong phrag
gam/ chu'i bum pa 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig yod do/ zhes chu'i tshad gzung bar mi nus te/ 'di ltar/ chu mang ba'i phyir chu'i phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /skul byed/
de bzhin du rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'am/
bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang 'di tsam mo/ /zhes tshad gzung bar mi nus te/ 'di ltar/ bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mi dang ri dwags tshogs kyis bsten pa yi/ /chu klung tha
dad 'bab par gyur pa dag /mtsho mchog bkra shis gtsang ma ngogs bde ba/ /rin chen 'byung gnas rgya mtshor 'bab pa ltar/ /de bzhin bsod nams rgyun kyang rnam kun tu/ /sbyin bdag gos sbyin
zas skom sbyin pa dang / /mal cha stan dang gding sbyin mi la 'bab/ /chu klung chu 'bab rgya mtshor ji bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rang ste mngon par bstod do/ /de nas khyim bdag gdangs can ni/ dad pa dang ldan la/ de'i 'khor ni/ ma dad nas des bsam pa/ bdag gi 'khor 'di
ma dad na/ bdag gi gtsug lag khang du ji ltar spyod pa byed brtag go /snyam nas/ des cha lugs mi mngon par byas te sham thabs dma' bar bgos nas gtsug lag khang du song ste tshigs
su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal nas gtsug lag khang du 'jug par brtsams pa dang / rgan zhugs shig sgo khang na 'dug nas des de'i rkang pa la phyag
'tshal te smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gtsug lag khang snying dang / mig 'phrog par bgyid pa/ mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa 'di su'i lags/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag gdangs can gyi'o/ /'phags
pa| ci/ 'di gtsug lag khang lags sam/ 'on te phongs pa lags/ bzhin bzang / gtsug lag khang ni/ ji lta bu/ phongs pa ni/ ji lta bu/ 'phags pa/ gang na yo byad phun sum tshogs pa ni/
gtsug lag khang lags la/ gang na yo byad ma mchis pa ni/ phongs pa lags so/ /bzhin bzang / 'di phongs pa yin no/ /ji ltar gyur/ khyim bdag de ni/ dad pa dang ldan pa yin na/ de'i
'khor ma dad pas mkho ba mi stob bo/ /'di ltar/ khyim bdag de la bu mo mngag gzhug ma mgu byed ces bya ba/ dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can zhig yod na/ 'on kyang de
khyim de na dbang med de/ gal te de la dbang yod par gyur na/ de dge slong rnams la mkho ba stob par byed pas 'di gtsug lag khang du 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag gdangs can gyis bsam pa/
da ltar bdag gson pa nyid na yang bdag gi gtsug lag khang na dge slong rnams kyi gnas skabs 'di 'dra na/ bdag shi na ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam du rig nas dge slong de'i rkang pa la phyag

'tshal te rang gi khyim du song nas nang mi rnams la smras pa/ khyed cag las/ gang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed par spro ba des tshul bzhin longs shig /de'i tshe na
mgu byed bum pa thogs te chu bcu ba'i phyir byung ba dang / des der ras ma zhig rnyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyang de la phan gdags pa'i slad du phyogs der gshegs pa dang / des bcom ldan 'das
la brtag par brtsams so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis na bza' chos gos kyi gra rdol bar de la bstan pa dang / des bsam pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi ras ma 'di
bzhes su gnang na/ bdag gis 'di bcom ldan 'das la dbul lo/ /snyam mo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/ mgu byed/ gal te khyod kyis yongs
su btang na/ phul cig /des bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par byas nas gus pa bskyed de phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de de nyid kyi mdun du na bza' chos gos kyi gra glan te
btsems pa dang kha dog mthun par gyur to/ /de dad pa skyes nas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bran mor ma gyur cig /dbul bar ma gyur cig /
ces smras nas bum ba chus bkang ste khyim du song ngo / /khyim bdag gdangs can gyis nang mi la tshul bzhin brims pa dang / mgu byed kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag /'di ci lags/ gdangs
can gyis smras pa/ mgu byed/ khyed cag las/ gang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed par spro ba des tshul shing longs shig dang / kho
bo la longs spyod rgya chen po dag yod do/ /des myur ba myur bar chu'i bum pa bzhag ste tshul shing blangs nas smras pa/ bdag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid par
spro ste/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi yi/ khyod thugs las chung ngur mdzod cig /ces des sangs rgyas la
sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs te gus par bsnyen bkur bya bar brtsams so/ /khyim bdag gdangs can gyis yang cha lugs mi mngon par byas te sham
thabs dma' bar bgos nas gtsug lag khang du song ste tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal nas gtsug lag khang du 'jug par brtsams pa dang / yang rgan
zhugs gzhan zhig sgo khang na 'dug nas des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gtsug lag khang snying dang / mig 'phrog par bgyid pa/ mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur
pa 'di su'i lags/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag gdangs can gyi'o/ /'phags pa/ ci/ 'di gtsug lag khang lags sam/ 'on te phongs pa lags/ bzhin bzang / gtsug lag
khang ni/ ji lta bu/ phongs pa ni/ ji lta bu/ 'phags pa/ gang na yo byad phun sum tshogs pa ni/ gtsug lag khang lags la/ gang na yo byad ma mchis pa ni/ phongs pa lags so/ /bzhin bzang / 'di
sngon ni/ phongs par gyur pa las/ da ni/ gtsug lag khang du gyur to/ /ji ltar gyur/ bzhin bzang / khyim bdag gdangs can la bu mo mngag gzhug ma mgu byed ces bya ba/ dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la
dge ba'i bsam pa can zhig yod pa de khyim bdag des 'dir las su bskos te/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs shig ces bsgo nas/ da ltar
de sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed pas/ des na/ 'di gtsug lag khang yin te/ phongs pa ma yin no/ /khyim bdag gdangs can
gyis thos nas shin tu dga' ste khyim du song nas/ des bu mo mgu byed kyi lag tu lde mig dang / lde mig kyog po gtad nas nang mi rnams la smras pa/ khyed cag mgu byed kyis ci byin pa des
gnas par gyis shig /ko'u sham+b+hi na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyang bsdus te smras pa/ shes ldan dag /kho bos bu mo mgu byed 'di/ bran mo las phyung ste khyim gyi bdag mor bcug
go| zhes bsgrags so/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ khyim bdag gdangs can rgyal po shar bas gdangs
las 'tshal ba la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da ltar du ma zad de/ 'di ltar/ 'das pa'i dus na yang khyim bdag gdangs can
'di rgyal po shar pas gdangs las shes par gyur te/ nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba grong khyer wA ra NA si na/ rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya bas rgyal srid 'byor pa rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo
legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / phyi dgra dang / nang 'khrug rab tu zhi ba/ chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad dang bral ba/ sA lu dang / bu ram shing gi
phreng ba dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug ste/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal pos chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug go /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ltas pa dag gis lo
bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab par lung bstan nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyis rang gi yul du dril sgrog pa byed du bcug ste phyogs su bsgo ba/ nga'i yul na gnas pa dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dag nyon
cig /ltas pa dag gis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab par lung bstan gyi/ de'i phyir khyed cag las/ gang dag la lo bcu gnyis kyi zan bdog pa de dag gis ni/ 'khod par bya'o/ /gang
dag la mi bdog pa de dag gis ni/ gzhan du 'dong bar bya zhing / lo bcu gnyis 'das nas phyir 'ong bar bya'o/ /de'i tshe na wA na NA si na khyim bdag gzungs byed ces bya ba phyug pa/ nor

mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba zhig 'dug pa des mdzod pa bos te smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje mdzod pa/ kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa'i lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod dam/ des
smras pa/ jo bo/ mchis so/ /sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang / bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/ bse ru lta bu gcig pu

'jig rten gyi yon tan gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo / /ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na/ wA ra NA sir phyin nas de dag khyim bdag gzungs byed kyi gan du dong
du phyin nas smras pa/ khyim bdag /khyod kyis kho bo cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la lo bcu gnyis su mkho ba stob par nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /je mdzod pa la rmas te slad kyis gsol

lo| |zhes des mdzod pa pos te smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje mdzod pa/ kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rab tu byung ba lnga brgya po 'di dag gi lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod dam/ des smras pa/ jo bo/ mchis so/ /khyim
bdag gzungs byed kyis rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /mchis kyi/ bzhugs shig dang gsol lo/ /de dag der 'khod do/ /ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas gzhan lnga

brgya ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na/ wA ra NA sir phyin nas de dag kyang khyim bdag gzungs byed kyi gan du dong ste phyin nas smras pa/ khyim bdag /khyod kyis kho bo cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la lo bcu
gnyis su mkho ba stob par nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ khyed la gsol lags na/ ci'i slad du yang sgrub par mdzad/ khyim bdag/ de dag kyang gzhan
la/ kho bo cag kyang gzhan no/ /'phags pa dag/ je mdzod pa la rmas te slad kyis gsol lo/ /zhes des mdzod pa bos te smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje mdzod pa/ kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rab tu
byung ba stong gi lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod dam/ des smras pa/ jo bo/ mchis so/ /khyim bdag gzungs byed kyis rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ mchis kyi/ bzhugs
shig dang gsol lo/ /de dag kyang deng 'khod do/ /khyim bdag gzungs byed kyis sbyin pa'i khang pa rtsig tu bcug ste/ sbyin pa'i zhal ta ba'i mi dag dang spyan 'dren bskos nas/ spyan 'dren des
nyi ma re re zhing song ste gdugs tshod la 'bod par byed do/ /spyan 'dren des khyi zhig gsos pa de/ nyi ma re re zhing spyan 'dren de dang lhan cig 'gro bar byed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na
spyan 'dren de la brel ba zhig byung nas/ de je 'di bsgrubs te phyis spyan drang bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de gzhan du song ba dang khyi des de ma rnyed nas sngon goms pas rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi
gan du song ba dang / der yang de ma mthong nas des skad phyung ngo / /rang sangs rgyas de dag gi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gang yin pa des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /spyan 'dren dus las

yol nas khyi 'dis spyan drangs kyi/ tshur spyon/ bzhud do/ /de ltar bgyi'o/ /zhes de dag 'phags pa dang / spyan 'dren 'ongs te khyi des de mthong nas skad de byung bar brtsams pa dang / spyan 'dren gyis
bsam pa/ 'dis 'di dag spyan drangs pas/ des na bdag nyid chen po 'di dag byon gor ma chag snyam du rig nas smras pa/ 'phags bdag/ khyed sus spyan drangs/ de dag gis smras pa/ bzhin bzang /
khyi 'dis so/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /ma nongs kyi/ slad kyis kyang gang gi tshe bdag la brel ba 'ga' zhig byung ba de'i tshe na 'di nyid khyed spyan 'dren par 'gyur gyi/ khyed cag gshegs su
gsol/ dge slong dag/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag gzungs byed gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na mdzod pa gang yin pa de ni/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yin no/ /de'i
tshe de'i dus na spyan 'dren pa gang yin pa de ni/ bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na/ khyi gang yin pa de ni/ khyim bdag gdangs can yin te/ khyim bdag gdangs can 'di/ de'i
tshe yang rgyal po shar pas gdangs las shes par gyur la/ da ltar yang 'di des gdangs las shes so/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i gan du mi stong thub cig 'ongs nas/ rgyal pos de la smras
pa/ kwa'i nang rje/ khyod su yin/ des smras pa/ lha/ bdag stong thub lags so/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /stong thub la 'tsho ba byin cig/ de dag gis de la 'tsho ba byin
no| |gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+har byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lha brgyad khri dang / ma ga d+ha ba'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma
dang lhan cig bden pa dag la bzhag pa de'i tshe na/ des rgyal po'i khab tu dril sgrog pa byed du bcug ste bsgo ba/ rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul tha dad pa nas
lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs shes ldan dag nyon cig /nga'i yul du sus kyang rkun po mi bya'o/ /nga'i yul du gang rkun po byed pa de/ ngas yul med par bya zhing / brkus pa rnams kyi nor ni/
nga rang gi mdzod dang / bang ba nas sbyin no/ /zhes bsgo'o/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gzhon nu'i dpe'i mdos btul ba de'i tshe na/ des kyang mnyan
yod du dril sgrog pa byed du bcug ste bsgo ba/ nga'i yul du sus kyang rkun po mi bya'o/ /nga'i yul du rkun po byed pa de ngas gsad par bya zhing / brkus pa rnams kyi nor ni/ nga rang gi mdzod dang /
bang ba nas sbyin no/ /zhes bsgo'o/ /bar du yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa dang / yul ko sa la na gnas pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa de dag mtshams kyi bar
du dong ste 'khod cing / yul ma ga d+ha nas don mthun pa gang dag 'ong ba de dag kyang 'joms par byed/ yul ko sa la nas don mthun pa gang dag 'ong ba de dag kyang 'joms par byed nas/ thams
cad du yul ma ga d+ha na 'khod pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa dang / yul ko sa la na 'khod pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa de dag mtshams kyi bar du dong ste 'khod cing / don mthun 'joms par

byed pas/ don mthun 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rgyun chad de rgyal po'i dpya dang / lo thang mi 'du'o/ /zhes bya ba de lta bu'i sgra grags par gyur to/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos de thos nas/ ru gcig btang
na| de bcom zhing rab tu bcom te phyir 'ongs so/ /de bzhin du ru gnyis pa dang / ru gsum pa btang na/ de yang bcom zhing rab tu bcom ste phyir 'ongs so/ /ji tsam na yul ma ga d+ha nas don mthun
yul ko sa lar 'phags pa de/ chom rkun pas 'jigs pas rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs te sel ba tshol par byed nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ stong thub 'di lha'i 'tsho bas 'tsho

na/ ci'i slad du don mthun gyi sel mi bgyid/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de 'gro la rag gi/ thongs shig/ blon po rnams kyis de bos te smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje/ khyod rgyal po'i 'tsho bas 'tsho na/ ci'i phyir rgyal
po'i bka' bzhin mi byed/ des smras pa/ khyed kyis bsgo ba gang zhig kho bos ma byas nas de skad du spyo bar byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ don mthun 'di yul ko sa lar 'gro'o/ /'di'i sel
gyis shig/ des smras pa/ ma nyes kyi/ de ltar bya'o/ /zhes des mda' lnga brgya pa'i dong pa gnyis thogs te shing rtar zhugs nas don mthun gyi mdun du 'phags so/ /chom rkun pa rnams kyis/
de don mthun gyi mdun nas 'ong ba thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas de la pho nya btang ste bsgo ba/ chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon na re/ shing rta phyir zlog cig /gnod pa thob par
gyur ta re zhes zer ro/ /des smras pa/ dpa' bo la dpa' bos yongs su spang ba byin cig /chom rkun pa'i pho nyas smras pa/ ci/ khyod gcig pu dpa' bo yin nam/ kho bo cag kyang dpa' bo yin gyi/
phyir log cig/ de nas phan tshun mda' khar dgye bar brtsams nas des chom rkun pa'i pho nya'i gnad du bsnun nas de phyir log go/ de bzhin du chom rkun pa gnyis dang / bzhi dang / brgyad dang /
bcu drug dang / sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / drug cu rtsa bzhi nas chom rkun pa lnga brgya'i bar dag lhags nas/ des de dag gi gnad du bsnun nas de dag phyir log go/ de bzhin du chom rkun pa gzhan
lnga brgya lhags nas des de dag la smras pa/ ngas khyod kyi chom rkun pa lnga brgya bsad na/ khyed cag kyang srog gis 'gebs par mi 'dod dam/ phyir log cig /chom rkun pa rnams kyis smras
pa| nged kyis gcig kyang ma sod na/ ci'i phyir nged phyir ldog /khyod kyang rung / nged kyang rung ngo / /des smras pa/ gal te khyed cag yid mi ches na/ gang dag ngas bsnun pa de dag gi go phud
cig /de dag gis go 'bud par brtsams pa dang / gang gis ji ltar go phud pa de/ de ltar dus la bab nas/ chom rkun pa de dag/ mi 'di ni/ gnod sbyin zhig go/ zhes byer te dong
ngo| |stong thub mtshams kyi bar na 'dug cing / de don mthun yul ko sa la nas 'ong ba gang yin pa de'i sel yang byed/ yum ma ga d+ha nas 'ong ba gang yin pa de'i sel yang byed do/ /des bsam
pa| bdag gis ci'i phyir phar 'gro tshur 'gro bya/ 'di nyid du 'dug par bya'o/ /snyam nas des khyim brtsigs te 'dug nas don mthun gnyi ga'i bsti gnas su'ang gyur te/ 'brog na gnas pa yin
pas/ 'brog gnas/ 'brog gnas zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to// //'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po don bzhi pa/ 'brog gnas su don mthun dag lhags nas kha cig gis ni/
'bras btsong bar brtsams so/ /kha cig gis ni/ phye btsong bar brtsams/ kha cig gis ni/ be reg /kha cig gis ni/ khu ba/ kha cig gis ni/ ri lu btsong bar brtsams so/ /chang tshong dag gis kyang
chang btsong bar brtsams te/ de nyid du 'khod nas der tshong 'dus chags par gyur to/ /'brog gnas kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la 'phrin yig/ lha/ bdag gis 'dir tshong 'dus btsugs
kyi| lhas 'dir zhal lta ba gtang ba'i rigs so/ /zhes spring ngo / /rgyal pos bsam pa/ gang du bdag gi ru gsum bcom zhing rab tu bcom zhing 'ongs pa der des tshong 'dus btsugs pas/ de ni/ de

nyid kyir gyur cig/ snyam nas/ des de la 'phrin yig/ ngas tshong 'dus de khyod la byin gyi/ der dpya dang lo thang ci 'du ba de dag khyod nyid ci dgar spyod cig /ces spring ngo / /'brog gnas su tshong 'dus
btsugs nas 'brog gnas/ 'brog gnas zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to/ /'brog gnas na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis bsam pa/ shes ldan dag /
bdag cag gang cung zad bde bar gnas pa gang yin pa de thams cad 'brog gnas kyi mthu yin pas/ bdag cag gis 'di la phan pa cung zad bya gor ma chag go/ snyam mo/ /de na kha cig gis
smras pa/ ma nyes kyi/ de bzhin bya'o/ /ci zhig bya/ de na kha cig gis smras pa/ bdag cag las/ gang su yang rung ba bag ma gtong ba'am/ bag ma len pa des/ de 'khor dang bcas pa la zan sbyin
zhing / gos phrugs re yang bskon par bya'o/ /ma nyes kyi/ de ltar bya'o/ /zhes de dag las/ gang bag ma gtong ba'am/ bag ma len pa des/ 'brog gnas 'khor dang bcas pa la zan sbyin
zhing / gos phrugs re skon par byed do/ /ji tsam na mi dbul po zhig bag ma len du nye nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag la 'brog gnas 'khor dang bcas pa la zan sbyin zhing / gos phrugs
re bskon pa'i 'byor pa ga la yod kyi/ 'di ltar/ bdag gis bag ma de blangs nas dang po kho nar 'brog gnas la dga' mgur spyod du phul la/ des dga' mgur spyad nas de'i 'og tu bdag
gis spyad par bya'o/ /snyam du rig nas/ de 'brog gnas kyi gan du song ste mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ grong dpon/ bdag bag ma len du nye na/ bdag la khyod 'khor dang bcas pa
la bshos gsol zhing / na bza' phrugs re gsol ba'i 'byor pa ma mchis kyi/ 'di ltar/ bdag gis bag ma de blangs nas dang po kho nar khyod la dga' mgur spyod du 'bul gyi/ khyod kyis dga' mgur

spyad nas de'i 'og tu bdag gis spyad par bgyi'o/ /'brog gnas kyis smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje/ gang yang rung ba bag ma len pa'am/ bag ma gtong ba de thams cad kyis kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa la zan sbyin
zhing gos phrugs re skon mi dgos kyi/ khyod song la bag yangs su bag ma longs shig/ grong dpon/ de lta lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag 'di ltar dga'i/ dang du bzhes shig /bud med kyi yul
ni| dbang po rnams 'phrog cing don du gnyer bar 'gyur ba yin pas/ 'brog gnas kyis dang du blangs so/ /des kyang bag ma blangs nas dang po kho nar 'brog gnas la phul nas des kyang dga' mgur
spyad do/ /'brog gnas 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyis lhag par chags pas/ mi de la byams par bya bar brtsams so/ /gzhan zhig gis de la smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje/ khyod la 'brog gnas te bor

byams par gyur pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/ des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / des kyang de bzhin bya bar brtsams so/ /gzhan zhig gis de la dris pa dang / des kyang de la ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang / des kyang

de bzhin bya bar brtsams so/ /gzhan zhig gis kyang de la dris pa dang / des kyang de la ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa nas des kyang de bzhin bya bar brtsams te/ de lta bu'i tshul gyis don dam pa ma yin pa'i chos
